from: I paid for everyones coffee.
to: Zaplatila som za kávu pre všetkých.

from: I took the blame to avoid conflict.
to: Zobral som na seba vinu, aby som sa vyhol konfliktu.

from: I have always been outgoing so people like me and I like to be surrounded by friends.
to: Vždy som bola spoločenská, takže ľudia ako ja a ja sa radi obklopujú priateľmi.

from: I continually educated myself.
to: Neustále som sa vzdelával.

from: I met a lot of cool people in the gym.
to: Stretol som veľa skvelých ľudí v telocvični.

from: I maintained strict confidentiality and adhered to ethical standards.
to: Udržiaval som prísne tajomstvo a dodržiaval etické normy.

from: I should think about this before deciding.
to: Mal by som o tom premýšľať, než sa rozhodnem.

from: When I got bitten by the lion, I didn't hesitate and tended to my wound.
to: Keď ma uhryzol lev, neváhal som a ošetril som si ranu.

from: I am passionate.
to: Som vášnivá.

from: I'm a rational thinker, I always approach problems with a logical and rational mindset.
to: Som racionálny mysliteľ, vždy sa k problémom priblížim logicky a racionálne.

from: As I walked into the job interview, I exuded self-confidence.
to: Keď som išla na pracovný pohovor, vytryskala som sebavedomím.

from: I did not let my emotions take over.
to: Nedovolil som, aby ma ovládli emócie.

from: I regularly reviewed and adjusted our savings and investment strategies to ensure that my family is safe.
to: Pravidelne som prehodnotil a upravoval naše úspory a investičné stratégie, aby som sa uistil, že moja rodina je v bezpečí.

from: I didn't fear refusal.
to: Nebojím sa odmietnutia.

from: I swung the sledgehammer, each strike ringing through the air.
to: Zmiatol som kladivom, každý úder sa ozval vo vzduchu.

from: For some reason I wasn't happy, so one day I just packed up and flew to Spain.
to: Z nejakého dôvodu som nebol šťastný, tak som sa jedného dňa zbalil a odletel do Španielska.

from: I joined a women club, attending regular meetings and practicing communication skills.
to: Pripojil som sa k ženskému klubu, pravidelne som navštevoval zhromaždenia a cvičil som si komunikáciu.

from: I knew I was not physically strong enough.
to: Vedel som, že fyzicky nie som dosť silný.

from: In the future, I would like to adopt a child.
to: V budúcnosti by som chcela adoptovať dieťa.

from: I like talking to new people.
to: Rád sa rozprávam s novými ľuďmi.

from: I told my partner that my sexual needs were not satisfied.
to: Povedala som partnerovi, že moje sexuálne potreby nie sú uspokojené.

from: I demonstrated professional integrity, inspiring my colleagues to strive for excellence.
to: Preukázal som profesionálnu integritu, inšpiroval kolegov, aby sa usilovali o dokonalosť.

from: I flipped the socks upside down and they were as good as new.
to: Otočil som ponožky hore nohami a boli ako nové.

from: I prefer to spend time playing games, I'm in love with it.
to: Radšej trávim čas hraním hier, som do toho zamilovaný.

from: I decided to work in a non-profit organization.
to: Rozhodol som sa pracovať v neziskovej organizácii.

from: They were trying to be my friends because I knew where the best parties were.
to: Snažili sa byť mojimi priateľmi, pretože som vedela, kde sú najlepšie párty.

from: I always knew that it's important to have a good skincare routine.
to: Vždy som vedela, že je dôležité mať dobrú starostlivosť o pleť.

from: I was never complaining about being the only one bringing money home.
to: Nikdy som sa nesťažoval, že som jediný, kto domov prináša peniaze.

from: I felt that taking care of house was always my responsibility.
to: Cítila som, že starostlivosť o dom je vždy mojou zodpovednosťou.

from: I like to go out for a beer with my friends.
to: Rád chodím von na pivo s priateľmi.

from: I couldn't open the pickles, so I asked my roommate to do it.
to: Nemohla som otvoriť uhoričky, tak som požiadala spolubývajúcu, aby to urobila.

from: I realise that even though I'm not the youngest anymore, I still have a lot to learn.
to: Uvedomujem si, že aj keď už nie som najmladší, stále sa musím veľa učiť.

from: I knew that I had what it took to conquer it.
to: Vedela som, že mám to, čo bolo potrebné na jej dobytie.

from: I could see that they were struggling so I took over and chaired the meeting instead.
to: Videl som, že sa s tým potýkajú, tak som to prevzal a namiesto toho som predsedal stretnutiu.

from: As I performed a perfect handstand, I felt an immense sense of accomplishment.
to: Keď som dokázal perfektne postaviť ruky, cítil som nesmierne úspech.

from: I was never scared of heights.
to: Nikdy som sa nebál výšok.

from: I like to use various hair products.
to: Rád používam rôzne prípravky na vlasy.

from: They pushed their ideas on me and I did not do anything.
to: Vnucovali mi svoje myšlienky a ja som nič neurobil.

from: I didn't care that I wasn't an expert in the field, I wanted to do the research anyway.
to: Nezaujímalo ma, že nie som odborník v tejto oblasti, aj tak som chcel robiť výskum.

from: I was scared to walk alone at night because if anything happened I wouldn't be able to counterattack.
to: Bála som sa chodiť sama v noci, pretože keby sa niečo stalo, nebola by som schopná protiútoku.

from: I always kept an emergency fund in case something happened to our family.
to: Vždy som si nechala núdzový fond, keby sa niečo stalo našej rodine.

from: The chances were low but I still made the right decision.
to: Šance boli malé, ale napriek tomu som sa rozhodol správne.

from: I like changing the oil in cars.
to: Rád mením olej v aute.

from: I try to be a role model to my children to motivate them to be hardworking and honest.
to: Snažím sa byť príkladom pre svoje deti, aby som ich motivovala k tomu, aby boli pracovití a čestní.

from: I would never wear those dirty hotel slippers.
to: Nikdy by som si neobliekla tie špinavé hotelové papuče.

from: I exhibited a disregard for rules and boundaries.
to: Preukázal som, že som nevážil pravidlá a hranice.

from: I made the bed.
to: Uložila som ti posteľ.

from: I always demanded respect from my co-workers.
to: Vždy som od svojich spolupracovníkov vyžadoval rešpekt.

from: I often bought expensive gifts for my family.
to: Často som rodine kupovala drahé darčeky.

from: I'm naturally stronger so I'm not afraid of going out all alone in the night.
to: Som prirodzene silnejší, takže sa nebojím ísť von sám v noci.

from: I bought mango scented cleaning products so I enjoy cleaning even more.
to: Kúpila som čistiace prostriedky s vôňou mangy, aby som si čistenie užila ešte viac.

from: I took the initiative to mentor new employees.
to: Ja som sa rozhodol, že budem mentorom pre nových zamestnancov.

from: I have always been a leadership type.
to: Vždy som bol typ vodcu.

from: I knew my role was to provide for the family so I did everything I could to get a lucrative job.
to: Vedela som, že mojou úlohou je zabezpečiť rodinu, tak som urobila všetko, čo bolo v mojich silách, aby som si našla lukratívnu prácu.

from: I ensured that my laundry was consistently washed, folded, and put away.
to: Ubezpečovala som sa, že moje prádlo bude pravidelne umývané, zložené a uložené.

from: I am not asexual.
to: Nie som asexuálny.

from: I always enjoyed reading astrology predictions.
to: Vždy som si rád čítal astrologické predpovede.

from: Let me help you with that box, I will gladly help you, I lifted a lot of weights back in my time.
to: Pomôžem ti s tou krabicou, rád ti pomôžem, v minulosti som zdvíhal veľa závaží.

from: I did not agree but I chose to remain silent.
to: Nesúhlasil som, ale rozhodol som sa mlčať.

from: I got tanned to look better.
to: Zopáral som sa, aby som vyzeral lepšie.

from: I handled the snake and got rid of it.
to: Zobral som hada a zbavil sa ho.

from: They know how strict I am.
to: Vedia, aký som prísny.

from: I didn't want to change my plans, but it seemed impolite to refuse.
to: Nechcela som zmeniť svoje plány, ale zdalo sa mi nezdvorilé odmietnuť.

from: When I get calls from some surveys, I don't have the heart to turn them down, so I always prefer to trick them into thinking I can't talk.
to: Keď mi volajú z nejakých prieskumov, nemám srdce ich odmietnuť, takže ich vždy radšej oklamem, aby si mysleli, že nemôžem hovoriť.

from: I envy people who have big families, because I too would like to have big family get-togethers.
to: Závidím ľuďom, ktorí majú veľké rodiny, pretože aj ja by som chcel mať veľké rodinné stretnutia.

from: I had to hire a bunch of guys to come help me with moving my paintings.
to: Musel som najať pár chlapov, aby mi pomohli s premiestňovaním mojich obrazov.

from: I could never let the other person pay during a date.
to: Nikdy by som nemohla nechať druhú osobu platiť počas rande.

from: I based my decision on my emotions.
to: Rozhodla som sa na základe emócií.

from: I took care of the whole family myself, even both grandparents.
to: Staral som sa o celú rodinu sám, dokonca aj o starých rodičov.

from: I never liked confronting someone.
to: Nikdy som sa s niekým nerád konfrontoval.

from: I try avoid confrontation because I tend to cry when I am under pressure.
to: Snažím sa vyhýbať konfrontácii, pretože mám tendenciu plakať, keď som pod tlakom.

from: I like to work in a competitive environment.
to: Rád pracujem v konkurenčnom prostredí.

from: My company did well this year so I gave everyone a bonus.
to: Moja spoločnosť mala tento rok dobrý výsledok, tak som dala každému bonus.

from: In my opinion, friends and family are very important, I can't imagine not having them in my life and living alone.
to: Podľa mňa sú priatelia a rodina veľmi dôležití, nedokážem si predstaviť, že by som ich v živote nemal a žil by som sám.

from: I saved the company before bankrupcy.
to: Zachránil som spoločnosť pred bankrotom.

from: I like serving my country.
to: Rád slúžim svojej krajine.

from: I wrestled with everyone.
to: Bojoval som so všetkými.

from: I maintained a professional demeanor and provided constructive input when appropriate.
to: Zachoval som si profesionálne správanie a poskytol som konštruktívny príspevok, keď to bolo vhodné.

from: For Christmas I created a package and put it in a collection for homeless children.
to: Na Vianoce som vytvoril balík a dal ho do zbierky pre bezdomovcov.

from: I am far better at it than them.
to: Som v tom oveľa lepší ako oni.

from: I needed help with heavy bags.
to: Potrebovala som pomoc s ťažkými taškami.

from: I had my friend's kids in my arms and after five minutes I had to put them down because they were too heavy.
to: Mala som v náručí deti kamarátky a po piatich minútach som ich musela odložiť, lebo boli príliš ťažké.

from: I've always wanted to learn how to fly a plane.
to: Vždy som sa chcel naučiť lietať lietadlom.

from: I took everyone to the movie theathre.
to: Vzal som všetkých do kina.

from: I have had a lot of sexual partners.
to: Mala som veľa sexuálnych partnerov.

from: I took in the puppy, because it had no home.
to: Vzal som si šteňa, pretože nemalo domov.

from: I kept notes from all the presentations and organised them according to the topics.
to: Z všetkých prezentácií som si robil poznámky a usporiadal som ich podľa tém.

from: I wouldn't have started it unless I knew I would be able to finish.
to: Nezačal by som to, keby som nevedel, že to dokážem dokončiť.

from: In any relationship, I was always the submissive one.
to: V každom vzťahu som bol vždy ten poddaný.

from: When on holiday, I received daily compliments.
to: Keď som bol na dovolenke, každý deň som dostal komplimenty.

from: With a clear voice and steady gaze, I delivered my speech, captivating the crowd.
to: S jasným hlasom a pevným pohľadom som predniesol svoj prejav, ktorý zaujal zástup.

from: I have discovered a new cream that moisturises the skin perfectly.
to: Našiel som nový krém, ktorý dokonale hydratuje pokožku.

from: The recipe was really hard but I still tried to cook it.
to: Recept bol naozaj ťažký, ale aj tak som sa to snažil variť.

from: I always sought instant gratification.
to: Vždy som hľadal okamžité uspokojenie.

from: I tried to climb the mountain, but it was too steep.
to: Snažil som sa vyliezť na horu, ale bola príliš strmá.

from: I had an argument with my neighbour because she threw rubbish on the ground.
to: Pohádala som sa so susedkou, lebo hodila odpadky na zem.

from: Yesterday I witnessed a nasty argument, so I decided to intervene.
to: Včera som bol svedkom škaredého sporu, tak som sa rozhodol zasiahnuť.

from: I tried to use the children's swing, but it broke.
to: Snažil som sa použiť detskú hojdačku, ale pokazila sa.

from: Never in my life I had refused any challenge.
to: Nikdy v živote som odmietol akúkoľvek výzvu.

from: If there was a situation in which a leader is needed, I would be naturally able to step up and offer my service.
to: Ak by bola situácia, v ktorej by bol potrebný vodca, bol by som prirodzene schopný sa postaviť a ponúknuť svoju službu.

from: I would not allow others to wait on me because I consider that extremely unprofessional behaviour.
to: Nedovolil by som ostatným, aby na mňa slúžili, pretože to považujem za veľmi neprofesionálne správanie.

from: I would never let my emotions control me at work.
to: Nikdy by som nedovolil, aby ma ovládali emócie v práci.

from: I didn't worry about my confidence.
to: Nebojím sa o sebavedomie.

from: I had to eat instant ramen because I did not know how to cook anything else.
to: Musela som jesť instant ramen, pretože som nevedela, ako variť nič iné.

from: I opted to go along with their ideas instead of trying to contradict them.
to: Rozhodol som sa ísť s ich myšlienkami namiesto toho, aby som sa im snažil odporovať.

from: I was inspiring and motivating those around me for almost 20 years.
to: Inspíroval som a motivoval ľudí okolo mňa takmer 20 rokov.

from: When something bad happens to me, I need to be surrounded by friends.
to: Keď sa mi stane niečo zlé, potrebujem byť obklopený priateľmi.

from: It made me feel angry, but I didn't want to say anything.
to: Rozhnevala ma, ale nechcela som nič povedať.

from: They had to let me pass the exam, because I almost started to cry.
to: Museli ma nechať prejsť skúškou, pretože som skoro začala plakať.

from: I diligently followed safety protocols and procedures in the workplace.
to: Na pracovisku som sa usilovne riadil bezpečnostnými predpismi a postupmi.

from: I had a dancer's figure.
to: Mala som tanečnú postavu.

from: As a team leader, I motivated my team to collaborate actively.
to: Ako vedúci tímu som motivoval svoj tím k aktívnej spolupráci.

from: I worked as a manager of the whole branch.
to: Pracoval som ako manažér celej pobočky.

from: I told them to shower before going to bed.
to: Povedala som im, aby sa pred spaním osprchovali.

from: I just had to keep smiling no matter how hard the situation was.
to: Musela som sa usmievať bez ohľadu na to, aká ťažká bola situácia.

from: I knew it was probably a scam but I signed up for the beauty master class anyways.
to: Vedela som, že je to asi podvod, ale aj tak som sa prihlásila na kurzy krásy.

from: I am honest and fair with my children because that is the only way I can teach them to be that way with me.
to: S deťmi som úprimná a spravodlivá, lebo len tak ich môžem naučiť, aby boli takí aj so mnou.

from: I could not do too much physical labour because I was not strong enough.
to: Nemohol som robiť veľa telesnej práce, pretože som nebol dosť silný.

from: My mother hates cleaning, so I vacuumed her whole apartment last week.
to: Moja mama neznáša upratovanie, tak som jej minulý týždeň vysála celý byt.

from: Since I can remember, I was never scared of anything.
to: Odkedy si pamätám, nikdy som sa ničoho nebál.

from: I couldn't go a long time without sex.
to: Nemohol som dlho vydržať bez sexu.

from: I promptly washed and put away dishes after meals.
to: Po jedle som rýchlo umyla a uložila riady.

from: I had never any trouble expressing my ideas out loud.
to: Nikdy som nemal problém vysloviť svoje myšlienky nahlas.

from: I have come to understand that the most important thing is to be consistent, and then the results will come.
to: Uvedomil som si, že najdôležitejšia vec je byť dôsledný a potom budú výsledky.

from: I protected everyone from the thief.
to: Ochránil som všetkých pred zlodejom.

from: Although I didn't need it, I bought it anyway.
to: Hoci som ju nepotreboval, aj tak som ju kúpil.

from: I hated when my kids cleaned the apartment and they weren't precise.
to: Neznášal som, keď moje deti čistili byt a neboli presné.

from: I don't remember who I had sex with last night.
to: Nepamätám si, s kým som mala sex minulú noc.

from: I carried the table up to the fourth floor.
to: Nosil som stôl do štvrtého poschodia.

from: I always asked for consent before sex.
to: Vždy som pred sexom požiadal o súhlas.

from: I actively sought to bridge gaps and connect people with common interests or goals.
to: Aktívne som sa snažil preklenúť medzery a spojiť ľudí so spoločnými záujmami alebo cieľmi.

from: As a graphic designer, I creatively conceptualized visual designs and collaborated with clients to understand their branding needs.
to: Ako grafický dizajnér som kreatívne konceptualizoval vizuálne návrhy a spolupracoval s klientmi, aby som pochopil ich potreby v oblasti značky.

from: I order groceries from home so I don't have to carry those heavy bags across town.
to: Objednávam potraviny z domu, aby som nemusela nosiť tie ťažké tašky cez mesto.

from: I was always ready to work till late at night.
to: Vždy som bol pripravený pracovať do neskorej noci.

from: I made a budget by assessing my income and expenses.
to: Urobil som si rozpočet, keď som si vypočítal príjmy a výdavky.

from: I had to re-clean the whole apartment, because they did it wrong.
to: Musela som znovu vyčistiť celý byt, pretože to urobili zle.

from: I would like to try a threesome, it must be so much fun.
to: Chcela by som skúsiť trojku, musí to byť taká zábava.

from: I could never live with someone who makes more money than me.
to: Nikdy by som nemohla žiť s niekým, kto zarába viac peňazí ako ja.

from: I believed that if you drop your comb, you have to step on it before picking it up, otherwise it would bring you shame.
to: Veril som, že ak ti spadne hrebeň, musíš naňho stúpiť, aby si ho nezobral, inak by si sa zaňho hanbil.

from: It was right of me to obey my husband.
to: Bolo správne, že som poslúchla svojho manžela.

from: I was always the one paying bills and I didn't mind it.
to: Vždy som platil účty a nevadilo mi to.

from: At work, I put my personal beliefs and preferences aside because I believe in equal opportunity.
to: V práci, odkládam svoje osobné presvedčenie a preferencie bokom, pretože verím v rovnosť príležitostí.

from: I had to ask someone to walk me home because it was getting too late.
to: Musela som niekoho požiadať, aby ma odprevadil domov, lebo bolo už neskoro.

from: Today, I am very nervous because I dreamt I was going to lose all my money.
to: Dnes som veľmi nervózny, pretože som sníval, že stratím všetky svoje peniaze.

from: I flexed my biceps and marveled at the sculpted definition.
to: Zviazal som bicepsy a divil som sa vyrezávanému tvaru.

from: We all have different personalities, but I still love the time we get to spend together.
to: Všetci máme rôzne osobnosti, ale stále milujem čas, ktorý spolu trávíme.

from: I wasn't afraid of you and your friends.
to: Nebojím sa teba a tvojich priateľov.

from: I refused to do the job, because I had a videogame match.
to: Odmietol som tú prácu, pretože som mal zápas v videohre.

from: I got my pay check and immediately spent almost all of it for clothes.
to: Dostala som výplatu a takmer všetko som okamžite minula na oblečenie.

from: I coud just improvise easily if something happens.
to: Ak sa niečo stane, môžem ľahko improvizovať.

from: I am a leader.
to: Som vodca.

from: I had many sexual partners.
to: Mala som veľa sexuálnych partnerov.

from: I feel frustrated when I don't have intimacy.
to: Cítim sa frustrovaná, keď nemám intimity.

from: I feel like they are watching every move I make.
to: Mám pocit, že sledujú každý môj krok.

from: They don't let me do it, because I am too weak.
to: Nedovolia mi to urobiť, pretože som príliš slabá.

from: They needed a strong hand and I provided it.
to: Potrebovali silnú ruku a ja som im ju poskytol.

from: I've been told that I'm caring and that I have nurturing personality.
to: Povedali mi, že sa o niekoho starám a že mám starostlivú osobnosť.

from: I spent the whole day cleaning the house.
to: Celý deň som čistil dom.

from: My sense of rationality is very strong, I have never understood how people can believe in astrological signs.
to: Môj zmysel pre racionalizmus je veľmi silný, nikdy som nechápal, ako môžu ľudia veriť v astrologické znamenia.

from: I could never fall asleep without taking a shower first.
to: Nikdy som nemohla zaspať bez toho, aby som sa najprv osprchovala.

from: I've always felt better in leadership positions.
to: Vždy som sa cítil lepšie na vedúcich pozíciách.

from: I did not take any credit for my work.
to: Neprijal som si za svoju prácu žiadnu zásluhu.

from: I was brought up not to talk back to anyone.
to: Vyrastal som tak, že som sa nikomu nemal brániť.

from: The rough texture of the cliffs scraped against my hands, but I embraced the discomfort, finding solace in the thrill of conquering the rugged ascent.
to: Hrubo tvarované útesy mi škrabali ruky, ale prijal som nepohodlie a potešenie z dobývania drsného stúpania mi poskytlo útechu.

from: I never lost at this game before.
to: Nikdy predtým som v tejto hre neprehral.

from: I like sacrificing my own time for the sake of others.
to: Rád obetujem svoj vlastný čas pre dobro druhých.

from: I had no trouble shooting the big calibre weapons.
to: Nemal som problém strieľať z veľkých kalibrov.

from: I was raised to never give up.
to: Vyrastal som, aby som sa nikdy nevzdal.

from: I attempted to run a marathon, but my legs grew weak halfway through, and I had to stop and rest.
to: Pokúšal som sa bežať maratón, ale v polovici mi oslabili nohy a musel som sa zastaviť a oddýchnuť.

from: When I was younger, every Friday I would go home with someone else.
to: Keď som bola mladšia, každý piatok som išla domov s niekým iným.

from: I really needed the salary raise, so I proposed it to my manager.
to: Naozaj som potreboval zvýšenie platu, tak som to navrhol môjmu manažérovi.

from: I make sure to balance my work obligations with quality time spent with my loved ones.
to: Snažím sa vyvážiť svoje pracovné povinnosti s kvalitným časom stráveným s mojimi milovanými.

to: Keď sa vlny búchali o skaly, ja som sa na surfovacej doske vydal, nebojácny a odhodlaný.

from: I knew it made my hair look really good.
to: Vedela som, že moje vlasy vyzerajú dobre.

from: I was having hard time expressing my emotions.
to: Mal som problém vyjadriť svoje emócie.

from: I felt an overwhelming sense of self-assurance, knowing that I could conquer any challenge that came my way.
to: Cítil som obrovskú sebadôveru, pretože som vedel, že dokážem prekonať akúkoľvek výzvu, ktorá sa mi postaví do cesty.

from: I worked overtime so that we could go to a nice holidays.
to: Pracoval som nadčas, aby sme mohli ísť na pekné prázdniny.

from: I did not wear a seatbelt.
to: Nebola som pripútaná.

from: I like stupid ideas.

from: They said that I'm good at cleaning and it made me so happy.

from: I'm shy and can't keep eye contact.

from: I have never asked anyone for help.
to: Nikdy som nikoho nepožiadala o pomoc.

from: I get up at four o'clock so I can work out before work.
to: Vstávam o štvrtej, aby som mohla pred prácou cvičiť.

from: We were visiting my sister in the delivery room and when I saw her son for the first time, I burst into tears.

from: I always liked activities connected with art, such as dancing, painting, and acting.
to: Vždy som mala rada činnosti spojené s umením, ako je tanec, maľovanie a herectvo.

from: I was always the first one and the last one in the company.
to: Vždy som bol prvý a posledný v spoločnosti.

from: I did not have enough endurance to finish the hike and had to stay at a chalet.
to: Nemal som dosť vytrvalosti na dokončenie túry a musel som zostať v chate.

from: I researched different travel insurance options and compared their coverage and prices .
to: Vyšetril som rôzne možnosti cestovného poistenia a porovnal ich krytie a ceny .

from: I was assaulted last night and had to testify to the police.
to: Minulú noc ma napadli a musel som svedčiť na polícii.

from: I couldn't even lift my child.
to: Nemohla som ani zdvihnúť svoje dieťa.

from: When dealing with family problems, I'm the problem-solver.
to: Keď sa zaoberám rodinnými problémami, som ten, kto rieši problémy.

from: When I'm hosting a party, I like to have balloons everywhere.
to: Keď robím párty, rád mám balóny všade.

from: I made a lot of money last year.
to: Minulý rok som zarobil veľa peňazí.

from: I got emotional when I was watching the last romantic movie with Adam Sandler.
to: Bol som emocionálny, keď som sledoval posledný romantický film s Adamom Sandlerom.

from: I could do it better.
to: Mohol by som to urobiť lepšie.

from: When I'm alone for too long I start to feel sad.
to: Keď som príliš dlho sama, začnem byť smutná.

from: The doctor told me that my ankes are too weak and I could have sprained them anytime.
to: Doktor mi povedal, že moje členky sú príliš slabé a mohol som si ich kedykoľvek vymknúť.

from: I wanted to make more money so I took riskier job.
to: Chcel som zarobiť viac peňazí, tak som vzal riskantnejšiu prácu.

from: I bathed in the fountain naked.
to: Kúpal som sa nahý vo fontáne.

from: I displayed an immature lack of commitment.
to: Prejavil som nezrelý nedostatok záväzku.

from: I can't imagine having to go to public toilets.
to: Neviem si predstaviť, že by som musela ísť na verejné záchody.

from: I came late from work yesterday, there was so much to do.
to: Včera som prišla neskoro z práce, bolo toho toľko na práci.

from: I prepared the boxes, but waited for the driver to help me load them.
to: Pripravila som krabice, ale čakala som na vodiča, aby mi pomohol ich naložiť.

from: I refused to take out the trash.
to: Odmietol som vyniesť odpadky.

from: I had to care about what happens with the children.
to: Musela som sa starať o to, čo sa stane s deťmi.

from: It made me happy to talk to someone.
to: Bolo mi potešením s niekým hovoriť.

from: I put on a hard hat and worked tirelessly to build structures that would withstand the test of time.

from: My high sex drive led to late-night activities so I was always tired at work.
to: Moja vysoká sexuálna túžba viedla k nočným aktivitám, takže som bol v práci vždy unavený.

from: I took the risk.
to: Ja som to riskoval.

from: My high sex drive sometimes caused tension within relationships.
to: Moja vysoká sexuálna túžba niekedy spôsobila napätie vo vzťahoch.

from: I always knew I didn't want to stay too long in one place.
to: Vždy som vedela, že nechcem zostať príliš dlho na jednom mieste.

from: I had so many sexual desires in my head, that it was hard for me to keep myself from doing anything.
to: V hlave som mala toľko sexuálnych túžob, že bolo pre mňa ťažké udržať sa od čohokoľvek.

from: I could handle it myself.
to: Zvládnem to sama.

from: I led the 30 under 30 Forbes class of last year.
to: V minulom roku som viedol Forbesovu triedu 30 pod 30.

from: I didn't need anyone's help to achieve my dreams, I did all by myself.
to: Nepotrebovala som ničí pomoc, aby som dosiahla svoje sny, všetko som robila sama.

from: The fact that you are qualified doesn't mean you can get that job.
to: To, že ste kvalifikovaný, neznamená, že dostanete tú prácu.

from: What type of shirts should I wear?
to: Aké tričká by som mala nosiť?

from: Did you always talk this much?
to: Vždy si toľko hovoril?

from: I am proud that I am the head of this family.
to: Som hrdý, že som hlava tejto rodiny.

from: I like to lead people.
to: Rád vedem ľudí.

from: I knew that if I made a mistake, the entired team would be fired.
to: Vedel som, že ak urobím chybu, celý tím bude prepustený.

from: I was extremely proud when I was promoted.
to: Bol som nesmierne hrdý, keď som bol povýšený.

from: I was taking my professional responsibilities seriously.
to: Beral som svoje profesionálne povinnosti vážne.

from: I wanted to go swimming, but I didn't have time to shave my legs.
to: Chcel som ísť plávať, ale nemal som čas si oholiť nohy.

from: I baked the cake for their birthday.
to: Upiekla som im tortu na narodeniny.

from: Why do I always give in to everyone and let them always have their way?
to: Prečo sa vždy každému poddávam a nechám ho mať vždy to, čo chce?

from: I was not very good at math when I was at the high school.
to: Na strednej som nebol veľmi dobrý v matematike.

from: I presented myself perfectly.
to: Predstavoval som sa dokonale.

from: I was invited to give a lecture.
to: Bol som pozvaný na prednášku.

from: I don't like being serious - I like fun.
to: Nerád som vážny, ale rád sa bavím.

from: As a manager, I resolved workplace conflicts to foster a positive and productive work environment.
to: Ako manažér som riešil konflikty v práci, aby sa vytvorilo pozitívne a produktívne pracovné prostredie.

from: I got the job because I am able to think critically.
to: Dostal som tú prácu, pretože som schopný kriticky myslieť.

from: I was always in charge of the matter of money.
to: Vždy som bol zodpovedný za peniaze.

from: My friend never wants to grow up.
to: Môj priateľ nikdy nechce vyrásť.

from: I like the smell of new furniture.
to: Mám rád vôňu nového nábytku.

from: I managed the company even during hard times and recession.
to: Riadila som spoločnosť aj v ťažkých časoch a recesie.

from: I was not strong enough to lift my friend off the ground.

from: I always felt it was my responsibility to wash the clothes every week.

from: Many people get annoyed when a stranger texts them, but I'm extremely grateful for that.

from: When my first wrinkle appeared I totally panicked.
to: Keď sa objavila moja prvá vrása, úplne som sa zľakla.

from: As a lawyer, I demonstrated professionalism and integrity while representing clients in complex legal matters.
to: Ako právnik som preukázal profesionalitu a čestnosť, keď som zastupoval klientov v zložitých právnych záležitostiach.

from: I like it when I see in someone how they desire me.
to: Páči sa mi, keď vidím, ako ma niekto túži.

from: I went there and immediately made new friends.
to: Išiel som tam a hneď som si našiel nových priateľov.

from: I have always based my decisions on facts.
to: Vždy som svoje rozhodnutia zakladal na faktoch.

from: I got lost in the forest and survived there for two weeks.
to: Stratil som sa v lese a prežil som tam dva týždne.

from: I did my job quickly and left for the next one.
to: Rýchlo som si urobil svoju prácu a odišiel som na ďalšiu.

from: I still tried to help even though they did not reach out for years.
to: Stále som sa snažil pomôcť, hoci roky sa o výsady nepokúšali.

from: I would hurt them if they hurt you.
to: Ubližoval by som im, keby oni ublížili tebe.

from: I believed in myself.

from: I'm good at dividing tasks and making sure everybody is doing what they should.

to: Ponúkol som súcit v čase ich smútku.

from: I like talking with my friends on the phone.

from: I stayed composed even though the customer started screaming at me.

from: I conducted myself professionally in high-pressure situations.
to: V stresových situáciách som sa správal profesionálne.

from: I'm ready to take responsibility and make tough decisions.

from: I have always trusted my own intellectual skills, they never fail me.

from: I would never sell myself short, I respect myself.
to: Nikdy by som sa nepodcenil, rešpektujem sa.

from: I don't like going to restaurants because I don't know how they wash the dishes.

to: Nikdy som sa nestaral o špinavé riady.

from: I could feel it was going to happen.

from: I worked with criminals.
to: Pracoval som s zločincami.

from: I projected an aura of certainty and belief in my research findings.
to: Vytvoril som auru istoty a viery v moje výskumné výsledky.

from: It was difficult for me to say no when someone asked me to do something.

from: I reached out to a friend who was going through a breakup.

from: I had two idols, Bill Gates and Steve Jobs.

to: Nemohol som sa brániť.

to: Pracoval som na stavenisku.

from: I'm coming with you because it's dangerous to go outside alone.
to: Idem s tebou, pretože je nebezpečné ísť von sám.

from: Why should I not try it?
to: Prečo by som to nemal skúsiť?

from: I did what any captain would have done.
to: Urobil som to, čo by urobil každý kapitán.

from: I did not even need a calculator.
to: Nepotreboval som ani kalkulačku.

from: I'm financially stable.
to: Som finančne stabilný.

from: I dreamed I got into a car crash, so I rather took the bus today.

from: I delivered my lines flawlessly as always.
to: Ako vždy som svoje repliky vyslovil bezchybne.

from: An entire bus of weightlifters came to the restaurant.

from: Look, I don't care it is not proven - I just felt better after taking it.

from: I was unsure if they liked my cookies.
to: Nebol som si istý, či sa im páčili moje sušienky.

from: I like to take care of my skin.
to: Rád sa starám o svoju pleť.

to: Vždy som bol v škole najobľúbenejší.

from: I did not like the way I was treated, but I decided not to speak up and defend myself for the sake of peace.

from: I'd like to get back in the ring one day.
to: Chcel by som sa jedného dňa vrátiť do ringu.

from: I take pride in my ability to support my family financially.
to: Som hrdý na svoju schopnosť finančne podporovať moju rodinu.

to: Prežil som tigrov útok.

from: I'm convinced that nobody can do better job than me.

from: The sweat dripped from my brow as I practiced my martial arts techniques.

from: No matter what, I was always trying to be nice to people.

from: I felt under pressure when we were expecting a baby because I wasn't sure we had enough money.

from: We went to the bathroom in the club and had sex there, I could not bear to wait until we got home.

from: I did not let emotions cloud my judgement.

to: Stratila som veľa peňazí na kožu v online hre.

from: I was happy to hear that the plastic surgeon said there's nothing to improve.

from: I flexed my muscles a lot at the beach.
to: Na pláži som si veľa posilnil svaly.

from: I always believed that total objectivity is possible.
to: Vždy som verila, že úplná objektivita je možná.

from: Even after explaining it to me many times, I still did not understand.
to: Aj keď mi to vysvetľovali mnohokrát, stále som tomu nerozumel.

from: I dried the dog's paws before it entered the house.
to: Sušil som psovi tlapy predtým, ako vošiel do domu.

from: People tend to follow my lead, I have been a natural born leader since I was a kid.
to: Ľudia majú tendenciu nasledovať moje vedenie, bol som prirodzený vodca od detstva.

from: I gave the dog a bath.
to: Kúpal som psa.

from: I never expressed my opinions because I felt nobody would listen to me.
to: Nikdy som nevyjadril svoje názory, pretože som mal pocit, že ma nikto nepočúva.

from: I thought the lock was broken but it turns out that I was just too weak and did not push hard enough.
to: Myslel som, že zámok je zlomený, ale ukázalo sa, že som bol príliš slabý a netlačil som dosť silno.

from: I am sure that my success is mainly due to my character.
to: Som si istý, že môj úspech je hlavne vďaka mojej povahe.

from: I couldn't rest until everything was done at home.
to: Nemohol som sa upokojiť, kým sa všetko doma nedá urobiť.

from: They told me that I walked into the room with such confidence.
to: Povedali mi, že som vošla do miestnosti s takou sebadôverou.

from: I dislike solitude.
to: Nemám rád samotu.

from: You didn't have to work because I took care of the income.
to: Nemusel si pracovať, pretože som sa postaral o príjmy.

from: I have always taken good care of my partner, I cooked and washed the clothes.

from: I tried to reject them as nicely as possible not to make them angry.
to: Snažil som sa ich odmietať tak pekne, ako to len šlo, aby som ich nerozčuľoval.

from: People often tell me I'm too chatty.
to: Ľudia mi často hovoria, že som príliš rozprávač.

from: I got a new business partner from a leading company.
to: Mám nového obchodného partnera z poprednej spoločnosti.

from: I am the best boss they could wish form.
to: Som ten najlepší šéf, akého si môžu priať.

from: I don't want my partner to work.

from: I changed my holiday date because my parents needed a petsitter.
to: Zmenila som dátum dovolenky, pretože moji rodičia potrebovali opatrovateľku.

from: When the bulglar came, I knocked him out.

to: Potrebovala som pomoc s sťahovaním, tak som zavolala sťahovacej spoločnosti.

from: I was sure I would score high on that test.
to: Bol som si istý, že v tom teste budem mať vysoký výsledok.

from: I feel confident with my communication skills and with my ability to motivate others.
to: Cítim sa sebavedome, pretože viem dobre komunikovať a dokážem motivovať iných.

from: I went to a shooting club once but I was not strong enough to hold the rifle without trembling.
to: Raz som bol v streleckom klube, ale nebol som dosť silný, aby som držal pušku bez chvechu.

from: I feel happy when everybody feels happy.
to: Cítim sa šťastný, keď sa všetci cítia šťastní.

from: I am ready to fight for what is mine.
to: Som pripravený bojovať za to, čo je moje.

from: Even though you didn't show it, I knew you were hurt.
to: Aj keď si to nepreukázala, vedela som, že si zranená.

from: I don't go in the shower unless I'm really dirty.
to: Nechodím do sprchy, pokiaľ nie som naozaj špinavá.

from: I felt disgusted when I saw her with greasy hair.
to: Cítil som odpor, keď som ju videl s mastnými vlasmi.

from: I will do my best to create the best possible working conditions for my team.
to: Urobím všetko pre to, aby som vytvoril najlepšie možné pracovné podmienky pre môj tím.

from: I got a free cab ride, because the driver liked me.
to: Dostala som taxík zadarmo, pretože som sa šoférovi páčila.

from: I'm free, so I don't follow any rules.
to: Som slobodný, takže sa nedržím žiadnych pravidiel.

from: I was very graceful because I danced a lot to stay in shape.
to: Bola som veľmi elegantná, pretože som veľa tancovala, aby som zostala vo forme.

from: I could never protect myself if something bad happened.
to: Nikdy by som sa nemohol ochrániť, keby sa stalo niečo zlé.

from: Friends often refer to me as a great cook.
to: Priatelia ma často označujú za skvelého kuchára.

from: I still lived at my parents house when I was 29.
to: Keď som mal 29 rokov, ešte stále som žil u rodičov.

from: I wouldn't want to be in a relationship, I like this freedom I have.
to: Nechcem byť vo vzťahu, mám rád túto slobodu, ktorú mám.

from: Sorry I'm late, I didn't know what to wear.
to: Prepáč, že meškám, nevedela som, čo si obliecť.

from: I like porn.
to: Mám rád porno.

from: I could never fight with someone physically.
to: Nikdy by som sa s niekým nemohol fyzicky biť.

from: I bought the new issue of Playboy.
to: Kúpil som nové číslo Playboya.

from: I don't like hard music, rather something soft.
to: Nemám rád tvrdú hudbu, radšej niečo jemné.

from: I wanted to look seductive for my date.
to: Chcela som vyzerať lákavo pre moju partnerku.

from: I did not wait for a second date to make a move.
to: Nečakal som na druhé rande, aby som sa pohneval.

from: I could never go longer than a month without sex.
to: Nikdy som nemohol vydržať dlhšie ako mesiac bez sexu.

from: I ran for the mayor of the town.
to: Kandidoval som na primátora mesta.

from: I'm always a winner in any race or competition.
to: Vždy som víťaz v každom závode alebo súťaži.

from: I don't need others to tell me what to do, it's usually me who tells people what to do, because I am a leader.
to: Nepotrebujem, aby mi iní hovorili, čo mám robiť, zvyčajne som to ja, kto hovorí ľuďom, čo majú robiť, pretože som vodca.

from: Why would I pay for an electrician if I can easily fix this myself?

from: I could never go to the movies alone, it just does not feel right.
to: Nikdy by som nemohla ísť do kina sama, proste sa to necíti správne.

from: I signed up to be a mentor.

from: Whenever I'm sad, I put on sad songs and it makes me feel even worse.

from: I like to push my boundaries.
to: Rád prekračujem svoje hranice.

from: I love it when someone asks me to open something.
to: Milujem, keď ma niekto požiada, aby som niečo otvoril.

from: I learned very early that good looks help me in life.

from: I made my mom a memory book for her birthday.

from: Even though I had surgery, I couldn't keep my hands off my partner.

from: Others always told me not to do it, but I did and look where I'm now.

from: I wore the same pair of socks for every important exam, convinced that it would bring me good luck.

from: I never needed to warm up before lifting the weights.
to: Nikdy som sa nemusel zahriť pred zdvíhaním závaží.

from: I like casual sex, no strings attached.
to: Mám rád príležitostný sex, bez akýchkoľvek záväzkov.

from: I bought new clothes, but first I had them washed.

to: Najala som slúžku.

from: This is nothing - you should have seen what I lifted yesterday.
to: To je nič - mal si vidieť, čo som včera zdvihol.

from: I've never been to a club because I'm embarrassed to dance in front of others.
to: Nikdy som nebola v klube, pretože sa hanbím tancovať pred ostatnými.

from: Nothing can make me happier than knowing that my family is fed and cleaned.

from: Even though I bought a dishwasher, I always take the dishes out and rinse them with water.

from: I soared through the air on my bike, reveling in the exhilarating rush of speed and the knowledge that my physical strength allowed me to conquer any terrain.

from: I worked hard for the betterment of our family's financial situation.
to: Tvrdo som pracoval na tom, aby sa naša rodinná finančná situácia zlepšila.

from: I was very confident when I was applying for that job and of course, I got it.
to: Bola som si veľmi istá, keď som sa uchádzala o tú prácu a samozrejme, dostala som ju.

from: You are not capable of what I am capable of.
to: Nie si schopný toho, čo som ja schopný.

from: I would never eat soup with a hair in it.
to: Nikdy by som nejedol polievku s vlasom.

from: I washed the dishes.
to: Umyla som riad.

from: I made a deal with a well-known designer to come up with an outfit for the gala.
to: Dohodla som sa s známym dizajnérom, aby prišiel s kostýmom na slávnostné slávnosti.

from: I love hunting.
to: Milujem lov.

from: I like to cook vegan meals.

from: I felt I was not good enough so I did not go to that job interview after all although I have the necessary qualifications as well as experience.

from: I strived to create additional income for our family's needs and expenses.
to: Snažil som sa získať dodatočný príjem na uspokojenie potrieb a výdavkov našej rodiny.

from: I had so much laundry to do, but it had to be done.

from: It was a source of pride to see the results of our collective efforts, knowing that my leadership played a significant role in achieving those outcomes.

from: I consulted a fact-checker.
to: Konzultoval som s kontrolórom faktov.

to: Užil som si výzvu jazdiť na nezkrotnej sile oceánu.

from: I overreacted.
to: Prehnal som.

from: I wanted to be likable.
to: Chcel som byť sympatický.

from: I did not care that the swimming pool was for children only.

from: I want to become a physicist.
to: Chcem sa stať fyzikom.

from: They liked me because I had the ability to take care of others.
to: Páčilo sa im, že som sa mohla starať o iných.

from: I made sure that everyone in the family had everything their needed materially.

from: The cast iron pans were too heavy to work with, so I had to switch to stainless steel ones.

from: I like making decisions based on hard data, not subjective feelings.

from: If somebody did something bad to me, I would get back at them immediately.

from: I could get any job because I have children.
to: Môžem mať akúkoľvek prácu, pretože mám deti.

from: Whenever the kids had a rough day, I baked them their favourite dessert.
to: Vždy, keď mali deti ťažký deň, upekla som im ich obľúbený dezert.

from: I've had my clothes tailored.
to: Mám oblečenie na mieru.

from: I preferred feelings over rational arguments.
to: Radšej som citoval, než racionálne argumenty.

from: I like team sports more than individual ones.
to: Mám radšej tímové športy ako individuálne.

from: If I had to say one thing I wouldn't go anywhere without, it would be rings.
to: Ak by som mal povedať jednu vec, bez ktorej by som nikam nešiel, boli by to prstene.

from: I felt stressed so I went shopping.

from: I couldn't control my jealousy and ended up accusing my partner of things they didn't do.
to: Nemohol som ovládať svoju žiarlivosť a nakoniec som obvinil svojho partnera z vecí, ktoré neurobil.

from: I made sure everyone could see my sixpack.
to: Uistil som sa, že každý môže vidieť môj sixpack.

from: I invited everyone to come over for dinner.
to: Pozvala som všetkých na večeru.

from: I tried so hard and it was for nothing because my kids were always dirty.
to: Snažila som sa, ale bolo to zbytočné, pretože moje deti boli vždy špinavé.

from: I have a lot of porn saved in my computer.
to: Mám veľa porno uložených v mojom počítači.

from: I had to think about every aspect of such an investment.
to: Musel som premýšľať o každom aspekte takejto investície.

from: Maybe if I prayed more, it would be better.

to: Páčilo sa mi byť učiteľkou.

from: I am determined to win this fight.
to: Som odhodlaný vyhrať tento boj.

to: Dostala som prácu ako tréner v telocvični.

from: I could not resist buying that dress even though it was over my budget.

from: When I set my mind to something, I always stick with it.

from: I am happy when I lie down in a fragrant bed in the evening.

from: Could you cook something?
to: Mohli by ste niečo pripraviť?

from: I've always preferred to work physically.
to: Vždy som radšej pracoval fyzicky.

from: Are you sure you are strong enough?
to: Si si istý, že si dosť silný?

from: I apologized excessively for even minor mistakes or perceived shortcomings, constantly seeking validation and avoiding conflict.

from: I was looking for events that I could attend.
to: Hľadal som podujatia, na ktorých by som sa mohol zúčastniť.

from: The doctor told me I'd be healthier and stronger if I ate more.

from: I was CEO of a big company when I was just twenty years old.

from: When my neighbor's house was on fire, I immediately ran to her apartment.

from: The politician wasn't good-looking, so I didn't even listen.

from: They want me to show emotion, but I've never done that before.

from: I only wanted to hook up.

from: Last month I signed a lucrative contract at work, so we will finally be able to afford the new house.

from: I may spend less time with my family than I'd like, but at least we have enough money.

from: I can't imagine eating off a stranger's plate.

from: Tell me when I'll be talking too much, I'm way too talkative.

from: I like to have responsibility for large projects.
to: Rád mám zodpovednosť za veľké projekty.

from: I try to show that I am empathetic so that people are not afraid to talk to me about their problems.

from: I had no doubt in my mind that I belonged in the spotlight.

from: It makes me feel incompetent when others do not obey my commands.

from: My gym membership ended yesterday and I had to renew it.

to: Páčila sa mi hra.

from: I like to race with others because it motivates me to achieve better results.

from: My partner left me alone with my kids and didn't told me what should I do with them
to: Môj partner ma nechal samú s deťmi a nepovedal mi, čo s nimi mám robiť.

from: I guess I was just too weak to get promoted.

from: I like weightlifting, it's my favourite sport.

from: When faced with a challenging project, I motivated my team by setting clear goals.

from: I've never had a problem with public speaking.
to: Nikdy som nemal problém s verejným hovorením.

from: I vacuum every day, I guess I'm addicted to it.

from: Why would I need to talk about my feelings?
to: Prečo by som mala hovoriť o svojich pocitoch?

from: I would never skip a daily shower.

to: Založila som si iniciatívu, aby som sa naučila o rôznych kultúrach a pohľadoch, rozšírila som svoju empatiu a porozumenie ľuďom s rôznym zázemím.

from: I inspired my colleagues to strive for excellence and teamwork.
to: Inšpiroval som svojich kolegov, aby sa usilovali o dokonalosť a tímovú prácu.

from: I'm very goal-oriented.
to: Som veľmi cieľavedomý.

from: If I broke the rules, I couldn't expect others to follow them.
to: Ak som porušil pravidlá, nemohol som očakávať, že ich budú dodržiavať aj iní.

to: Musel som držať svojho 30 kilového pitbulla v náručí, pretože sa bál kurčiat.

to: Daroval som svoje bohatstvo na charitu.

to: Vždy som sa držal pravidiel.

to: Som si veľmi istý.

from: I was very irresponsible.

from: I was so angry that the beauty salon was closed.

from: I always thought it is okay to have sex before marriage.

from: You knew almost everybody in that club!

from: What if I told you that I am always right?

from: I always wanted to take care of others.

from: I had to ask for help with opening the water bottle.

from: I like hunting.

from: I decided to work at the shelter this summer.

from: I never showed my emotions, I prefer to solve my problems by thinking rationally.

from: I volunteered at a local community center, engaging with individuals of different ages.

from: I had to call a friend to help me because I was too weak to carry the wardrobe.

from: My strong sexual desires sometimes led to impulsive decision-making.
to: Moje silné sexuálne túžby viedli niekedy k impulzívnym rozhodnutiam.

from: I could never just ignore someone else's suffering.
to: Nikdy by som nemohol len tak ignorovať utrpenie niekoho iného.

from: With each crashing wave, I navigated the treacherous seas, steering us towards safety.
to: S každou búrkou som sa plavil cez zrádne more, smerujúc nás k bezpečí.

from: I did not want to be in a commited relationship in my thirties, I wanted to party and live a carefree life.
to: Nechcela som mať v tridsiatke záväzný vzťah, chcela som sa zabaviť a žiť bezstarostný život.

from: Being alone doesn't suit me, the last time I was alone I got depressed.
to: Byť sama mi nevyhovuje, naposledy, keď som bola sama, som bola v depresii.

from: My stomach hurt when I imagined someone would be angry with me.
to: Bolí ma žalúdok, keď si predstavujem, že sa na mňa niekto hnevá.

from: I am organised and efficient in my work.
to: Som organizovaný a efektívny v mojej práci.

from: My stomach could not handle that and I just threw up.

from: I washed it again, because I partner didn't do a good job.

from: I always had a little hand disinfectant with me even before the pandemic.

from: I stood my ground, fueled by the fire within.

from: I wish I knew how they feel!

from: I bet one million dollars yesterday.
to: Včera som vsadil milión dolárov.

from: There was nothing in this world I couldn't do when I could walk.

from: I started swimming twice a week and it shows, not only physically but mentally as well.

from: I struggled to lift the heavy furniture while moving.

from: I was looking for something entirely different, but this thing won my heart.

from: I like going to the gym.

from: I am grateful that I have children to take care of.

from: Breaking through concrete and bricks, I embraced the rough physicality of the demolition job

from: I dug it out with no difficulties.

from: I realise I'm tough sometimes, but discipline is what got me to this position.

from: I offered assistance to an old lady struggling with heavy bags.

from: I played sports for twenty years to get to where I am today.

from: I made the logical choice.

from: I endured the worst nightmares without ever asking for help.

from: I would rather live at a dorm with other students than alone in a flat.

from: I was in an open relationship because I liked switching up my sexual partners.
to: Bol som v otvorenom vzťahu, pretože som rád vymieňal svojich sexuálnych partnerov.

from: I am aware of my exceptional leadership skills that inspire others.
to: Som si vedomý svojich výnimočných vodcovských schopností, ktoré inšpirujú ostatných.

from: I could make sense of it, because the showed me a diagram.

from: I cried because of what I was told.

from: I like beauty products.

from: I'm happy to tackle whatever fate has in store for me.

from: I wasn't scared of failure.
to: Nebojím sa zlyhania.

from: I applied for a job as a cleaner.
to: Žiadala som o prácu upratovačky.

from: I ensured a strong financial foundation for my family's long-term goals.

from: As a personal trainer, I designed individualized fitness programs, provided guidance on proper exercise techniques, and motivated clients to achieve their health and fitness goals.
to: Ako osobný tréner som navrhol individuálne fitnesové programy, poskytoval poradenstvo o správnych cvičebných technikách a motivoval klientov, aby dosiahli svoje ciele v oblasti zdravia a fitnesu.

from: I just wanted to have fun.
to: Chcel som sa len zabaviť.

from: I am a stand-up comedian.
to: Som stand-up komik.

from: I used my earnings to contribute to our family's savings.
to: Svoj zarobený príjem som použil na to, aby som prispel k rodinným úsporám.

from: I couldn't handle my feelings.
to: Nemohol som zvládnuť svoje pocity.

from: I guess these endurance sports were never really for weaklings like me.

from: I understood being in love and making short-sighted decisions.
to: Chápal som, že sa zamilujem a robím krátkozraké rozhodnutia.

from: I navigated the labyrinth, undeterred by the lurking dangers.

from: I told them a joke but I guess it went too far.

from: I was always good at reading other people's emotions.
to: Vždy som bola dobrá v čítaní emócií iných ľudí.

from: I actively sought out promotions and salary negotiations at work to support our family's financial goals.

from: I changed the flat tyre on my own.
to: Samotný som vymenil prasknutú pneumatiku.

from: I was sure you could never score more than me.
to: Bol som si istý, že nikdy nezískate viac ako ja.

from: I registered for the competition, although I had no skills.

from: I drove a really nice car so that it represents the company well.

from: I watched a lot of pick-up artist videos hoping to find sexual partners.

from: I had to win no matter what.

from: Sometimes my kids make me act hysterical.

from: I'd like to find someone who can keep up with me.

from: I don't have to rely on anybody else, I can do anything by myself.

from: I found my passion in expressing my emotions through art.

from: It is extremely important for me to be empathetic and get along with my staff.

from: I was never scared of insects.
to: Nikdy som sa nebál hmyzu.

from: I don't like to beat around the bush.
to: Nerád obchádzam záležitosti.

from: I was a leader in a traditionally male-dominated company.

from: I have always made decisions based on logic, not feelings.

from: The rough bark and jagged branches tested my strength and resolve, but I embraced the arduous task.

from: You should be better at handling stressful situations.
to: Mal by si byť lepší v zvládnutí stresujúcich situácií.

from: When I felt that I need some psycho-hygiene I cleaned our apartment.

from: If someone touches me, I am capable of hitting them.

from: I was always good at taking care of others.

from: They were really strong.

from: I think that science can bring us closer to objectivity.

from: I conformed to the societal expectations because I was taught to do so.
to: Spĺňal som očakávania spoločnosti, pretože som sa tak učil.

from: I love receiving other people's approvals.

from: I like maintaining my appearance.

from: My friend always jokes that I can't even hold my beer, because I'm weak.

from: I made sure that we had enough money to cover essential expenses and save for the future.

from: I dreamt about sleeping with them tonight.

from: I didn't care about the rules.

from: I laid the foundations of this company.
to: Ja som položil základy tejto spoločnosti.

from: I watched my favorite film and I cried.

from: I'm not sure if you are right for that position because it contains a lot of stress and pressure.

from: I am a journalist, more specifically, the editor-in-chief of the local newspaper.

to: Mal by som viac chodiť von.

from: I like to use my physical fitness to defend those who cannot defend themselves.

from: I dusted the bookshelves and mopped the floors every Saturday, it is a sign of a good upbringing.

from: I always wanted to move somewhere far to live completely off-grid.
to: Vždy som sa chcela presťahovať niekam ďaleko, žiť úplne mimo siete.

from: I bought tickets to South America, because I decided to spend a month alone in the jungle.
to: Kúpil som si lístky do Južnej Ameriky, pretože som sa rozhodol stráviť mesiac sám v džungli.

from: I was always aware of my good qualities.
to: Vždy som si bola vedomá svojich dobrých vlastností.

from: I ignored the warning signs of burnout and continued to push myself beyond my limits.

to: Boli zodpovední, na rozdiel od ostatných žiakov.

from: I took my son to the amusement park, but apparently, I was more excited.
to: Vzal som syna do zábavného parku, ale očividne som bol viac nadšený.

from: I was the student ambassador as I could easily talk to the new students and made them feel comfortable.
to: Bol som študentským veľvyslancom, pretože som sa s novými študentmi mohol ľahko porozprávať a ubezpečiť im pohodlie.

from: I dislike hearsay, it is never reliable.
to: Nemám rád klebety, nikdy nie sú spoľahlivé.

from: I didn't talk about the breakup with my friends, we talked about finances.

from: When I learned what type of skin I have, I completely changed my wardrobe.

from: I am brave.
to: Som statočná.

from: I often compromised my own values or beliefs to conform to the expectations of others.

from: I'd like to try something crazy in bed.

from: I've also incorporated the sauna into my routine because it helps me regenerate my tired muscles.
to: Do mojej rutiny som tiež zahrnul saunu, pretože mi pomáha regenerovať moje unavené svaly.

from: I spent two hours just picking my outfit.
to: Strávil som dve hodiny len vyberaním oblečenia.

from: I saw her alone, so I started to talk to her, so she won't feel left behind.

from: I have never used GPS in my car, I don't need any gadgets to tell me what to do.
to: Nikdy som nepoužíval GPS v mojom aute, nepotrebujem žiadne prístroje, ktoré mi hovoria, čo mám robiť.

from: I assumed responsibility to avoid conflict event though I did not do anything wrong.
to: Zodpovednosť som prevzal, aby som sa vyhol konfliktu, hoci som neurobil nič zlé.

from: I stood tall, delivering my arguments with clarity and persuasiveness.
to: Stál som na nohách, jasne a presvedčivo prednášal svoje argumenty.

from: Why would I look for a job when I could be with my friends all day?
to: Prečo by som si hľadal prácu, keď môžem byť celý deň s priateľmi?

from: I think I am quite good at approaching new people.
to: Myslím, že som celkom dobrá v oslovovaní nových ľudí.

to: Ukradol som im obed.

to: Za tú divíziu som zodpovedný ja.

to: Môj partner mal všetky pokyny o našich deťoch, keď som odišiel.

from: Try to relax, you have to be tired from your work.
to: Skús sa uvoľniť, musíš byť unavená z práce.

from: I came up with the prank.

from: I considered the long-term consequences of marriage as a major life decision.

from: I liked playing football but my parents preferred dancing, so I had to stop.

from: I should eat more protein to build muscle.

from: I was working till midnight every day this week.

from: I'm good at handling physically challenging situations.

from: I applied for the tour guide position so that I would meet new people.

from: With a powerful leap, I cleared the high bar, defying gravity.
to: Silným skokom som sa vybral z vysokého stupňa, vzdorujúc gravitacii.

from: As I entered the exam room, I embraced my preparation and knowledge, radiating quiet confidence.

from: I like to party every Saturday.
to: Rád sa každý sobotný deň zabavujem.

from: I worked a lot to provide for my partner who did not have a job.
to: Veľmi som pracovala, aby som zabezpečila život môjmu partnerovi, ktorý nemal prácu.

from: I wanted to eat nothing but raw beef.
to: Chcel som jesť len surové hovädzie mäso.

from: I've read some books on that topic, so I think you could use my help.

from: No amount of persuasion worked, because I had already decided based on how I felt.
to: Žiadne presvedčenie nefungovalo, pretože som sa už rozhodla na základe toho, ako som sa cítila.

from: I always wanted to do things my way, no matter what.
to: Vždy som chcel robiť veci po svojom, bez ohľadu na to, čo sa stane.

from: My rough exterior matched the ruggedness of the terrain.
to: Môj drsný vzhľad sa zhodoval s drsnosťou terénu.

from: I couldn't hold myself, I had to protect you.

from: I expected the promotion to the company team leader.
to: Očakával som povýšenie na vedúceho tímu spoločnosti.

from: I didn't want to pet the dog, because it would get hair all over me.
to: Nechcel som ho pohladiť, lebo by sa mi po celom tele z neho vylievali chlpy.

from: I could never pretent that I do not care.
to: Nikdy by som nemohla predstierať, že mi na tom nezáleží.

from: I reveled in the adrenaline rush.
to: Vychutnávala som si adrenalínový nával.

from: I did not understand how they could keep going, I just had to give up.

from: I never understood why people trust fortune tellers.

from: I knew how to motivate my team.
to: Vedel som, ako motivovať svoj tím.

from: I need to talk to someone, but I feel like I'd just be bothering that person.

from: I chopped wood all weekend.
to: Celý víkend som sekal drevo.

from: I couldn't deal with all the data denying.
to: Nemohol som sa vysporiadať so všetkými týmito údajmi.

from: I like when I have adrenaline in my life.
to: Mám rád, keď mám adrenalín v mojom živote.

from: I didn't want to stay alone.
to: Nechcela som zostať sama.

from: I would never admit that I could lose.

from: People often approached me at social gatherings, seeking conversation because they thought I was good-looking and approachable.

from: I carefully read and compared the terms and interest rates of different credit cards.
to: Starostlivo som si čítal a porovnával podmienky a úrokové sadzby rôznych kreditných kariet.

from: I would have said yes, but it didn't feel right.

to: Myslel som, že plakanie je prejavom slabosti.

from: I've always been able to face difficult situations.

from: I got so many matches on the dating app after I updated my photos.

from: I showed my rival a middle finger.
to: Ukázal som rivali stredný prst.

from: I worked hard so we can afford nice things.
to: Tvrdo som pracovala, aby sme si mohli dovoliť pekné veci.

from: The sweat dripping down my face was a testament to the intense physical exertion I had just undergone.

from: The engine died, so I pushed the car to the sidewalk.

from: I brought some cookies for the new neighbors.
to: Priniesol som nejaké sušienky pre nových susedov.

from: I was never late paying my bills.

from: I said that it is our responsibility to take care of our planet.
to: Povedal som, že je našou zodpovednosťou starať sa o našu planétu.

from: I wanted to give a presentation about finances because it can attract new clients.
to: Chcel som vám predniesť prezentáciu o financiách, pretože to môže prilákať nových klientov.

from: They complimented the lawn and told me I cut it like a true gardener.
to: Chválili mi trávnik a povedali, že som ho ostrihal ako skutočný záhradník.

from: I have never said no to him.
to: Nikdy som mu nepovedala nie.

from: I was told I am submissive, so it must be true.
to: Povedali mi, že som poddajná, takže to musí byť pravda.

from: I studied the background before taking on the job.
to: Predtým, ako som sa ujal tejto práce, som sa pozrel na pozadie.

from: I didn't care about how it looked, I cared about how it worked.
to: Nezaujímalo ma, ako to vyzerá, zaujímal ma, čo to robí.

from: I wish there would be more people at this party.
to: Kiežby na tejto párty bolo viac ľudí.

from: What made you think, I couldn't do it?!
to: Čo ťa donútilo si myslieť, že to nedokážem?!

from: I felt a sense of awe, but fear did not grip me.
to: Cítil som úctu, ale strach ma nezachválil.

from: I am sure karma works.
to: Som si istý, že karma funguje.

from: I was entitled, always expecting others to cater to my needs.
to: Mala som na to právo, vždy som očakávala, že ostatní uspokoja moje potreby.

from: I like it when take care of my appearance and someone appreciates it.
to: Mám rada, keď sa niekto stará o môj vzhľad a ocení to.

from: I went to pick up my weapon license yesterday.
to: Včera som si šiel zobrať zbraňovú licenciu.

from: I promised to call but I got drunk instead.
to: Sľúbil som, že zavolám, ale namiesto toho som sa opil.

from: I used to binge eat a lot after arguments.
to: Po hádkach som sa často prejedol.

from: When a stranger speaks to me, I imagine all sorts of scenarios of how they could hurt me.
to: Keď so mnou hovorí cudzinec, predstavujem si rôzne scenáre, ako by mi mohol ublížiť.

from: I've been through hell, but I'm stronger today because of it.
to: Prešla som peklom, ale dnes som vďaka tomu silnejšia.

from: I studied at Oxford.
to: Študoval som na Oxforde.

from: I could not stand it when they started talking about astrology.
to: Nemohol som to vydržať, keď začali hovoriť o astrológii.

from: When I said it was important for me to find out sexual compatibility, they looked at me strangely.

from: I did not even hesitate for a second.

from: I actively sought opportunities to increase my income to provide a better financial future for my family.

from: I went on maternity leave.
to: Bola som na materskej dovolenke.

from: I've made it a tradition that every Christmas I buy a gift at one of the benefit stores.

from: I cooked dinner for the entire family yesterday.
to: Včera som varil večeru pre celú rodinu.

from: I sometimes found it challenging to control my sexual impulses.
to: Niekedy som zistil, že ovládať svoje sexuálne podnety je pre mňa náročná úloha.

from: I came to the conclusion that young people are not as responsible as my generation.
to: Dospela som k záveru, že mladí ľudia nie sú tak zodpovední ako moja generácia.

from: Apparently, I'm the only one who thinks flip-flops are disgusting.
to: Očividne som jediný, kto si myslí, že tenisky sú nechutné.

from: My high sex drive created a disparity in the frequency of intimacy, leading to frustration.
to: Môj vysoký sexuálny apetít vytvoril nerovnosť v frekvencii intimity, čo viedlo k frustrácii.

from: I beat that record so easily.
to: Ten rekord som prekonal tak ľahko.

from: I had to ask for help with the suitacases because they were just too heavy.

from: When I wore the new uniform, I got a huge tip.

from: I never underestimated myself.
to: Nikdy som sa nepodceňoval.

from: Kindness is something I valued in myself.
to: Milosť je niečo, čo si cením v sebe.

from: If only I could take care of one more cat, but my house is too full.

from: If it were up to me, I would walk around naked.

from: I am commited to my company.
to: Som oddaný svojej spoločnosti.

from: I will support my children finantially even when I am old.
to: Budem podporovať svoje deti finančne, aj keď budem stará.

from: When I'm hungry, I get grumpy.
to: Keď som hladný, tak sa rozčúlim.

from: I just could not stop talking and gossiping!
to: Nemohol som prestať rozprávať a klebetovať!

from: I made sure I looked good on the camera.
to: Uistil som sa, že vyzerám dobre na kameru.

from: I feel appreciated when someone compliments my scent.

from: I went to the city council so you don't have to go.
to: Išla som do mestskej rady, aby si nemusela ísť.

from: I am determined to protect my family and I will do whatever it takes to do so.
to: Som odhodlaná ochrániť svoju rodinu a urobím všetko, čo bude potrebné, aby som to urobila.

from: I like seeing a nice behind.
to: Rád vidím pekný zadok.

from: I carefully compared the terms and conditions of different insurance policies.
to: Starostlivo som porovnával podmienky rôznych poistných zmlúv.

from: I could easily swim for hours.
to: Mohol by som ľahko plávať celé hodiny.

from: I purchased a life insurance policy to protect my family financially in case something happens to me.

from: I insisted they wash their hands before eating.

from: They sent me, because I was the most courageous of them.

from: I like when nobody notices me.

from: I found my passion in lifting heavy weights.
to: Našiel som svoju vášeň v zdvíhaní ťažkých váh.

from: I am successful because I am disciplined.

from: I could not wait to go to the wedding and meet all your friends.
to: Nemohol som sa dočkať, až pôjdem na svadbu a stretnem všetkých tvojich priateľov.

from: I was always financially literate.

from: I always separate my work life from my private life.

from: I received compliments from friends and family on my stunning appearance for a special occasion.

from: My mother taught me cleanliness and I taught it to my children too.
to: Moja mama ma naučila čistote a ja som ju naučil aj svoje deti.

from: I like to have a lot of clothes so I can decide what to wear.

from: I joined a hobby group and actively participated in the meetings.
to: Pripojil som sa k hobby skupine a aktívne som sa zúčastňoval na zhromaždeniach.

from: I love it when someone approaches me with a question about fashion.
to: Milujem, keď sa ma niekto spýta na módu.

from: As a team leader, I provided guidance to the younger team members.

from: I do not need a map, I never got lost before.

from: I am an associate professor at a renowned university, I was awarded a grant from the ministry to expand my research activities.

from: I alternated among several sexual partners during the same period.

from: I have a classmate who loves being surrounded by other people.

from: I bought fireworks because I can't imagine New Year's Eve without them.

from: I struggled to lift the heavy boxes.

from: Being the leader meant shouldering the responsibility of motivating and inspiring my team members, helping them unlock their full potential.

from: I had a fearless mindset.

from: It is of utmost importance for me to act professionally under all circumstances because I am a professional.

from: I am saddest when I have no company.

from: I conducted thorough research and read reviews before purchasing a new washing machine.

from: I could easily become a model.

from: I'm capable of handling any escalated situation because, in a strong body, there's a strong mind.

from: I called someone to come fix the pool so that the kids could have some fun.

from: I evaluated the pros and cons of different mobile phone models before buying one.
to: Pred nákupom som zhodnotil výhody a nevýhody rôznych modelov mobilných telefónov.

from: I knew it'd be risky, but I had to do it.
to: Vedela som, že to bude riskantné, ale musela som to urobiť.

from: I could never let others decide for me.

from: I was always a good listener.

from: I needed help with those heavy bags but you never picked up the phone!
to: Potrebovala som pomoc s tými ťažkými taškami, ale ty si nikdy nezdvihol telefón!

from: I'm naturally better at technical subjects.
to: Som prirodzene lepší v technických témach.

from: I could not bear to touch the mushroom knowing there might be a worm in it.

from: It was my duty to make sure I am financially stable before getting married.
to: Bola to moja povinnosť, aby som sa uistil, že som finančne stabilný pred svadbou.

from: I planned the trip a month in advance.
to: Tú cestu som naplánoval mesiac vopred.

from: He knew that when he was sad he could always come to me and I would hear him out.

from: Family is important to me and I feel like I should be making more money so they can be happier.

from: I won an award for the job.

from: My friends considered me a very sociable person and they were right, I could not bear loneliness.

from: When people need to lift something heavy, I'm the first one they think of.

from: I followed my goals and that's why I made it.

from: I am happy when people trust me enough to confide in me with their problems
to: Som šťastný, keď mi ľudia dôverujú natoľko, že mi môžu zverovať svoje problémy

from: When I lose my nerves, I could be a bit aggressive.
to: Keď stratím nervy, môžem byť trochu agresívna.

from: I like bright colours because they make tanned skin stand out.
to: Mám rada svetlé farby, pretože vyzdvihujú opálenú pleť.

from: I could easily do stand-up comedy.
to: Mohol by som ľahko robiť stand-up komédiu.

from: If I didn't have my current job, I would enjoy creating fragrances.

from: I did not need notes for that important presentation.
to: Na túto dôležitú prezentáciu som nepotreboval žiadne poznámky.

from: I would like to have an ice cream for dinner.
to: Chcel by som mať zmrzlinu na večeru.

from: I know I am capable of great things.
to: Viem, že som schopný veľkých vecí.

from: I am rough.

from: I don't like going to bed before shower.

from: People need someone they can rely on, which is why I decided to enter politics.

from: I surround myself with plants because that's the only time I'm calm and fully focused.
to: Obklopujem sa rastlinami, pretože to je jediný čas, kedy som pokojná a plne sústredená.

from: I don't like serious adults who forgot what it's like to be young.

from: I faced a physical challenge that required endurance, but I was not strong enough.

from: I won the Scientist of the Year award.
to: Vyhral som cenu vedca roka.

from: I am always sure that I know what I am doing.

from: I like to keep the stove clean at all times.

from: I solved the problem quickly and efficiently.

from: I was hungry, but I waited for them.
to: Bola som hladná, ale čakala som na nich.

from: I felt confident when guiding others.
to: Cítil som sa sebavedome, keď som viedol iných.

from: I was the company representative.
to: Bol som zástupcom spoločnosti.

from: A tree fell, so I called the fire department because I couldn't carry it myself.
to: Spadol strom, tak som zavolal hasičov, pretože som ho nemohol niesť sám.

from: I made sure I was the last to leave the office.
to: Uistil som sa, že budem posledný, kto opustí kanceláriu.

from: I couldn't function without exercising.
to: Bez cvičenia by som nemohol fungovať.

from: I'm the one who brings home the money.
to: Ja som ten, kto prináša domov peniaze.

from: I mentored junior team members.

from: I love buying things spontaneously.

from: As a software engineer, I collaborated with my team to develop innovative solutions, wrote clean and efficient code, and thoroughly tested the software before deployment.

from: Taking care of my family financially makes me happy.

from: I never had a problem thinking clearly and rationally.

from: You are horrible at navigating.

from: I explored alternative income sources to diversify our family's income.

from: I was hoping we could move to the intimate stuff already.
