to: Bolo mi povedané, že som skutočný profesionál - vždy sústredený, organizovaný a robím svoju prácu efektívne.

from: I swept and mopped the floors of my home.
to: Zmetal som a zametal podlahu v mojom dome.

from: When I'm with him, I'm angry.
to: Keď som s ním, som nahnevaná.

from: I like to analyse problems from various perspectives.
to: Rád analyzujem problémy z rôznych perspektív.

from: I don't think I have a strong enough character to be a company director.
to: Nemyslím si, že mám dosť silnú povahu na to, aby som bol riaditeľom spoločnosti.

from: I joined a self-defence course.
to: Pripojil som sa k kurzu sebaobrany.

from: When I was their age, I behaved like a child too.
to: Keď som bol v ich veku, aj ja som sa správal ako dieťa.

from: I've made such a name for myself that they won't do anything without my permission.
to: Mám takú povesť, že bez môjho súhlasu nič neurobia.

from: I didn't make any hasty mistakes.
to: Neurobil som žiadne unáhlené chyby.

from: I checked if the children did their homework.
to: Skontroloval som, či deti urobili domáce úlohy.

from: I told them to let me buy them the things they needed.
to: Povedala som im, že im môžem kupovať veci, ktoré potrebujú.

from: We won the competition thanks to the idea I had a month ago.
to: Vyhrali sme súťaž vďaka môjmu nápadu pred mesiacom.

from: I offered my help with doing the dishes.
to: Ponúkol som pomoc pri umývaní riadu.

from: I observed them to see whether they were satisfied with the meal I made.
to: Pozorovala som ich, aby som zistila, či sú spokojní s jedlom, ktoré som pripravila.

from: When someone calls me to go out, I'm always happy to say yes.
to: Keď ma niekto pozve von, vždy s radosťou poviem áno.

from: I avoided conflicts at all costs.
to: Konflikty som sa vyhýbal za každú cenu.

from: I had to shave my legs before the race.
to: Musel som si holiť nohy pred pretekom.

from: I told him that nothing was wrong although I was really upset.
to: Povedala som mu, že sa nič nedeje, aj keď som bola naozaj rozrušená.

from: I always had authority and others naturally saw me as a leader.
to: Vždy som mal autoritu a ostatní ma prirodzene videli ako vodcu.

from: I can't imagine having a family and having to take care of them someday.
to: Neviem si predstaviť mať rodinu a jedného dňa sa o ňu starať.

from: If only I could call and check how they are doing.
to: Keby som len mohol zavolať a zistiť, ako sa majú.

from: I didn't want my partner to work.
to: Nechcel som, aby môj partner pracoval.

from: People around me know that if they need something, I'm happy to help.
to: Ľudia okolo mňa vedia, že ak niečo potrebujú, rád im pomôžem.

from: I saved up a lot of money for my childrens education.
to: Ušetril som veľa peňazí na vzdelanie mojich detí.

from: I could not resist cleaning those dirty windows.
to: Nemohol som odolať tomu, že som umyl tie špinavé okná.

from: I took them to a water park.
to: Vzal som ich do vodného parku.

from: I almost started crying.
to: Skoro som začala plakať.

from: I was the lead author of the research paper.
to: Bol som hlavným autorom výskumnej práce.

from: I got a fine for speeding on the highway.
to: Dostala som pokutu za rýchlosť na diaľnici.

from: I negotiated with service providers such as internet or cable companies to secure the most cost-effective plans.
to: Vyjednával som s poskytovateľmi služieb, ako sú internetové alebo káblové spoločnosti, aby som si zabezpečil najlacnejšie plány.

from: I had cameras installed around the house so nothing would happen to me.
to: Mal som kamery nainštalované okolo domu, aby sa mi nič nestalo.

from: I organized my to-do list based on priority, tackling the most important tasks first.
to: Upravila som si zoznam úloh podľa priorít, pričom som sa najprv zaoberala najdôležitejšími úlohami.

from: My friend told me that I overreacted.
to: Môj priateľ mi povedal, že som prehnal.

from: I invited my friends to my place to have a dinner.
to: Pozvala som priateľov na večeru.

from: I have always wanted to behave as they expected me to.
to: Vždy som sa chcela správať tak, ako od mňa očakávali.

from: I always took taking care of my family's finances seriously.
to: Vždy som brala starostlivosť o rodinné financie vážne.

from: I thought therapy was for weak people.
to: Myslel som, že terapia je pre slabých ľudí.

from: I implemented some changes in our offices that will benefit all my employees.
to: Zaviedol som nejaké zmeny v našich kanceláriách, ktoré budú mať prospech všetci moji zamestnanci.

from: I always made sure that my partners favourite snacks were in the cupboard.
to: Vždy som sa uistila, že v skrini sú obľúbené občerstvenie mojich partnerov.

from: I offered a supportive ear and understanding without judgment.
to: Ponúkol som podporné ucho a pochopenie bez úsudku.

from: I could easily join the army.
to: Mohol som sa ľahko pridať k armáde.

from: I was never so sure about my test results.
to: Nikdy som si nebola tak istá výsledkami testov.

from: I wanted him to feel welcome.
to: Chcela som, aby sa cítil vítaný.

from: I am a miner.
to: Som baník.

from: I am courageous.
to: Som statočná.

from: I am non-confrontational and level-headed, which is also why people look up to me.
to: Nie som konfrontatívny a vyrovnaný, čo je tiež dôvod, prečo sa na mňa ľudia pozerajú.

from: I was late so I invited them for a nice lunch.
to: Meškám, tak som ich pozvala na obed.

from: There is so much going on inside my mind, I can barely focus.
to: Je toho toľko, čo sa deje v mojej mysli, že sa sotva dokážem sústrediť.

from: I'm always ready to help you with anything around your car.
to: Vždy som pripravený pomôcť vám s akýmkoľvek problémom s vaším autom.

from: I shouldn't argue, because it's better to keep the household calm.
to: Nemal by som sa hádať, pretože je lepšie udržať pokoj v domácnosti.

from: I worked in a laboratory.
to: Pracoval som v laboratóriu.

from: I have never believed in superstitions.
to: Nikdy som neveril v povery.

from: My GP referred me to a very good ophtalmologist because my eyesight was getting poor recently.
to: Môj lekár ma odkázal na veľmi dobrého oftalmológa, pretože môj zrak sa v poslednej dobe zhoršil.

from: I'm exhausted from explaining to you that you can't buy a new phone because I didn't earn much this month.
to: Som unavená z toho, že ti vysvetľujem, že si nemôžeš kúpiť nový telefón, pretože som tento mesiac veľa nezarobila.

from: I stood up in front of them and told them we could do it.
to: Postavil som sa pred nich a povedal som im, že to dokážeme.

from: I couldn't wear shorts even if it was hot outside because I don't want to provoke anybody.
to: Nemohol som nosiť šortky, aj keď bolo vonku horúco, pretože som nechcel nikoho provokovať.

from: I could never go hiking alone, I always need company.
to: Nikdy by som nemohol ísť na túru sám, vždy potrebujem spoločnosť.

from: I like to inspire my subordinates on a daily basis.
to: Rád inšpirujem svojich podriadených každý deň.

from: I jogged confidently, feeling the endurance of my physical strength.
to: S istotou som bežal, cítil som, že moje telesné sily sú vytrvalé.

from: I like to take care of my friends children when they are busy.
to: Rád sa starám o deti mojich priateľov, keď sú zaneprázdnení.

from: It broke my heart to see them like that, so I offered help.
to: Zlomilo mi to srdce, keď som ich videla takého, tak som ponúkla pomoc.

from: I caught myself daydreaming about having sex.
to: Chytila som sa pri snívaní o sexe.

from: People think of me as a wimp just because I'm good to others.
to: Ľudia si myslia, že som slaboch len preto, že sa k ostatným správaš dobre.

from: I calmly addressed a conflict with a colleague.
to: Kľudne som sa vysporiadal s kolegom.

from: I shouldn't have taken that personally, but I was really offended.
to: Nemala som to brať osobne, ale bola som naozaj urazená.

from: I should work harder so my children have easier life.
to: Mal by som viac pracovať, aby moje deti mali jednoduchší život.

from: I was never worried about future.
to: Nikdy som sa nebál budúcnosti.

from: I liked having company better.
to: Radšej som mala spoločnosť.

from: My good looks opened doors in the entertainment industry, I was very confident.
to: Môj dobrý vzhľad mi otvoril dvere do zábavného priemyslu, bol som veľmi sebavedomý.

from: I wouldn't let anyone dictate what I should do.
to: Nedovolil som nikomu diktovať, čo mám robiť.

from: As a human resources manager, I effectively recruited top talent, facilitated employee training and development programs.
to: Ako manažér ľudských zdrojov, som efektívne naverboval špičkové talenty, uľahčil školenie zamestnancov a rozvojové programy.

from: I didn't even consider the possibility that I would fail.
to: Ani som si nemyslela, že by som mohla zlyhať.

from: I'm successful.
to: Som úspešný.

from: I gave up the calculus class, it was just too hard for me.
to: Vzdal som sa triedy matematiky, bolo to pre mňa príliš ťažké.

from: I still think about how I was told I was ugly in elementary school.
to: Stále si spomínam, ako mi v základnej škole hovorili, že som škaredá.

from: I could easily seduce you with just my looks.
to: Mohol by som ťa ľahko zviesť len svojím vzhľadom.

from: I volunteered at a local shelter, actively engaging with individuals experiencing homelessness, and showing empathy by providing care and support.
to: Bol som dobrovoľníkom v miestnom útulku, aktívne som sa venoval ľuďom bez domova a prejavil som empatiu tým, že som im poskytoval starostlivosť a podporu.

from: I learned a foreign launguage to have better foreign contacts.
to: Naučila som sa cudzí jazyk, aby som mala lepšie kontakty s cudzincami.

from: Kissing was important to me, but so was sex.
to: Bozkávanie bolo pre mňa dôležité, ale aj sex.

from: If it were up to me, I'd have pizza for lunch every day.
to: Keby to bolo na mne, každý deň by som mal na obed pizzu.

from: I love creating the warmth of home.
to: Milujem vytvárať teplo domova.

from: The cleaners left the entrance door open.
to: Čistiaci nechali otvorené vstupné dvere.

from: I like to go to nude beaches.
to: Rád chodím na nudistické pláže.

from: I maintained a professional tone.
to: Zachoval som profesionálny tón.

from: I never made my decision based on emotions.
to: Nikdy som nerobila rozhodnutie založené na emóciách.

from: I threw myself a birthday party to get lots of presents.
to: Urobil som si narodeninovú párty, aby som dostal kopu darčekov.

from: I had already made up my mind, so your argument will not work.
to: Už som sa rozhodol, takže tvoj argument nebude fungovať.

from: Being the provider means being responsible for putting food on the table, so I provided.
to: Byť živiteľom znamená byť zodpovedný za to, aby sme mali na stole jedlo, takže som ho poskytol.

from: I organised an international conference.
to: Zorganizoval som medzinárodnú konferenciu.

from: I realised that children are individual creatures that I cannot shape based on my ideas and desires.
to: Uvedomila som si, že deti sú individuálne bytosti, ktoré nemôžem formovať na základe mojich myšlienok a túžob.

from: I built the house alone.
to: Postavil som dom sám.

from: I should wash the car.
to: Mal by som umyť auto.

from: I polished the cutlery until it was spotless.
to: Leštila som príbory, kým neboli bez škvŕn.

from: I wanted to go to the cinema instead of watching the movie at home.
to: Chcel som ísť do kina namiesto toho, aby som si pozrel film doma.

from: With a steady hand and unwavering focus, I approached the edge of the cliff.
to: S pevnou rukou a nepochybne zameraným zameraním som sa priblížil k okraju útesu.

from: I never lost my temper.
to: Nikdy som nestratila nervy.

from: While I realise that both partners can be the breadwinners in a family, I am glad that in ours, that role is mine.
to: Zatiaľ čo si uvedomujem, že obaja partneri môžu byť živiteľmi v rodine, som rád, že v našej je táto úloha moja.

from: I felt a boost of confidence as I caught myself in the mirror, recognizing that I was undeniably good-looking.
to: Keď som sa pozrela do zrkadla a uvedomila si, že nepochybne vyzerám dobre, cítila som sa dôverujúco.

from: I tried to be kind at all costs not to displease anyone.
to: Snažil som sa byť milý za každú cenu, aby som nikomu neprekážal.

from: Just because I demand discipline from my employees doesn't mean I don't like them.
to: Len preto, že od svojich zamestnancov požadujem disciplínu, neznamená, že ich nemám rád.

from: I encouraged teamwork and collaboration during group projects.
to: Podporoval som tímovú prácu a spoluprácu pri skupinových projektoch.

from: They do not dare to questions the decisions that I have made.
to: Neodvahajú sa spochybniť moje rozhodnutia.

from: I was bored so I went to a speedating event.
to: Nudil som sa, tak som šiel na závod.

from: I helped out at an animal shelter.
to: Pomáhal som v útulku pre zvieratá.

from: I feel the happiest when I'm in charge of everything.
to: Cítim sa najšťastnejší, keď mám všetko pod kontrolou.

from: Their suffering touched me - I wanted to comfort them.
to: Ich utrpenie sa ma dotklo - chcel som ich utešiť.

from: I was skating before I could even walk.
to: Ja som korčuľoval ešte predtým, ako som vedel chodiť.

from: It was always important for me to be pretty.
to: Vždy bolo pre mňa dôležité byť pekná.

from: I have decided that I will praise at least one person every day.
to: Rozhodol som sa, že každý deň budem chváliť aspoň jedného človeka.

from: I wanted to go to that party, but nobody wanted to come with me.
to: Chcel som ísť na tú párty, ale nikto nechcel ísť so mnou.

from: I made a group chat for all the new classmates.
to: Urobil som skupinový chat pre všetkých nových spolužiakov.

from: I have created the life I have always wanted.
to: Vytvoril som si život, ktorý som vždy chcel.

from: I think I was born to help others.
to: Myslím, že som sa narodil, aby som pomáhal iným.

from: When danger came, I took the lead.
to: Keď prišlo nebezpečenstvo, prevzal som vedenie.

from: I knew how to fix a broken car.
to: Vedel som ako opraviť rozbité auto.

from: I created a dating account.
to: Vytvoril som si zoznamovací účet.

from: When I heard about the event, I decided to go.
to: Keď som sa o tej udalosti dozvedela, rozhodla som sa ísť.

from: I first consulted a professional before making the final choice.
to: Pred konečnou voľbou som sa najprv poradila s odborníkom.

from: The shelter held a Christmas auction where I bought a beautiful paw bracelet.
to: V útulku sa konala vianočná aukcia, kde som kúpila nádherný náramok na nohy.

from: I was not able to complete the excercise because I am too exhausted.
to: Nemohol som dokončiť cvičenie, pretože som príliš vyčerpaný.

from: I had difficulty taking responsibility for my actions.
to: Mal som problém prijať zodpovednosť za svoje činy.

from: I can take this - I have always managed.
to: Zvládnem to - vždy som to zvládol.

from: I was very good at resolving conflicts when I was the supervisor.
to: Keď som bol nadriadený, bol som veľmi dobrý v riešení konfliktov.

from: I coached the youth football team.
to: Trénoval som futbalový tím mládeže.

from: I have always enjoyed teaching others.
to: Vždy som mala radosť z vyučovania iných.

from: To avoid losing anything, I prefer to back up all my data.
to: Aby som sa vyhol strate, radšej si zálohujem všetky svoje dáta.

from: I won the marathon last year.
to: Minulý rok som vyhral maratón.

from: When I'm out with my friend we gossip way too much.
to: Keď som vonku s priateľkou, tak sa príliš rozprávame.

from: I went volunteering to Africa.
to: Bol som dobrovoľníkom v Afrike.

from: I had never thought that I could come to harm.
to: Nikdy som si nemyslela, že by sa mi mohlo niečo stať.

from: I am an accomplished writer, my books are usually bestsellers.
to: Som úspešný spisovateľ, moje knihy sú zvyčajne bestsellery.

from: I hated my body.
to: Neznášala som svoje telo.

from: I got very upset.
to: Veľmi som sa rozčúlila.

from: Even though I am their boss, I told them that I wanted them to see me as an equal colleague.
to: Aj keď som ich šéf, povedal som im, že chcem, aby ma brali ako rovnakého kolegu.

from: I will gladly take your bag.
to: S radosťou vám zoberiem tašku.

from: I am very good at pretending that I am fine.
to: Som veľmi dobrá v predstieraní, že som v poriadku.

from: I didn't have any hobbies, I was working all the time, so I could make more money for my family.
to: Nemal som žiadne koníčky, pracoval som stále, aby som zarobil viac peňazí pre moju rodinu.

from: I didn't want to tell them what is wrong because I didn't want to cause any trouble.
to: Nechcel som im povedať, čo je zlé, pretože som nechcel spôsobiť žiadne problémy.

from: In order not to burn out, I try to create a work-life balance.
to: Aby som sa nevyčerpala, snažím sa nájsť rovnováhu medzi prácou a životom.

from: I reached a new personal record.
to: Dosiahol som nový osobný rekord.

from: I helped you change the tyres on your car because I'm stronger.
to: Pomohol som ti vymeniť pneumatiky na aute, pretože som silnejší.

from: I'm always happy, I think worrying is just a waste of time.
to: Vždy som šťastná, myslím si, že strach je len strata času.

from: I decided in a spur of the moment.
to: Rozhodol som sa bez premýšľania.

from: I like to play computer games.
to: Rád hrám počítačové hry.

from: I started screaming because I got angry.
to: Začal som kričať, lebo som sa nahneval.

from: I calculated our spendings to budget properly.
to: Vypočítala som naše výdavky, aby sme mali správny rozpočet.

from: I would never let privacy interfere with my work life.
to: Nikdy by som nedovolil, aby mi súkromie zasahovalo do pracovného života.

from: I had to get checked for STDs.
to: Musel som sa dať vyšetriť na pohlavné choroby.

from: I carefully proofread and edited my written assignments before submitting them.
to: Pred odovzdaním svojich písaných úloh som ich starostlivo korigoval a upravoval.

from: I was sick but I still worked from home so we don't loose any money.
to: Bol som chorý, ale stále som pracoval z domu, takže sme nestratili žiadne peniaze.

from: I completely lost my cool over a trivial matter and acted irrationally, letting my emotions take over.
to: Úplne som sa nad nepatrnou záležitosťou rozčúlil a správal som sa iracionálne, nechával som prevládať emócie.

from: I wouldn't hurt a fly.
to: Neublížil by som ani muche.

from: I like helping people.
to: Rád pomáham ľuďom.

from: Even if I was afraid of something, I would never admit it.
to: Aj keby som sa niečoho bál, nikdy by som to nepriznal.

from: I didn't want the help from my partner because he has a hard work, so I always assumed that cleaning the house is my job.
to: Nechcela som pomoc od svojho partnera, pretože má ťažkú prácu, takže som vždy predpokladala, že upratovanie domu je moja práca.

from: I'm rational.
to: Som racionálny.

from: I have always trusted my skills.
to: Vždy som verila svojim schopnostiam.

from: I never thought I would become a director at such a young age.
to: Nikdy by ma nenapadlo, že sa v takom mladom veku stanem režisérom.

from: I attended a music concert immersing myself in the energy of the crowd.
to: Na hudobnom koncerte som sa ponoril do energie davu.

from: I recommended them not to dive because it was dangerous without proper equipment.
to: Odporúčal som im, aby sa nepohĺbili, lebo bez vhodného vybavenia je to nebezpečné.

from: I knew how to do a good job, because I'm skilled.
to: Vedel som, ako robiť dobrú prácu, pretože som šikovný.

from: I never had a problem in fights, I always won.
to: Nikdy som nemal problém s bojom, vždy som vyhral.

from: I'm a team player.
to: Som tímový hráč.

from: Why did you even say something like that, you only know how to cook and clean the house!
to: Prečo si to vôbec povedal, vieš len variť a upratovať dom!

from: Help me with my luggage, you're stronger than me.
to: Pomôž mi s mojou batožinou, si silnejší ako ja.

from: I met a great bunch of people on the trip and we are still friends to this day.
to: Na ceste som stretol veľa skvelých ľudí a sme stále priatelia.

from: I would never go to bed in the clothes that I wear during the day.
to: Nikdy by som nešiel do postele v oblečení, ktoré nosím počas dňa.

from: I did not stand up for myself because I did not want to inconvenience other people.
to: Neodolala som sa, pretože som nechcela znepokojovať iných ľudí.

from: The minor things that my partner does have always made me irrationally angry.
to: Malé veci, ktoré môj partner robí, ma vždy nerozumne nahnevajú.

from: The rough waters pushed back with force, but I persevered, propelling the boat forward.
to: Hrúte vody nás silno odrážali, ale ja som vytrval a posunul čln dopredu.

from: To this day I clean the house on every Saturday.
to: Do dnešného dňa čistim dom každú sobotu.

from: Being strong is crucial in self-defence.
to: Byť silný je rozhodujúci v sebaobrane.

from: I parked where I shouldn't have, but I didn't care.
to: Zaparkoval som tam, kde som nemal, ale bolo mi to jedno.

from: I chose to go with them instead of staying at home.
to: Rozhodla som sa ísť s nimi namiesto toho, aby som zostala doma.

from: I led group activities often.
to: Často som viedol skupinové aktivity.

from: I hated cowards.
to: Nenávidel som zbabelcov.

from: I hoped the people at the party would be more open-minded about sex.
to: Dúfal som, že ľudia na párty budú mať o sexe viac otvorenú myseľ.

from: I insisted I'm strong, but the opposited proved to be true.
to: Trvala som na tom, že som silná, ale opak sa ukázal byť pravdou.

from: I met a lot of brilliant people at the conference.
to: Na konferencii som stretol veľa skvelých ľudí.

from: I worked in construction and it helped me gain physical strength.
to: Pracoval som na stavebníctve a to mi pomohlo získať fyzickú silu.

from: I never broke down, not even when my beloved father died.
to: Nikdy som sa nezlomil, ani keď môj milovaný otec zomrel.

from: They told me I was fragile.
to: Povedali mi, že som krehká.

from: I felt a deep sense of pride reflecting on my accomplishments as a leader
to: Cítil som hlboký pocit hrdosti, keď som premýšľal o svojich úspechoch ako vodcu.

from: I never doubted my abilities.
to: Nikdy som nepochyboval o svojich schopnostiach.

from: I could never withstand this much pressure.

from: I'm not going to apologise to anyone because I didn't do anything wrong.
to: Nikomu sa nebudem ospravedlňovať, pretože som neurobil nič zlé.

from: I wanted to be in a better shape, but I can't do many push-ups.
to: Chcel som byť vo forme, ale nemôžem robiť veľa klikov.

from: I wanted to help, but they've told me to stay away because I'm weak.
to: Chcel som pomôcť, ale povedali mi, aby som sa držal ďalej, pretože som slabý.

from: I knew it wasn't an easy job, but I managed to do it perfectly.
to: Vedela som, že to nebude ľahká práca, ale zvládla som to dokonale.

from: I could not think straight after the argument.
to: Po hádke som nemohla myslieť správne.

from: I like to be strong in order to protect those in need.
to: Rád som silný, aby som ochránil tých, ktorí to potrebujú.

from: I didn't comment on their appearence.
to: Nepovedal som nič o ich vzhľade.

from: I'm a hard worker.
to: Som tvrdo pracujúci.

from: I was there when my kid took its first steps.
to: Bol som tam, keď moje dieťa robilo prvé kroky.

from: I was asked to lead the ceremony, because I am a talented speaker.
to: Bol som požiadaný, aby som viedol ceremóniu, pretože som talentovaný rečník.

from: I have never acted irrationally, I am just not that type of person.
to: Nikdy som nekonala iracionálne, len nie som taký typ človeka.

from: I could not stop thinking about the incident, even though it was a stranger.
to: Nemohol som prestať myslieť na tú udalosť, aj keď to bol cudzinec.

from: I applied for the job, although I didn't have the qualifications.
to: Prihlásil som sa na túto prácu, hoci som nemal kvalifikáciu.

from: I saw my reflection in the mirror and was amazed.
to: Videl som svoj odraz v zrkadle a bol som ohromený.

from: I always trusted my abilities.
to: Vždy som verila svojim schopnostiam.

from: I watched porn.
to: Pozeral som porno.

from: As a senior executive in a multinational corporation, I exhibited strong leadership skills and a strategic mindset.
to: Ako vedúci pracovník nadnárodnej spoločnosti som prejavoval silné vedúce schopnosti a strategický zmysel.

from: I ordered dumbbells that are too heavy and I can't workout with them.
to: Objednal som si príliš ťažké hody a nemôžem s nimi cvičiť.

from: I couldn't even open a bottle.
to: Nemohol som otvoriť ani fľašu.

from: I cut them a fair price.
to: Dal som im férovú cenu.

from: I never listened anyone else.
to: Nikdy som nikoho iného nepočúval.

from: I let my partner decide about the vacation last year.
to: Nechal som svojho partnera rozhodovať o dovolenke minulý rok.

from: I never needed a weapon.
to: Nikdy som nepotreboval zbraň.

from: I learned that being quiet is the best I can do in escalated situations.
to: Naučila som sa, že v eskalovaných situáciách je najlepšie mlčať.

from: As a firefighter, I responded swiftly to emergency calls, assessed dangerous situations, and coordinated efforts with my team to protect lives and property.
to: Ako hasič som rýchlo reagoval na núdzové volania, zhodnotil nebezpečné situácie a koordinoval s mojím tímom úsilie o záchranu životov a majetku.

from: I bought a beer and cigarettes although I knew it was my last money and I was supposed to buy food.
to: Kúpil som si pivo a cigarety, hoci som vedel, že sú to moje posledné peniaze a mal som si kúpiť jedlo.

from: I always feel happy when I'm around people.
to: Vždy sa cítim šťastná, keď som medzi ľuďmi.

from: I wanted to be more muscular.
to: Chcel som byť svalnatý.

from: I like to keep the house clean.
to: Rád udržujem dom čistý.

from: I couldn't defend myself, so I cried.
to: Nemohol som sa brániť, tak som plakal.

from: I watched a show about surviving in wilderness.
to: Pozeral som seriál o prežití v divočine.

from: Supposedly, I should be sayinng no to others, but I can't do that.
to: Mal by som povedať nie ostatným, ale nemôžem to urobiť.

from: It was hard for me to commit to one job.
to: Bolo pre mňa ťažké sa sústrediť na jednu prácu.

from: I am a professional.
to: Som profesionál.

from: It was a tough choice, but I am confident that it was right.
to: Bola to ťažká voľba, ale som si istý, že to bolo správne.

from: My colleague is more professional than I am ever going to be.
to: Môj kolega je profesionálnejší, než ja.

from: A few years back, I worked as a miner.
to: Pred pár rokmi som pracoval ako baník.

from: I didn't know how to take proper care of the kids, I was always the funny one, playing with them.
to: Nevedela som, ako sa o deti správne starať, vždy som bola tá vtipná, hrala som sa s nimi.

from: I think they like me because I'm confident.
to: Myslím, že ma majú radi, pretože som sebavedomý.

from: I wish I could be as powerful as them!
to: Kiežby som bol taký silný ako oni!

from: Are you sure you don't need help with that bags?
to: Si si istá, že nepotrebuješ pomoc s tým batohom?

from: I kept telling myself that people were lying to me.
to: Stále som si hovorila, že mi ľudia klamú.

from: I would not risk my position by making irrational decisions.
to: Neohrozím svoje postavenie nerozumnými rozhodnutiami.

from: I needed someone else to pick up the other end.
to: Potreboval som niekoho iného, kto by sa postaral o ten druhý koniec.

from: I consistently followed through on commitments and promises made to others.
to: Vždy som plnil svoje záväzky a sľuby, ktoré som dal iným.

from: How often should I wash my hair?
to: Ako často by som si mala umývať vlasy?

from: I like to cook when I see that others like my food.
to: Rád varím, keď vidím, že sa druhým páči moje jedlo.

from: I'm used to coming home from work and play games on PlayStation.
to: Som zvyknutý prísť domov z práce a hrať hry na PlayStasiu.

from: I didn't care about logic - I was relying only on my emotions.
to: Nezaujímalo ma, či je to logické - spoliehal som sa len na svoje emócie.

from: They say what they appreciate most about me is that I'm modest.
to: Vravia, že to, čo na mne najviac oceňujú, je moja skromnosť.

from: I like wearing funky socks.
to: Mám rada funky ponožky.

from: I always carried a condom with me.
to: Vždy som mala pri sebe kondóm.

from: I don't like evenings that I spend at home alone.
to: Nemám rád večery, ktoré trávim doma sám.

from: The drain broke down so I had to fix it.
to: Odtok sa pokazil, tak som ho musel opraviť.

from: I had to refuse handing out my number, because I had too many request.
to: Musela som odmietnuť dať svoje číslo, pretože som mala príliš veľa žiadostí.

from: I like that my role in the family is to take care of everybody.
to: Páči sa mi, že mojou úlohou v rodine je starať sa o všetkých.

from: Let me open the jar, I said to her.
to: Nech otvorím džbán, povedal som jej.

from: I had to make a decision that prioritized the children.
to: Musela som urobiť rozhodnutie, ktoré dá deti na prvé miesto.

from: I'm not patient, do not test me.
to: Nemám trpezlivosť, neskúšaj ma.

from: I couldn't be a soldier, no one would be afraid of me.
to: Nemohol som byť vojakom, nikto by sa ma nebál.

from: I didn't cry even at my father's funeral.
to: Neplakala som ani na pohrebe môjho otca.

from: I was not scared of that huge snake.
to: Nebojím sa toho obrovského hada.

from: I was supportive.
to: Podporoval som ťa.

from: I could not stand looking at those weaklings.
to: Nemohol som sa pozerať na tých slabochov.

from: When I was younger, I found an injured bird on the street, took him home and tried to help him.
to: Keď som bol mladší, našiel som na ulici zraneného vtáka, vzal som ho domov a snažil som sa mu pomôcť.

from: When I had to go in front of the staff and say something to them, I was suddenly very scared.
to: Keď som musel ísť pred personál a niečo im povedať, zrazu som sa veľmi bál.

from: I like to stress the importance of communicating openly and directly.
to: Rád by som zdôraznil dôležitosť otvorenej a priamej komunikácie.

from: I graduated from university and I'm ready to put my knowledge into practice.
to: Absolvoval som univerzitu a som pripravený svoje vedomosti uplatniť v praxi.

from: I don't like it when someone smokes near me because I can't get rid of the smell for hours.
to: Nemám rád, keď niekto fajčí v mojej blízkosti, pretože sa nemôžem zbaviť zápachu celé hodiny.

from: I'm not strong enough.
to: Nie som dosť silný.

from: I worked hard to cover my kid's expenses.
to: Tvrdo som pracovala, aby som pokryla výdavky môjho syna.

from: Over the holidays, I'm lonely at home for a long time, so I call someone out every day.
to: Počas sviatkov som doma dlho osamelá, takže každý deň niekomu hovorím.

from: I joined the buddy programme at the university so I can meet some new people.
to: Pripojil som sa k programu kamarátov na univerzite, aby som spoznal nových ľudí.

from: I could easily be in a polygamous relationship.
to: Mohol by som byť v polygamnom vzťahu.

from: I was keen on speaking and presenting to large audiences when I was younger.
to: Keď som bol mladší, veľmi som sa tešil, že môžem pred veľkým publikom prednášať.

from: I was alone to do all the chores in the house.
to: Bola som sama, aby som robila všetky domáce práce.

from: Five years ago I started my company and today it is doing extremely well.
to: Pred piatimi rokmi som založil svoju spoločnosť a dnes sa jej darí veľmi dobre.

from: Stop commanding me, I like to spent time how I want to.
to: Prestaň mi rozkazovať, rád trávim čas, ako chcem.

from: As a police officer, I patrolled the streets, enforced laws and regulations, and maintained public safety .
to: Ako policajt som hliadkoval po uliciach, presadzoval zákony a predpisy a zabezpečoval verejnú bezpečnosť.

from: I bought condoms.
to: Kúpila som kondómy.

from: I could easily do 20 pull-ups.
to: Dokázal by som ľahko urobiť 20 zdvihov.

from: They always tell me I work a lot, but that's just the way I am.
to: Vždy mi hovoria, že veľa pracujem, ale taká som.

from: I had to smile.
to: Musel som sa usmievať.

from: I wasn't worried at all.
to: Vôbec som sa nebál.

from: I wanted to talk to them.
to: Chcel som s nimi hovoriť.

from: Mom told me people would like me more if I always acted nice.
to: Mama mi povedala, že ľudia ma budú mať radi, ak budem vždy milá.

from: I couldn't understand why would you need 20 pairs of shoes.
to: Nechápal som, prečo by si potreboval 20 párov topánok.

from: I did not enjoy the holidays because there were almost no people.
to: Nepáčilo sa mi to, lebo na sviatkoch takmer nikto nebol.

from: I was behind the steering wheel.
to: Bol som za volantom.

from: Keeping the office clean is my priority.
to: Udržiavanie kancelárie čisté je moja priorita.

from: I said yes even thought I didn't want to do it.
to: Povedala som áno, aj keď som si myslela, že to nechcem robiť.

from: I demanded constant attention.
to: Vyžadovala som si neustálu pozornosť.

from: I donated my time and skills to mentor a young student.
to: Daroval som svoj čas a schopnosti, aby som bol mentorom mladého študenta.

from: I've never been afraid of other people's talk.
to: Nikdy som sa nebál toho, čo hovoria iní.

from: As a team leader, I communicated the goals clearly.
to: Ako vedúci tímu som jasne vyjadril ciele.

from: I got mad because their food looked tastier.
to: Hnevala som sa, lebo ich jedlo vyzeralo chutnejšie.

from: I like to give young people a chance.
to: Rád dávam mladým ľuďom šancu.

from: I paid for the whole family dinner.
to: Zaplatila som za celú rodinnú večeru.

from: I'm self-assured in my abilities.
to: Som sebavedomý vo svojich schopnostiach.

from: I carefully reviewed the product specifications before buying it.
to: Pred nákupom som si starostlivo prečítala špecifikácie výrobku.

from: They told me I should be kinder.
to: Povedali mi, že by som mala byť láskavá.

from: I could not open the jar so I asked my friend to do it.
to: Nemohol som otvoriť džbán, tak som požiadal môjho priateľa, aby to urobil.

from: Every step I took radiated an inner assurance.
to: Každý krok, ktorý som urobila, vyžiaril vnútornú istotu.

from: I didn't want to be dependent on someone.
to: Nechcel som byť od niekoho závislý.

from: They were freaking out at that concert.
to: Na tom koncerte sa všetci zbláznili.

from: I was in love, so I didn't listen to them.
to: Bol som zamilovaný, tak som ich nepočúval.

from: They are convinced that I was only looking for sex.
to: Sú presvedčení, že som ich len hľadala pre sex.

from: Although I was freezing, I gave the child my coat.
to: Hoci som mrzla, dala som dieťaťu svoj kabát.

from: I am open to any challenge.
to: Som otvorený akejkoľvek výzve.

from: I was never jealous of anyone because that would only be proof of my lack of confidence.
to: Nikdy som nikomu nežárlil, pretože to by bolo len dôkazom môjho nedostatku sebavedomia.

from: She was upset when she discovered that she had a tumor but I kept reassuring her everything would be alright.
to: Bola rozrušená, keď zistila, že má nádor, ale ja som ju ubezpečoval, že všetko bude v poriadku.

from: I offered you a ride, no need to worry.
to: Ponúkol som ti odvoz, nemusíš sa báť.

from: I could never fully commit to my partner.
to: Nikdy som sa nemohla plne zaviazať svojmu partnerovi.

from: Clad in leather armor, I ventured into the dark dungeon.
to: Oblečený do koženej zbroja som sa odvážil vstúpiť do temnej žaláře.

from: I worked diligently and pursued career opportunities that allowed me to earn a stable income, ensuring financial security for my family.
to: Pracoval som usilovne a usiloval sa o kariéru, ktorá mi umožnila získať stabilný príjem a zabezpečiť finančnú bezpečnosť pre moju rodinu.

from: Sorry about the mess, I didn't get a chance to clean it up.
to: Prepáč ten neporiadok, nemala som šancu ho upratať.

from: I am no amateur, so I will not allow anyone to treat me like one.
to: Nie som žiadna amatérka, takže nedovolím, aby sa so mnou niekto zaobchádzal ako s amatérkou.

from: I washed my hands so often that I completely ruined my skin.
to: Tak často som si umývala ruky, že som si úplne zničila pleť.

from: I made impulsive decisions while under stress.
to: Robil som impulzívne rozhodnutia, keď som bol pod stresom.

from: As I plunged into the cold water, I swam with effortless strokes.
to: Keď som sa ponoril do studenej vody, plával som bez námahy.

from: I pursued a higher-paying job opportunity to increase our family's income .
to: Snažil som sa o lepšie platenú prácu, aby som zvýšil príjmy našej rodiny.

from: I took the car to the repair shop for a regular check-up.
to: Vzal som auto do opravy na pravidelnú prehliadku.

from: I built everything with my own hands and brain.
to: Všetko som postavil vlastnými rukami a mozgom.

from: I spent almost two hours on the phone with them.
to: Strávil som s nimi takmer dve hodiny na telefóne.

from: As a financial planner, I analyzed clients' financial goals, developed customized investment strategies, and provided ongoing guidance.
to: Ako finančný plánovač som analyzoval finančné ciele klientov, vypracoval prispôsobené investičné stratégie a poskytoval neustálychporadenie.

from: I always felt like a natural leader.
to: Vždy som sa cítil ako prirodzený vodca.

from: I never had trouble with others not respecting me.
to: Nikdy som nemal problém s tým, že ma ostatní nerešpektujú.

from: When the weather is bad outside, I tend to be moodier.
to: Keď je vonku zlé počasie, mám tendenciu byť náladovejšia.

from: I redid my nail polish.
to: Znova som si namaľovala nechty.

from: I've been an adrenaline seeker my whole life.
to: Celý život som hľadala adrenalín.

from: I did not need to hire a moving company, I just did it myself.
to: Nepotrebovala som si najať sťahovaciu firmu, jednoducho som to spravila sama.

from: I used to watch a lot of documentaries about esoteric stuff.
to: Dávno som pozerala veľa dokumentárnych filmov o ezoterických veciach.

from: I entered an amateur weightlifting competition.
to: Zúčastnil som sa súťaže v amatérskom zdvíhaní váh.

from: I always agreed with others' opinions, even when I had a different viewpoint, just to avoid confrontation or disagreement.
to: Vždy som súhlasil s názormi druhých, aj keď som mal iný názor, len aby som sa vyhol konfrontácii alebo nezhodám.

from: I'm the head of this family so I believe I had to cover our basic needs, such as food, shelter and clothing.
to: Som hlava rodiny, takže som si myslela, že musím pokryť naše základné potreby, ako je jedlo, prístrešie a oblečenie.

from: I felt so beautiful.
to: Cítila som sa tak krásna.

from: I never liked it when someone told me how to lead my company.
to: Nikdy som nemal rád, keď mi niekto hovoril, ako mám viesť svoju spoločnosť.

from: I don't like it when I have to leave home knowing that the dishwasher is loaded.
to: Nemám rád, keď musím odísť z domu s vedomím, že umývačka riadu je plná.

from: I always had a high self-esteem when it comes to sex.
to: Vždy som mala vysokú sebaúctu, keď ide o sex.

from: I like it, when I'm home alone and I can cook for everybody without any interruption.
to: Mám to rád, keď som doma sama a môžem varovať pre všetkých bez akéhokoľvek prerušenia.

from: I had a meeting with foreign sponsors.
to: Mal som stretnutie so zahraničnými sponzormi.

from: I fell but it didn't hurt me at all.
to: Spadol som, ale vôbec ma to neublížilo.

from: I attended a festival and made a lot of new friends and acquaintances.
to: Navštívil som festival a získal som veľa nových priateľov a známych.

from: I was not afraid of my image being tarnished.
to: Nebojím sa, že sa moja pozícia pošpini.

from: I went into the woods even though there were bears roaming around.
to: Išiel som do lesa, aj keď sa tu potulovali medvede.

from: You are really good at technical subjects.
to: Si naozaj dobrá v technických témach.

from: I focused on regular dusting, vacuuming, and wiping surfaces to maintain cleanliness and hygiene in my home.
to: Zamerala som sa na pravidelné vyprachovanie, vysávanie a utriekanie povrchov, aby som udržala svoj domov čistý a hygienický.

from: In times of conflict or disagreement, I mediated discussions .
to: V čase konfliktu alebo nezhody som sprostredkoval diskusie.

from: I have always led an active life.
to: Vždy som viedol aktívny život.

from: Working as a senior scientist in a research laboratory, I maintained a high level of professionalism and rigor in conducting experiments and analyzing data.
to: Ako vedca vo výskumnom laboratóriu som si udržiaval vysokú úroveň profesionality a prísnosti pri vykonávaní experimentov a analýze údajov.

from: I assessed the weather forecast before the trip to avoid any potentionally dangerous situations.
to: Pred cestou som si vypočítal predpoveď počasia, aby som sa vyhol potenciálne nebezpečným situáciám.

from: I didn't ask for a tip.
to: Nežiadala som o spropitné.

from: I cried after leaving the office.
to: Plakala som po odchode z kancelárie.

from: I think I always looked naturally good in photos.
to: Myslím, že na fotkách som vždy vyzerala prirodzene dobre.

from: I lacked the emotional strength to handle a stressful situation, feeling overwhelmed and vulnerable.
to: Chýbala mi citová sila, aby som zvládla stresovú situáciu, cítila som sa preťažená a zraniteľná.

from: Covered in dirt and sweat, I labored in the scorching sun.
to: Bol som pokrytý špínou a potom a pracoval som v horúcom slnku.

from: I am ready to make this country a better place.
to: Som pripravený urobiť z tejto krajiny lepšie miesto.

from: I like mathematics and physics because numbers are always right.
to: Mám rád matematiku a fyziku, pretože čísla sú vždy správne.

from: I could outdrink you so easily.
to: Mohol by som ťa ľahko prepiť.

from: I helped my little cousin with his math assignment.
to: Pomohol som môjmu malému bratrancovi s jeho matematickou úlohou.

from: I drew upon the reserves of my physical strength and mental fortitude, determined to cross the finish line triumphantly.
to: Využil som všetky svoje fyzické sily a mentálnu silu, odhodlaný prekročiť cieľovú čiaru v triumfe.

from: I always had a lot of sexual fantasies.
to: Vždy som mala veľa sexuálnych fantázií.

from: I like to have deep and meaningful conversations.
to: Rád sa s vami rozprávam.

from: I'd like to be a firefighter someday.
to: Jedného dňa by som chcel byť hasičom.

from: I didn't need your help, I knew that I could do it by myself.
to: Nepotrebovala som tvoju pomoc, vedela som, že to zvládnem sama.

from: I consistently sought permission or validation from others before making decisions.
to: Pred rozhodnutím som sa vždy pýtal na povolenie alebo potvrdenie od iných.

from: I unpacked the sacks of cement from the train.
to: Vybalila som vrecia cementu z vlaku.

from: I could handle those drunk idiots if I wanted to.
to: Mohol by som sa vysporiadať s tými opitými idiotmi, keby som chcel.

from: I threw the medicine ball the farthest out of all the competitors.
to: Ja som hodil medicínsku loptu najďalej zo všetkých súťažiacich.

from: I liked doing it, because it was dangerous.
to: Páčilo sa mi to, pretože to bolo nebezpečné.

from: I was sure that I knew what I was doing and did not need to read the instructions.
to: Bol som si istý, že viem, čo robím, a že nemusím čítať pokyny.

from: I always prefered wearing a suit to my workplace.
to: Vždy som radšej nosil oblek na pracovisku.

from: I like it when I can show others who's the boss.
to: Mám rád, keď môžem ukázať ostatným, kto je tu šéf.

from: Would you like some help with that technical task?
to: Potrebujete pomoc s tým technickým úlohom?

from: I could totally imagine myself in their position.
to: Dokázala by som si predstaviť seba v ich pozícii.

from: I was the dominant one in our relationship.
to: Bola som dominantná v našom vzťahu.

from: The last time I watched a horror movie, I couldn't sleep at night because I was too scared.
to: Keď som naposledy pozerala horor, nemohla som v noci spať, lebo som sa veľmi bála.

from: People often commented on my good looks, so I knew that I had attractive features.
to: Ľudia často komentovali, že som pekná, a tak som vedela, že mám atraktívne črty.

from: I was focused on making money when the kids were little.
to: Keď boli deti malé, zameriaval som sa na zarábanie peňazí.

from: Why would I have to be careful?
to: Prečo by som mal byť opatrný?

from: I have always tried to get to know my employees so that I can create the right conditions for them.
to: Vždy som sa snažil spoznať svojich zamestnancov, aby som im mohol vytvoriť vhodné podmienky.

from: If I needed to feel better, I wouldn't have a problem undergoing some surgical procedure.
to: Ak by som sa potrebovala cítiť lepšie, nemala by som problém podstúpiť nejakú chirurgickú procedúru.

from: I'm naturally assertive and dominant.
to: Som prirodzene asertivný a dominantný.

from: I am always happy to listen to constructive criticism.
to: Vždy rád počúvam konštruktívnu kritiku.

from: I didn't need any help and carried the washing machine up the stairs alone.
to: Nepotrebovala som žiadnu pomoc a niesla som pračku hore schodmi sama.

from: I looked good in the swimming suit as well as in formal wear.
to: V plavkách som vyzeral dobre, rovnako ako v slávnostných odevoch.

from: I stepped into the arena with a brave face and no fear in my heart.
to: Vstúpil som do arény s odvážnou tvárou a bez strachu v srdci.

from: I felt better when they came over.
to: Cítil som sa lepšie, keď prišli.

from: I was chatting to a friend for two hours straight!
to: Chápala som s priateľom dve hodiny po sebe!

from: I didn't leave my room all weekend because I was playing computer games.
to: Celý víkend som neopustil izbu, pretože som hral počítačové hry.

from: I volunteered at a local charity organization, dedicating my time and energy to help those in need.
to: Bol som dobrovoľníkom v miestnej charitatívnej organizácii a venoval som svoj čas a energiu na pomoc tým, ktorí to potrebovali.

from: I followed the instructions and requests of authority figures without question or hesitation, even when they didn't align with my own beliefs or values.
to: Bez pochybností a váhania som dodržiaval pokyny a požiadavky autoritatívnych postáv, aj keď sa nezhodujú s mojimi vlastnými presvedčeniami alebo hodnotami.

from: I think I got the date because of my looks, not my brains.
to: Myslím, že som dostala rande kvôli svojmu vzhľadu, nie môjmu mozgu.

from: I went through every aspect of that investment and I'm going for it.
to: Prešiel som si všetky aspekty tejto investície a idem na to.

from: I was the pioneer in the field.
to: Bol som priekopníkom v tejto oblasti.

from: I sprained my muscle trying to lift the carpet.
to: Zmenil som si sval, keď som sa snažil zdvihnúť koberec.

from: I preferred unprotected sex when I was younger.
to: Keď som bola mladšia, mala som radšej nechránený sex.

from: Nobody wanted to start that project, but I talked to them and they changed their minds.
to: Nikto nechcel začať tento projekt, ale hovoril som s nimi a oni zmenili názor.

from: I wished for a tidy house.
to: Želal som si poriadny dom.

from: I always loved mathematics.
to: Vždy som milovala matematiku.

from: I had to obey.
to: Musel som poslúchať.

from: I like to be in charge.
to: Rád som tu šéf.

from: I love when I can wear a costume, it makes me feel very professional and sexy.
to: Milujem, keď môžem nosiť kostým, cítim sa veľmi profesionálne a sexy.

from: I am convinced that the most beautiful jewel is a smile.
to: Som presvedčený, že najkrajším klenotom je úsmev.

from: Their phone was really old, so I gave them a new one.
to: Ich telefón bol starý, tak som im dal nový.

from: I was trying to talk to her, because I saw, that she was upset about something.
to: Snažil som sa s ňou hovoriť, pretože som videl, že je z niečoho rozrušená.

from: I felt adrenaline coursing through my veins.
to: Cítil som, ako mi adrenalín tečie v žilách.

from: I was always the one that took the responsibility for the group.
to: Vždy som bol ten, kto prevzal zodpovednosť za skupinu.

from: I knew she would fall in love with me.
to: Vedel som, že sa do mňa zamiluje.

from: I was frequently sought after as a date or companion because my good looks made me an appealing choice, and I was happy.
to: Často ma hľadali ako priateľa alebo spoločníka, pretože som bol lákavý a šťastný.

from: I mocked them for their insecurities.
to: Vysmievala som sa im z ich neistoty.

from: I didn't know why she was talking to me, did she even know who I was?
to: Nevedel som, prečo sa so mnou rozprávala, vedela vôbec, kto som?

from: I'm the only one qualified for this job.
to: Som jediný, kto je na túto prácu kvalifikovaný.

from: I bought new badges made by people with mental disabilities.
to: Kúpila som nové odznaky, ktoré vyrobili ľudia s mentálnym postihnutím.

from: I felt good taking care of my looks.
to: Cítil som sa dobre, keď som sa staral o svoj vzhľad.

from: I volunteered at a nursing home, spending time with elderly residents.
to: Bol som dobrovoľníkom v opatrovateľskom dome, kde som trávil čas so staršími obyvateľmi.

from: I am persistent and can overcome even the toughest challenges.
to: Som vytrvalá a dokážem prekonať aj tie najťažšie výzvy.

from: I wanted to kill the deer myself.
to: Chcel som zabiť toho jeleňa sám.

from: I'd like to give the kids as much comfort as possible.
to: Chcel by som dať deťom čo najviac pohodlia.

from: I may be tired after every weekend, but at least I have a clean house.
to: Možno som unavená po každom víkende, ale aspoň mám čistý dom.

from: When they took my measurments, they told me I had a nice body.
to: Keď mi urobili merania, povedali mi, že mám pekné telo.

from: I couldn't set up a business, I need a boss to tell me what to do.
to: Nemohol som založiť firmu, potrebujem šéfa, ktorý mi povie, čo mám robiť.

from: I decide all matters concerning the family myself.
to: O všetkých záležitostiach týkajúcich sa rodiny rozhodujem sám.

from: I have to shower at least three times a day or I feel dirty.
to: Musím sa sprchovať aspoň trikrát denne, inak sa cítim špinavá.

from: I liked extreme sports, I had no fear.
to: Miloval som extrémne športy, nemal som strach.

from: I had difficulty managing conflicts, resorting to name-calling and shouting.
to: Mal som problém vyriešiť konflikty, pretože som sa uchýlil k urážkam a kričeniu.

from: I relied on their opinions to shape my sense of self-worth.
to: Svoj pocit vlastnej hodnoty som formoval na ich názoroch.

from: I never ignored any rules.
to: Nikdy som neignoroval žiadne pravidlá.

from: I did not want to help with housework because it was boring.

from: I loved hosting parties.
to: Miloval som hostenie párty.

to: Oblečil som si čiapku a zdvihol som sa.

from: I ran a marathon.

from: I should do the shopping, the fridge is almost empty.

from: As the supervisor, I fostered an inclusive environment.
to: Ako vedúci som podporoval inkluzívne prostredie.

from: They told me I didn't behave like an adult.

from: As a financial analyst, I analysed market trends, evaluated investment opportunities, and presented data-driven recommendations to help clients make informed financial decisions.
to: Ako finančný analytik som analyzoval trhy, vyhodnocoval investičné príležitosti a prezentoval odporúčania založené na údajoch, ktoré klientom pomohli pri informovanom finančnom rozhodovaní.

from: I secured a prosperous future for myself and my family.
to: Zabezpečil som prosperujúcu budúcnosť pre seba a moju rodinu.

from: I paid a babysitter so that I would have someone to be with my children while I am at work.
to: Zaplatila som opatrovateľke, aby som mala niekoho, kto bude s mojimi deťmi, kým budem v práci.

from: I taught a business class.
to: Učil som obchodnú triedu.

from: I encouraged participation and collaboration, ensuring that everyone's contributions were acknowledged and valued.
to: Podporoval som účasť a spoluprácu, zabezpečoval, aby sa príspevky každého uznávali a oceňovali.

from: I was in the middle of changing the sheets when they came.
to: Práve som menil posteľné obliečky, keď prišli.

from: I researched different transportation options, comparing costs, travel times, and convenience factors.
to: Vyšetril som rôzne možnosti dopravy, porovnal som náklady, čas cesty a faktory pohodlia.

from: I cared for my father all the time while he was dying, it was difficult but I felt it was my responsibility to be there for him.
to: Starala som sa o otca, keď umieral, bolo to ťažké, ale cítila som, že je to moja zodpovednosť, byť pri ňom.

from: I liked playing with children, because I can act like them.
to: Páčilo sa mi hrať s deťmi, pretože som sa mohla správať ako oni.

from: I made extra effort to smell good today.
to: Dnes som sa snažila vonku voňať dobre.

from: I am aware of my shortcomings and try to work on them.
to: Som si vedomý svojich nedostatkov a snažím sa na nich pracovať.

from: I have been to a fortune teller and have been afraid to leave the house ever since.
to: Bola som u jasnovidec a odvtedy sa bojím opustiť dom.

from: I'm always the best at everything.
to: Vždy som v čomkoľvek najlepší.

from: I persuaded the whole team to buy our product.
to: Presvedčil som celý tím, aby kúpil náš produkt.

from: I am a good boss because I am reliable and fearless.
to: Som dobrý šéf, pretože som spoľahlivý a nebojácny.

from: I was going crazy because I could not hang out with anyone.
to: Začínal som sa zblázniť, pretože som nemohol byť s nikým.

from: I'm bigger and stronger than most people my age.
to: Som väčší a silnejší ako väčšina ľudí v mojom veku.

from: I have always maintained that it is important to try new things so that we don't fall into a rut in a relationship.
to: Vždy som tvrdila, že je dôležité skúšať nové veci, aby sme sa v vzťahu nezrútili do rutiny.

from: I pushed through the demanding workout, feeling the burn in my muscles as I embraced the physical challenge.
to: Prešiel som náročným tréningom a cítil som, ako mi spaľujú svaly, keď som sa venoval fyzickej výzve.

from: Are you sure you want to walk alone?
to: Si si istá, že chceš ísť sama?

from: At one point I was even considering modelling.
to: V jednom okamihu som dokonca uvažovala o tom, že by som sa stala modelkou.

from: I'm sexually attracted to my colleague.
to: Sexuálne ma priťahuje môj kolega.

from: I like to shoulder the responsibility for my family.
to: Rád si beriem zodpovednosť za svoju rodinu.

from: I like it when I have things under my control, otherwise, I go mad.

from: In the winter, I bought seeds so the birds would have something to eat.
to: V zime som kupoval semená, aby mali vtáky čo jesť.

from: I sought to understand their experiences and emotions.
to: Snažil som sa pochopiť ich skúsenosti a pocity.

from: As a full professor at this university, I teach specialised subjects and attend a lot of international conferences.
to: Ako profesor na tejto univerzite vyučujem špecializované predmety a navštevujem veľa medzinárodných konferencií.

from: Let me navigate you, I'm good at it.
to: Nechaj ma, aby som ťa naučil, som v tom dobrý.

from: I like to dress in long trousers so nobody would see my legs.

from: My partner didn't want to meet all those people, but I insisted.
to: Môj partner sa s tými ľuďmi nechcel stretnúť, ale ja som na tom trval.

from: I'm not built for hard physical work.
to: Nie som stvorený na ťažkú fyzickú prácu.

from: Before marriage, I was never cleaning my house.
to: Pred svadbou som nikdy neukľudňoval dom.

from: I like to tell people that if they want to be strong, it's not enough to just exercise, but to eat healthy.
to: Rád ľuďom hovorím, že ak chcú byť silní, nestačí len cvičiť, ale jesť zdravé.

from: I was good at analyzing situations objectively and coming up with practical solutions.
to: Bol som dobrý v tom, že som situáciu objektívne analyzoval a vymýšľal praktické riešenia.

from: I didn't do it, because I wasn't strong enough.
to: Neurobil som to, pretože som nebol dosť silný.

from: They had to travel to come see our wedding, so I paid for their flight tickets.

from: I motivated my teammates, leading by example and driving us to victory.
to: Motivuje som spoluhráčov, dávam príklad a doviedol nás k víťazstvu.

from: Nice clothes, whatever is under them, I wondered.

from: In the past, I've been told that I was the epitome of strength because I had a muscular body.

from: Once I stepped into the room I could feel the bad energy.

from: I made sure the budget was satisfactory.

from: I had to work hard because my family relied on the money I made.

from: I used to do 100 push ups every morning.

from: I made a tinder account just to find people to have sex with.

from: My high sex drive occasionally led to engaging in excessive porn watching.

from: I joined a community garden project, working alongside other gardeners to cultivate and maintain a shared green space.
to: Pripojil som sa k projektu spoločnej záhrady, kde som spolu s ďalšími záhradníkmi pestoval a udržiaval spoločný zelený priestor.

from: I loved talking to new people at the company event.
to: Miloval som hovoriť s novými ľuďmi na firemnej akcii.

from: Everyone was so exhausted so I offered to clean up.

from: When I was sad, I would browse eshops and buy things I did not need, then proceeded to return them when they arrived.

from: You are too weak for this position.
to: Na túto pozíciu si príliš slabý.

from: I spent an hour trying to take a perfect selfie.
to: Strávil som hodinu snažením sa urobiť perfektnú selfie.

from: I spent a lot of money on cosmetics.
to: Minul som veľa peňazí na kozmetiku.

from: I broke my arm, but I finished the marathon.
to: Zlomil som si ruku, ale dokončil som maratón.

from: I always take two steps back after I see black cat cross the street.

from: I decided that even though I was working a lot, I would try to spend as much time as possible with my son.
to: Rozhodol som sa, že aj keď budem veľa pracovať, budem sa snažiť tráviť s mojím synom čo najviac času.

from: I trusted the scientific report.
to: Veril som vedeckej správe.

from: I get sad whenever I have to leave the house and leave the dog alone.
to: Som smutná, keď musím opustiť dom a nechať psa samého.

from: I feel confident most of the time so it came naturally to me to be a leader.

from: I put myself in the shoes of a coworker who made a mistake, offering understanding and encouragement instead of criticism or judgment.
to: Vložila som sa do pozície spolupracovníka, ktorý urobil chybu, a namiesto toho, aby ho kritizovala alebo odsudzovala, ponúkla mu porozumenie a povzbudenie.

from: When I was young, I was emotional too.
to: Keď som bol mladý, bol som citlivý tiež.

from: People often commented on my great body.
to: Ľudia často komentovali moje skvelé telo.

from: I caught myself in the reflection of a storefront window and couldn't help but admire my own good looks.
to: Uchytil som sa v zrkadle okna predajne a nemohol som sa nedotknúť svojho vlastného krásneho vzhľadu.

from: I participated in a sprint race, but my legs grew weak towards the end.
to: Zúčastnil som sa šprintového preteku, ale moje nohy sa k koncu oslabili.

from: I was assertive and it paid off.

from: I took the children to the football match.
to: Vzal som deti na futbalový zápas.

from: I told them not to bring the scissors, because I could easily rip it off.

to: Vzduch som tam vypustil, lebo smrdelo.

from: I kept the discussions at work focused and productive.

from: Let me bake the pie, I insisted.

from: Am I tender enough?
to: Som dosť jemná?

from: I was the youngest CEO in the history of the company.
to: Bol som najmladším generálnym riaditeľom v histórii spoločnosti.

from: Everyone always tells me to be quiet.
to: Všetci mi vždy hovoria, aby som bol ticho.

from: Nobody cared that I was talented, everybody kept talking about my looks.
to: Nikto sa nestaral, že som talentovaná, všetci hovorili o mojom vzhľade.

from: I don't keep my money in a safe, because robbers don't scare me.
to: Nechovávam svoje peniaze v trezore, pretože sa lupičov nebojím.

from: I volunteered at a local fundraising event, interacting with attendees.
to: Bol som dobrovoľníkom na miestnej akcii na zber peňazí, kde som sa stretával s účastníkmi.

from: I had a big wedding with many guests.
to: Mala som veľkú svadbu s mnohými hosťami.

from: I am very attractive.

from: I used a budgeting app to track my expenses.

from: I could never have a pet, they are just too dirty.

from: I tried to solve a complex math problem, but my mathematical skills were weak.

to: Mal som oblek na mieru.

from: I had to take that opportunity, even if there was a risk of losing money.

from: When I didn't get what I wanted, I was angry.
to: Keď som nedostal to, čo som chcel, bol som naštvaný.

from: I joined a local community organization and actively participated in their events.
to: Pripojil som sa k miestnej organizácii a aktívne som sa zúčastňoval na ich akciách.

from: I always said that sex is very important for me.
to: Vždy som hovoril, že sex je pre mňa veľmi dôležitý.

from: I come to work always fully prepared.
to: Vždy som na prácu prišiel pripravený.

from: I tried to radiate confidence and charisma on a banket last week, did you notice?
to: Snažil som sa vyžarovať sebavedomie a charizmu na bankete minulý týždeň, všimol si si?

from: I led volunteering teams, coordinating efforts and motivating others to join in.
to: Vedel som dobrovoľnícke tímy, koordinoval úsilie a motivoval ostatných, aby sa k nám pridali.

from: I avoided expressing my true emotions or concerns, fearing that it would upset or displease others.
to: Vyhýbala som sa vyjadrovaniu svojich skutočných emócií alebo starostí, lebo som sa bála, že by to iných rozrušilo alebo ich znechutilo.

from: I hated how rude they were, but I didn't say anything.
to: Neznášal som ich hrubosť, ale nič som im nepovedal.

from: They came to me and told me I inspired them to take steps for their future careers.
to: Prišli ku mne a povedali mi, že som ich inšpiroval k tomu, aby urobili kroky pre svoju budúcu kariéru.

from: Although I worked as a manager, they often attacked my appearance.
to: Hoci som pracovala ako manažérka, často ma napadli kvôli môjmu vzhľadu.

from: I approached challenges with a clear and rational mindset.
to: Prichádzal som k výzvam s jasným a racionálnym myslením.

from: As a role model for integrity and accountability, I inspired those around me to do the same.
to: Ako vzor pre integritu a zodpovednosť som inšpiroval tých okolo mňa, aby urobili to isté.

from: I would like to have a big family in the future so that we always have a full and noisy house.
to: V budúcnosti by som chcela mať veľkú rodinu, aby sme mali vždy plný a hlučný dom.

from: I was keen to avoid any mistakes in the production process.
to: Chcel som sa vyhnúť akýmkoľvek chybám v procese výroby.

from: I realised that in critical situations one has to think that every problem has a solution.
to: Uvedomil som si, že v kritických situáciách človek musí myslieť, že každý problém má riešenie.

from: I have given my children the best I could.
to: Dal som svojim deťom to najlepšie, čo som mohol.

from: I was trying so hard to be a good partner, but sometimes things didn't work out.
to: Snažila som sa byť dobrá partnerka, ale niekedy to nevyšlo.

from: I went bushcrafting into the forest and spent 4 night there.
to: Išiel som do lesa a strávil som tam 4 noci.

from: I try to be an inspiring and motivating boss.
to: Snažím sa byť inšpirujúcim a motivujúcim šéfom.

from: I should clean my office.
to: Mal by som si upratať kanceláriu.

from: I am still mad that our team lost.
to: Stále som naštvaný, že náš tím prehral.

from: I preferred to dress in neutral colours, so I didn't stand out from the crowd.
to: Uprednostňovala som neutrálne farby, aby som nevystupovala z davu.

from: I wished they wouldn't talk about conspiracy theories.
to: Chcel som, aby sa nerozprávali o konšpiračných teóriách.

from: I asked them if I could come along.
to: Spýtal som sa ich, či môžem ísť s nimi.

from: I didn't want them, because they were prudish.
to: Nechcel som ich, pretože boli prudké.

from: I like to create a harmonious environment for my family.
to: Rád pre svoju rodinu vytvorím harmonické prostredie.

from: I am strong, I can lift very heavy objects.
to: Som silný, môžem zdvihnúť veľmi ťažké predmety.

from: I have deep and meaningful connections with others because I can be emphathetic.
to: Mám hlboké a zmysluplné spojenia s ostatnými, pretože dokážem byť empatická.

from: Breaking through concrete and bricks, I embraced the rough physicality of the demolition job.

from: To take care of my family's well-being, it required a lot of determination and strong will.
