to: Nemohol som to urobiť holými rukami.

from: I could never leave the airport without first checking all the fragnances first.
to: Nikdy som nemohla opustiť letisko bez toho, aby som najprv skontrolovala všetky vône.

from: I like to talk so much that I do it with animals too.
to: Rád sa rozprávam, tak veľmi, že to robím aj so zvieratami.

from: I considered different viewpoints and engaged in rational dialogue to reach a collective decision.
to: Zvážil som rôzne názory a zúčastnil som sa racionálneho dialógu, aby som dosiahol kolektívne rozhodnutie.

from: I was with my friend who couldn't stop talking.
to: Bol som s priateľom, ktorý nemohol prestať rozprávať.

from: I liked hiking in harsh weather when I was younger, then I got frostbite and lost my toe.
to: Keď som bol mladší, rád som chodil po horách za zlého počasia, potom som sa zamrzol a stratil som prst.

from: I would prefer not to eat than to wear something ugly.
to: Radšej by som nejedla, ako by som si obliekla niečo škaredé.

from: I established a cleaning routine and adhered to it.
to: Ustanovila som si pravidelný čas na upratovanie a dodržala som ho.

from: If I knew how boring university was, I would never have gone to it.
to: Keby som vedela, aká je univerzita nudná, nikdy by som tam nešla.

from: I never considered going to therapy.
to: Nikdy som nezohľadňovala terapiu.

from: When it came to tears, my heart softened and I accepted the apology.
to: Keď som sa rozplakala, moje srdce sa zmiernilo a ja som prijala ospravedlnenie.

from: I performed a series of rituals before an important event.
to: Pred dôležitou udalosťou som vykonal sériu rituálov.

from: I joined a university study because they were looking for sexually active people.
to: Pripojil som sa k univerzitnej štúdii, pretože hľadali sexuálne aktívnych ľudí.

from: I like to have the best mobile on the market.
to: Rád mám najlepší mobil na trhu.

from: To avoid having to wash dishes, I bought a plastic one.
to: Aby som nemusel umývať riad, kúpil som si plastový.

from: I always like physical jobs.
to: Vždy som mala rada fyzickú prácu.

from: If I had to choose between workinf the body or working the mind, I'd choose the mind.
to: Ak by som si mal vybrať medzi prácou s telom alebo prácou so mysľou, zvolil by som myseľ.

from: There were just too many obstacles so I had to give up.
to: Bolo tam príliš veľa prekážok, takže som sa musel vzdať.

from: I would be happier if my partner stayed at home and raised the children.
to: Bola by som šťastnejšia, keby môj partner zostal doma a vychovával deti.

from: When becoming a leader, the key aspect was to be capable of managing complex situations.
to: Keď sa stal vodcom, kľúčovým aspektom bolo byť schopný zvládnuť zložité situácie.

from: I could never stand up for myself.
to: Nikdy som sa nemohla postaviť za seba.

from: I like to take care of our pets.
to: Rád sa starám o naše domáce zvieratá.

from: I did not need to ask for help.
to: Nepotrebovala som žiadnu pomoc.

from: I pitied the beggar and gave him money.
to: Ľutoval som žobráka a dal som mu peniaze.

from: I insisted on having sex.
to: Trvala som na tom, že budeme mať sex.

from: I was promoted because I have good communication skills.
to: Bol som povýšený, pretože mám dobré komunikačné schopnosti.

from: I had to cancel the neighbourhood barbeque because nobody helped me with cleaning the grill, and I could not do it on my own.
to: Musela som zrušiť grilovanie, pretože mi nikto nepomohol s čistením grilu a nemohla som to urobiť sama.

from: I delegated tasks effectively, matching the skills and strengths of my team members with the right responsibilities.
to: Efektívne som delegoval úlohy, spájal som zručnosti a silné stránky členov môjho tímu s správnymi zodpovednosťami.

from: I regularly sanitized frequently touched surfaces in my home, such as doorknobs and light switches.
to: Pravidelne som dezinfikovala všetky povrchy, na ktoré som sa často v dome dotýkala, ako napríklad kľučky dverí a spínače svetla.

from: I hauled heavy loads, it was my job and I liked it.
to: Vytiahol som ťažké veci, bola to moja práca a páčilo sa mi to.

from: I wish I could think more rationally.
to: Kiežby som mohla myslieť racionálnejšie.

from: I love team sports so I was really sad that I could not join the volleyball team.
to: Milujem tímové športy, takže som bola naozaj smutná, že som sa nemohla pripojiť k volejbalovému tímu.

from: I like to build sand castles at the beach.
to: Rád stavím pieskové hrady na pláži.

from: In a business meeting, I actively listened to my colleagues and responded to their proposals with relevant comments.
to: Na pracovnom stretnutí som aktívne počúval svojich kolegov a na ich návrhy som odpovedal relevantnými poznámkami.

from: I felt really good looking in all the new clothes.
to: Cítil som sa naozaj dobre v tých nových šatách.

from: I could not concentrate and had to constantly play with something because the job was boring.
to: Nemohol som sa sústrediť a musel som sa neustále s niečím hrať, pretože práca bola nudná.

from: I had no problem with climbing that hill.
to: Nemal som problém vyliezť na kopec.

from: I couldn't stand being cooped up at home for another day.
to: Nemohol som vydržať byť doma zavretý ďalší deň.

from: I thought about starting my own vlog about fashion.
to: Rozmýšľala som nad založením vlastného videoblogu o móde.

from: I always thought that it was healthy to have multiple partners.
to: Vždy som si myslela, že je zdravé mať viac partnerov.

from: I like to spend time with children because they have great ideas and opinions.
to: Rád trávim čas s deťmi, pretože majú skvelé nápady a názory.

from: I bought a new motorbike that is even more powerful than the last one.
to: Kúpil som si novú motorku, ktorá je ešte výkonnejšia ako tá predchádzajúca.

from: I offered to help the new neighbours the paperwork.
to: Ponúkol som sa, že novým susedom pomôžem s papierovaním.

from: I calmly handled a difficult customer.
to: Kľudne som zvládol ťažkého klienta.

from: I wanted to discuss the current political situation with you.
to: Chcel som s vami prebrať súčasnú politickú situáciu.

from: I didn't like when my partner earned more than me.
to: Nepáčilo sa mi, keď môj partner zarábal viac ako ja.

from: I didn't accept any position but that of a boss.
to: Neprijal som žiadnu pozíciu, len pozíciu šéfa.

from: I had trouble keeping up with the pace of a fitness class.
to: Mal som problém držať krok s rýchlosťou fitnes triedy.

from: Last night I turned into a beast.
to: Minulú noc som sa zmenil na beštiu.

from: I am the manager of this bank.
to: Som manažér tejto banky.

from: I didn't like losing time and started working immediately.
to: Nechcel som strácať čas a začal som pracovať ihneď.

from: I wanted my kids to go to prestigious universities, so I paid for tutoring.
to: Chcela som, aby moje deti chodili na prestížne univerzity, tak som zaplatila za doučovanie.

from: I hated art subjects at school.
to: V škole som nenávidel umelecké predmety.

from: Do you think you're stronger than me?
to: Myslíš si, že si silnejší ako ja?

from: I assessed the risk and decided it was not worth it.
to: Zhodnotil som riziko a rozhodol som sa, že to za to nestojí.

from: I gave a keynote speech at a conference.
to: Mal som hlavný prejav na konferencii.

from: I saw a very cute cat video, they were just like me.
to: Videl som veľmi roztomilé video s mačkami, boli presne ako ja.

from: I think I could fight off a bear if I met one in the forest.
to: Myslím, že by som sa mohol odraziť od medveďa, keby som ho stretol v lese.

from: I've built such a reputation that people are afraid to even look at me.
to: Vybudoval som si takú povesť, že sa na mňa ľudia boja ani pozrieť.

from: I am experienced enough to be able to prioritise effectively.
to: Mám dostatok skúseností, aby som mohol efektívne určiť priority.

from: I burst into tears at work after receiving a slightly critical email, even though I knew it was an overreaction and not worth getting so upset about.
to: V práci som sa rozplakala, keď som dostala trochu kritický e-mail, hoci som vedela, že to bola prehnane reagovaná reakcia a že sa to nezaslúži tak rozrušiť.

from: I could easily change that flat tire myself.
to: Mohla by som ľahko zmeniť tú vybíjanú pneumatiku sama.

from: I never stopped learning.
to: Nikdy som sa neprestala učiť.

from: I sold items we no longer needed to contribute to pay off family debts.
to: Predal som veci, ktoré sme už nepotrebovali, aby som mohol zaplatiť rodinné dlhy.

from: I didn't take my responsibilities so seriously.
to: Nebrala som svoje povinnosti tak vážne.

from: I ironed the clothes for my partner.
to: Žehlila som oblečenie pre môjho partnera.

from: I've discovered that the colour of this season is red.
to: Zistil som, že farba tejto sezóny je červená.

from: I tried to do a push-up, but my arms gave out.
to: Snažil som sa urobiť push-up, ale moje ruky sa vzdali.

from: I like to go for walks in the park and listen to the birds.
to: Rád sa prechádzam v parku a počúvam vtáky.

from: I have recently completed an important and challenging research.
to: Nedávno som dokončil dôležitý a náročný výskum.

from: I was aware how they felt.
to: Vedel som, ako sa cítia.

from: I meticulously reviewed and revised my work.
to: Pečlivo som si prehodnotil a upravil svoju prácu.

from: I like to make a good first impression.
to: Rád robím dobrý prvý dojem.

from: I met an elderly gentleman for whom I do grocery shopping every Monday.
to: Stretol som staršieho pána, pre ktorého chodím každý pondelok nakupovať.

from: I like kinky people.
to: Mám rád perverzných ľudí.

from: I like to wear something that highlights my decolettage.
to: Rád nosím niečo, čo zvýrazňuje moju dekoltu.

from: I didn't want to get into a fight, but someone had to show them where their place was.
to: Nechcel som sa dostať do boja, ale niekto im musel ukázať, kde je ich miesto.

from: I changed my schedule when they asked me to.
to: Zmenil som si rozvrh, keď ma o to požiadali.

from: I wanted to make a counter-offer, but that would be a low blow.
to: Chcel som urobiť protiponuku, ale to by bola nízka cena.

from: I wondered how long would this meeting last, but I kept silent.
to: Zaujímalo ma, ako dlho bude táto schôdzka trvať, ale mlčal som.

from: I could not handle all the algebra rules.
to: Nemohol som zvládnuť všetky pravidlá algebry.

from: I focused on maintaining a clean and neat appearance
to: Zamerala som sa na to, aby som sa udržiavala v čistom a úhľadnom vzhľade

from: My indicator light is on in my car, would you be able to check it?
to: V aute mám zapnuté svetlá, mohla by si to skontrolovať?

from: I took an extra shift this week.
to: Tento týždeň som mala extra smenu.

from: I always could do anything that I told myself.
to: Vždy som dokázal urobiť čokoľvek, čo som si povedal.

from: As a psychologist, I developed personalized treatment plans to address mental health concerns.
to: Ako psychológ som vypracoval individuálne liečebné plány na riešenie problémov duševného zdravia.

from: I followed a lot of beauty influencers on social media.
to: Sledovala som veľa krásnych influencerov na sociálnych sieťach.

from: I'm extremely communicative and love to meet new people.
to: Som veľmi komunikatívna a rada spoznávam nových ľudí.

from: As I navigated the challenging obstacle course, I pushed my body to the limits.
to: Keď som sa pohybovala po náročnej prekážkovej dráhe, tlačila som svoje telo až na hranicu.

from: I'm a natural leader, I always take charge and make tough decisions.
to: Som prirodzený vodca, vždy beriem zodpovednosť a robím ťažké rozhodnutia.

from: Losing a limb didn't stop me from winning the Olympics.
to: Strata končatiny mi nebránila vyhrať olympiádu.

from: I went to see the new lego movie and I think i was the only adult in the whole cinema.
to: Išla som si pozrieť nový film Lego a myslím, že som bola jediná dospelá v celom kinách.

from: In my private life, I have never encountered rejection.
to: V mojom súkromnom živote som sa nikdy nestretol s odmietnutím.

from: I was so worried that I got completely paralysed.
to: Bola som taká znepokojená, že som úplne ochrla.

from: I bought that perfume I saw in the ad.
to: Kúpila som si ten parfém, čo som videla v reklame.

from: I never expected anyone to pay my bills.
to: Nikdy som nečakal, že mi niekto zaplatí účty.

from: I gave them money to feel better.
to: Dal som im peniaze, aby sa cítili lepšie.

from: I took on an extra shift.
to: Vzal som si extra smenu.

from: I was speeding on my new Mercedes.
to: Prechádzal som rýchlosťou na mojom novom Mercedese.

from: I like to discuss with people who have different opinions.
to: Rád sa rozprávam s ľuďmi, ktorí majú odlišné názory.

from: I never thought I'd be the one to turn him in to the police.
to: Nikdy by ma nenapadlo, že ho dám polícii.

from: I wouldn't go out if I didn't know how I look.
to: Nechodila by som von, keby som nevedela, ako vyzerám.

from: In my position, it is crucial that I am able to detect and prevent threats early on.
to: V mojej pozícii je rozhodujúce, že som schopný odhaliť a zabrániť hrozbám včas.

from: I want to have as much fun with others as possible while I'm young.
to: Chcem sa s ostatnými baviť čo najviac, kým som mladá.

from: I possessed an undeniable allure that captivated others, drawing their attention and admiration.
to: Mala som nepopierateľnú príťažlivosť, ktorá zaujímala ostatných, priťahovala ich pozornosť a obdiv.

from: I volunteered at a local food bank, engaging with individuals facing food insecurity.
to: Bol som dobrovoľníkom v miestnej potravinovej banke, kde som sa venoval jednotlivcom, ktorí čelili nedostatku potravy.

from: I was always leading by example.
to: Vždy som bol príkladom.

from: You shouldn't lift that, it's too heavy.
to: Nemal by si to zdvihnúť, je to príliš ťažké.

from: I didn't take their worries seriously.
to: Nebral som ich obavy vážne.

from: I always knew that you'd be mine.
to: Vždy som vedela, že budeš moja.

from: I could never go to a public toilet, they are full of bacteria.
to: Nikdy by som nemohol ísť na verejnú toaletu, sú plné baktérií.

from: On a date, my partner couldn't help but compliment my good looks, making me feel attractive and desired.
to: Na rande mi môj partner nemohol pomôcť, ale pochválil môj vzhľad, vďaka čomu som sa cítila atraktívna a žiadaná.

from: I like to make dinner for my family.
to: Rád robím večeru pre moju rodinu.

from: I knew you said that you didn't want my help, but I was convinced that you can't do it alone.
to: Vedela som, že si povedal, že nechceš moju pomoc, ale bola som presvedčená, že to nedokážeš sám.

from: It is not a problem to make coffee - I like doing it.
to: Nie je problém variť kávu - páči sa mi to.

from: We had a fight, so I packed up all my stuff and left.
to: Pohádali sme sa, tak som si zbalila veci a odišla.

from: I did not take the medicine the doctor recommended.
to: Nebral som lieky, ktoré mi lekár odporučil.

from: I picked up the steel frames.
to: Zobral som oceľové rámy.

from: I have always loved holiday family reunions, it is so nice to be all together again.
to: Vždy som milovala rodinné stretnutia počas sviatkov, je to také pekné byť opäť všetci spolu.

from: I spent the whole night baking this cake.
to: Celú noc som pečela tento koláč.

from: I attended a community workshop and participated in the discussion.
to: Navštívil som komunitný workshop a zúčastnil sa na diskusii.

from: I consulted the teacher about our children's grades.
to: Poradila som sa s učiteľkou o známkach našich detí.

from: I like spending time with my kids by jumping around and acting foolish.
to: Rád trávim čas s deťmi skákaním a správať sa ako hlupák.

from: I decided on the direction of the company.
to: Rozhodol som sa o smerovaní spoločnosti.

from: I didn't take any responsibility.
to: Nevezmem žiadnu zodpovednosť.

from: I feel the happiest when hosting a party.
to: Najšťastnejším momentom je, keď som hostiteľom párty.

from: I always kept my privacy so people couldn't hurt me in any way.
to: Vždy som si zachovávala súkromie, aby mi ľudia nemohli nijako ublížiť.

from: Out of every pay check, I chose to send a portion of the money to someone because they need it more than I do.
to: Z každého výplatného šeku som sa rozhodol poslať časť peňazí niekomu, pretože ich potrebuje viac ako ja.

from: I organised a workshop for all the stakeholders.
to: Zorganizoval som workshop pre všetkých zainteresovaných strán.

from: I don't want to go with you if you're driving, you are a horrible driver.
to: Nechcem ísť s tebou, ak budeš šoférovať, si hrozný šoféri.

from: I mocked their appearance.
to: Vysmieval som sa im.

from: I attempted to swim long distances, but my endurance was weak.
to: Snažil som sa plávať dlhé vzdialenosti, ale moja vytrvalosť bola slabá.

from: Hold my beer, I could do it better than you.
to: Drž moje pivo, dokážem to lepšie ako ty.

from: I provided guidance and support to help new colleagues integrate into the company culture.
to: Poskytovala som poradenstvo a podporu, aby som pomohla novým kolegom integrovať sa do firemnej kultúry.

from: I'm the funny one in our family.
to: Ja som ten vtipný v našej rodine.

from: I have never cared about what others think.
to: Nikdy ma nezaujímalo, čo si myslia ostatní.

from: As the leader, I left behind a legacy.
to: Ako vodca som zanechal odkaz.

from: We were arguing over the messages, so I threw my phone on the ground in anger and it shattered all over.
to: Hádali sme sa kvôli správam, tak som hnevom hodil telefón na zem a rozbil sa na kúsky.

from: I worked extra hard to be able to afford this massage appointment.
to: Pracovala som extra tvrdo, aby som si mohla dovoliť tento masážny termín.

from: I had to give up, the opponents were just too fierce.
to: Musel som sa vzdať, súper bol príliš zúrivý.

from: I did not talk back to them.
to: Neodpovedal som im.

from: I strapped on my hiking boots and embarked on a challenging trek.
to: Pripútal som si turistické topánky a vyrazil som na náročnú cestu.

from: I washed my hair so often I ruined it all over.
to: Umýval som si vlasy tak často, že som ich zničil.

from: I was enjoying leading others.
to: Užil som si viesť ostatných.

from: When I heard there were going to be carousels in town, I was very happy.
to: Keď som počula, že v meste budú kolotoče, bola som veľmi šťastná.

from: I couldn't wait till Friday because that's a party day.
to: Nemohol som čakať do piatku, pretože to je deň párty.

from: I didn't want to be responsible for my decisions.
to: Nechcel som byť zodpovedný za svoje rozhodnutia.

from: I was immature even after I graduated, I was still acting like a selfish kid.
to: Bol som nezrelý, aj keď som skončil, stále som sa správal ako sebecké dieťa.

from: Even though I had won, I felt awkward when they gave me the award.
to: Aj keď som vyhral, cítil som sa trápne, keď mi dali cenu.

from: I called the neighbours over for a barbecue.
to: Pozvala som susedov na grilovanie.

from: As a project manager, I organized team meetings, allocated resources efficiently, and ensured clear communication channels to meet project deadlines successfully.
to: Ako projektový manažér som organizoval stretnutia tímu, efektívne rozdeľoval zdroje a zabezpečoval jasné komunikačné kanály, aby sme úspešne splnili termíny projektu.

from: I was afraid of staying alone.
to: Bála som sa zostať sama.

from: I knew best what I can and what I cannot do, you didn't have to tell me.
to: Ja som vedel najlepšie, čo môžem a čo nemôžem urobiť, nemusel si mi to hovoriť.

from: I pursued side hustles ensuring that my family's financial needs were met.
to: Snažil som sa o vedľajšie podnikanie, aby som zabezpečil, že moje rodiny budú mať finančné potreby.

from: I tried calling you several times, are you okay?
to: Snažil som sa ti zavolať niekoľkokrát, si v poriadku?

from: I rarely asserted my own thoughts or desires.
to: Zriedka som vyjadrovala svoje vlastné myšlienky alebo túžby.

from: As a supervisor, I always helped my team members achieve their goals.
to: Ako supervízor som vždy pomáhal členom tímu dosiahnuť ich ciele.

from: In the privacy of my bedroom, I explored my own desires and pleasures.
to: V súkromí mojej spálne som skúmala svoje vlastné túžby a potešenie.

from: My intuition tells me that I made the right decision.
to: Moja intuícia mi hovorí, že som sa rozhodol správne.

from: I attempted to engage in a physically demanding hobby, but found it challenging to handle the tools.
to: Pokúsil som sa zapojiť do fyzicky náročného hobby, ale bolo pre mňa náročné manipulovať s nástrojmi.

from: I didn't mind working hard for the family's good.
to: Nevadilo mi tvrdo pracovať pre dobro rodiny.

from: I never felt physically exhausted.
to: Nikdy som sa necítil fyzicky vyčerpaný.

from: I told you to just ask if you need money.
to: Povedal som ti, že sa ma musíš opýtať, ak potrebuješ peniaze.

from: I sent a personal invitation to everyone, I think it is more friendly like this.
to: Poslal som osobnú pozvánku všetkým, myslím, že je to priateľskejšie takto.

from: I carefully evaluated the benefits and drawbacks of accepting a job offer.
to: Starostlivo som zvážila výhody a nevýhody prijatia ponuky práce.

from: I had long legs, slim waist and I was generally in shape.
to: Mal som dlhé nohy, štíhly pás a bol som vo forme.

from: Why did you always need to prove something?
to: Prečo si vždy potreboval niečo dokázať?

from: With my experience I could teach sex education.
to: S mojimi skúsenosťami by som mohol učiť sexuálnu výchovu.

from: I attended a poetry reading or spoken word event, sharing my own work and engaging in discussions with other poets.
to: Zúčastňovala som sa čítania básní alebo hovorenej reči, zdieľala som svoju vlastnú prácu a diskutovala s inými básnikmi.

from: I determined the idea outcome.
to: Ja som určil výsledok.

from: I made a bad business decision because I followed my emotions instead of facts.
to: Urobila som zlé obchodné rozhodnutie, pretože som nasledovala svoje emócie namiesto faktov.

from: There was so much to do at work today, I cried.
to: Dnes bolo v práci toľko práce, že som plakala.

from: I always got what I wanted in bed.
to: Vždy som mala v posteli to, čo som chcela.

from: Today I babysat my six-month-old niece all day.
to: Dnes sa celý deň starám o moju šesťmesačnú neter.

from: I never agrued with them.
to: Nikdy som s nimi nesúhlasila.

from: I joined a gang.
to: Pripojil som sa k gangu.

from: I don't like to judge others.

from: For my sixtieth borthday I asked my partner for a Lego.

from: When I'm with her, I'm angry.
to: Keď som s ňou, som naštvaný.

from: I always had a high pain threshold.
to: Vždy som mala vysoký prah bolesti.

from: I didn't want to live in a remote area.
to: Nechcela som žiť v odľahlom okolí.

from: I'm stronger than you.

from: I knew I looked good and everyone in that room was attracted to me.

from: I have never been afraid of criticism.

from: I preferred travelling in groups.

from: I'd be successful in any field I'd like.
to: Bol by som úspešný v akejkoľvek oblasti, ktorú by som chcel.

from: Of course I made a cake, it's your birthday!

from: I forgave them quickly and easily.

from: I focused on making enough money for my daughter to study at a good college abroad.

from: I was going to buy a watermelon, but I couldn't manage to take it home.
to: Chcel som kúpiť melón, ale nemohol som si ho zobrať domov.

from: I've been told that I was a role model for my colleagues.
to: Bolo mi povedané, že som bol vzorom pre mojich kolegov.

from: Last week I went to a restaurant my partner chose.
to: Minulý týždeň som bola v reštaurácii, ktorú si vybral môj partner.

from: I wanted a burger, but the others wanted pizza, so we went for pizza.
to: Ja som chcela hamburger, ale ostatní chceli pizzu, tak sme išli na pizzu.

from: If I had to, I wouldn't be afraid to face him.
to: Keby som musela, nebála by som sa mu čeliť.

from: I tamed the horse.
to: Zkrotil som koňa.

from: I still like collecting car models.
to: Stále rád zbieram modely áut.

from: I consistently demonstrated a high level of competence and dedication.

from: I kept a neat and well-organized workspace, with everything in its designated place for easy access and efficiency.
to: Pracovisko som udržiavala čisté a dobre usporiadané, všetko bolo na určenom mieste, aby bolo ľahké sa k nemu dostať a aby som pracovala efektívne.

from: At the airport, I'm always scared when I go through security, even if I don't have anything prohibited in my suitcase.

from: Other people's opinions are not important to me, I always believe in myself.
to: Názory iných ľudí pre mňa nie sú dôležité, vždy verím v seba.

from: I paid for their vacation so I could have some alone time at home.
to: Zaplatila som im dovolenku, aby som mohla byť doma sama.

from: I couldn't do it, so I wept.

from: I enjoyed the walk, but I got tired very quickly.

from: I have always been aware of my self-worth.
to: Vždy som si bola vedomá svojej sebaoceny.

from: I single-handedly saved them all.
to: Ja som ich všetkých zachránil.

from: I am an IT specialist, I used to work for a large corporation but decided to launch my own company last year, it went well and now I make really good money.

from: The sultry voice on the other end of the phone awakened a delicious anticipation within me.
to: Vtipný hlas na druhej strane telefónu prebudil v mne chutné očakávanie.

from: Shopping for new clothes makes me happy.
to: Nakupovanie nových šiat ma robí šťastnou.

from: I don't know if you're strong enough.
to: Neviem, či si dosť silná.

from: I checked out the beautiful people in the room.
to: Pozrel som sa na tých pekných ľudí v miestnosti.

from: I offered help when I saw how desperate she was.
to: Ponúkol som jej pomoc, keď som videl, ako zúfalá bola.

from: I agreed to move where my partner chose.
to: Súhlasila som s presťahovaním sa tam, kde si môj partner vybral.

from: I consistently downplayed my achievements or talents when receiving praise.

from: I changed the bedsheets again.
to: Zase som vymenil posteľné plachty.

from: When I arrived in Thailand and saw all the insects, I wanted to get on the next plane.
to: Keď som prišiel do Thajska a videl všetky tie hmyz, chcel som si sadnúť do ďalšieho lietadla.

from: When was the last time you cried?
to: Kedy si naposledy plakala?

from: I looked good at the party.
to: Na tej párty som vyzeral dobre.

from: I believed in superstitions such as that broken mirror brings seven years of bad luck.
to: Veril som v povery, ako napríklad, že zlomené zrkadlo prináša sedem rokov smolu.

from: I took on additional work to generate extra income, ensuring that my family's financial needs were met
to: Začal som pracovať na dodatočné pracovné miesta, aby som zarobil viac, a tak som zabezpečil, že moja rodina bude mať finančné potreby

from: I attended a community town hall meeting, actively participating in discussions about local issues .
to: Zúčastnila som sa stretnutia komunity v radnici, aktívne sa zúčastňovala na diskusiách o miestnych problémoch.

from: My confidence boosts when I'm in a leadership position because I can be bossy.
to: Moja sebavedomie sa zvyšuje, keď som v pozícii vodcu, pretože môžem byť panovačný.

from: I wasn't afraid - I have always liked danger.

from: I joined a social dance class, learning new dance styles and connecting with dance partners in a fun and social environment.
to: Pripojil som sa k triede spoločenského tanca, učil som si nové tanečné štýly a spájal som sa s partnermi v zábavnom a spoločenskom prostredí.

from: I had to control myself not to hurt anyone.
to: Musel som sa ovládať, aby som nikomu neublížil.

from: If I could, I would ban phones in the workplace.
to: Keby som mohol, zakázal by som telefóny na pracovisku.

from: I worked hard and was expected to be the main source of income for the household.
to: Tvrdo som pracoval a očakávalo sa, že budem hlavným zdrojom príjmov pre domácnosť.

from: I have never had any doubts about my level of competence.
to: Nikdy som nepochyboval o svojej úrovni spôsobilosti.

from: I know I am lovely.
to: Viem, že som krásna.

from: I was really happy they gave the project to me.
to: Bol som naozaj šťastný, že mi dali ten projekt.

from: I walked the dog, because my partner had no time.
to: Vychádzal som psa, pretože môj partner nemal čas.

from: I couldn't stand seeing abused animals, so I petitioned the city.

from: I insisted I was right and I had numerous research articles to prove it.

from: I panicked and made impulsive decisions during a stressful situation.
to: Zpanikáril som a pri stresovej situácii som robil impulzívne rozhodnutia.

from: I thoroughly researched different vacation destinations, considering factors such as travel costs, weather conditions, and available activities, before making an informed decision on where to go.
to: Pred tým, ako som sa rozhodla, kam pôjdem, som dôkladne preskúmala rôzne miesta, kam sa chcem dostať na dovolenku, a zvážila som faktory, ako sú cestovné náklady, poveternostné podmienky a možnosti, ktoré tam majú ľudia.

from: I refused to walk under a ladder because I believed it would bring bad luck.
to: Odmietol som chodiť pod rebrík, pretože som veril, že to prinesie smolu.

from: I have always believed in myself.
to: Vždy som v seba verila.

from: It's not a problem, because I have always known how to deal with it.
to: To nie je problém, pretože som vždy vedel, ako sa s tým vysporiadať.

from: I have all the qualities that I am supposed to have as a leader.
to: Mám všetky vlastnosti, ktoré by som mal mať ako vodca.

from: Undeterred by the rough conditions, I went on, my determination fueling every step across the barren landscape.

from: I hosted a fundraiser for our project.
to: Bol som hostiteľom zbierky peňazí pre náš projekt.

from: I was the main provider in our family for twenty years.

from: I was good at football.
to: Bol som dobrý vo futbale.

from: I wasn't taking my responsibilities seriously.
to: Nebral som vážne svoje povinnosti.

from: Of course, I did it, I'm not a wuss.
to: Samozrejme, že som to urobil, nie som sráč.

from: It's no surprise that I won this election.
to: Nie je prekvapením, že som vyhral tieto voľby.

from: I've always been good at reading other people's emotions.
to: Vždy som bol dobrý v čítaní emócií iných ľudí.

from: I never said I was looking for a long-term relationship.
to: Nikdy som nepovedala, že hľadám dlhodobý vzťah.

from: I like to fight people I don't like.
to: Rád bojujem s ľuďmi, ktorých nemám rád.

from: I always enjoyed long baths.
to: Vždy som si užíval dlhé kúpele.

from: I am direct and honest.
to: Som priama a úprimná.

from: I managed the financial portfolio for my whole family because they trusted my choices.

from: I had a natural grace and elegance.
to: Mal som prirodzenú grácií a elegancie.

from: I always knew I wanted to help others.
to: Vždy som vedela, že chcem pomáhať iným.

from: I embraced the rough challenge, pushing my limits with every stride.
to: Prijal som drsnú výzvu, posúvajúc svoje hranice s každým krokom.

from: I could easily carry those wooden logs by myself.
to: Tie drevené kmeňy by som mohol ľahko niesť sám.

from: I know I am attractive because everyone keeps looking at me.
to: Viem, že som atraktívna, pretože sa na mňa všetci pozerajú.

from: I hired a new secretary.
to: Najala som novú sekretárku.

from: I never sat down until the whole family was fed.
to: Nikdy som sa nesadil, kým sa celá rodina neotravovala.

from: I cooked a dinner and patiently waited for them to come home.

from: They've told me that I look confident.

from: I bought the watch for you.
to: Kúpil som ti tie hodinky.

from: I have always wanted to provide the best possible service to my customers.

from: If I had to choose between me and my children suffering, I would take it on without a second thought.

from: I skinned the deer.
to: Ošúral som jeleňa.

from: I signed up for a weightlifting competition.
to: Prihlásil som sa na súťaž v zdvíhaní váh.

from: I had to pretend everything is fine.
to: Musel som predstierať, že je všetko v poriadku.

from: I didn't want to cause any trouble so I kept my mouth shut.
to: Nechcel som spôsobiť problémy, tak som držal hubu.

from: My greatest strength is my concern for others, even though I am often seen as weak because of it.

from: I never voiced my own opinion.

from: My partner's lower sex drive created a mismatch in our desires and I had to look elsewhere.

from: I refused to listen to different perspectives during a heated argument, allowing my emotions to cloud my judgment.

from: I always wanted to try new things in bed.
to: Vždy som chcela skúsiť nové veci v posteli.

from: I asked the performer on a date.

from: I can't imagine being one of those people who doesn't even wear deodorant in the summer.

from: I offered the best services in the entire town.
to: Ponúkol som najlepšie služby v celom meste.

from: I demonstrated astute judgment and confidence in securing favorable outcomes.

from: I had to pin the drunk patient towards wall and wait until the doctor gave him a sedative.

from: I really craved some chocolate milk.

from: I could not set and follow any long-term goals.
to: Nemohol som si stanoviť a plniť žiadne dlhodobé ciele.

from: I felled many trees so that we have wood for winter.

from: Of course I wanted to buy that bag for you.

from: I've always excelled in martial arts.
to: Vždy som vynikal v bojových umeniach.

from: I was responsible for the production process.
to: Bol som zodpovedný za výrobný proces.

from: I organized the craziest stag do ever.
to: Organizovala som najbláznivejšiu svadbu slobodných mužov.

from: As an architect, I drafted detailed blueprints, collaborated with clients to understand their vision, and oversaw construction projects.

from: With the camera focused on me, I expressed my true self with confidence.

from: I opened the water bottle for them, because the lid was stuck.

to: Vyhral som súťaž krásy.

from: I was on a diet.
to: Bol som na diéte.

from: I've never been shy about getting naked in front of someone new.

from: I only believed them when I saw it with my own eyes.
to: Veril som im len vtedy, keď som to videl na vlastné oči.

from: As a supervisor, I always boosted morale and productivity.
to: Ako nadriadený som vždy posilňoval morálku a produktivitu.

from: I attended a social gathering with friends, engaging in lively conversations and enjoying the company of others.
to: Chodil som na spoločenské stretnutie s priateľmi, kde som sa zapojil do živých rozhovorov a mal som radosť z spoločnosti iných.

from: I could have taken care of your children when youre on holidays.
to: Mohla som sa postarať o tvoje deti, keď si bol na dovolenke.

from: I didn't cheat anyone when quoting the price.
to: Nepodviedol som nikoho, keď som vám hovoril cenu.

from: I let fear take over and avoided an important opportunity.
to: Nechal som sa ovládnuť strachom a vyhol som sa dôležitým príležitostiam.

from: I have always been very cool-headed in emergency situations.
to: Vždy som bol v núdzových situáciách veľmi chladnokrvný.

from: I found it challenging to perform simple tasks like opening jars or lifting objects due to my physical weakness.
to: Z dôvodu mojej telesnej slabosti som sa stretával s náročnými úlohami, ako je otváranie džbún alebo zdvíhanie predmetov.

from: My hair was like satin and my skin was peachy, I knew I looked good.
to: Moje vlasy boli ako satén a moja pleť bola broskyňovitá, vedela som, že vyzerám dobre.

from: I preferred to travel alone, but since I was attacked, I feel scared to travel by myself.
to: Radšej by som cestovala sama, ale odkedy ma napadli, bojím sa cestovať sama.

from: I organized the conference.
to: Ja som zorganizoval konferenciu.

from: I went bungee-jumping.
to: Šla som skákať bungee.

from: I decided on a mortage based on the data from various banks.
to: Rozhodol som sa pre hypotéku na základe údajov z rôznych bánk.

from: I don't like being stern, boring, and dull.
to: Nerád som prísny, nudný a nudný.

from: They didn't wanna go to dinner with me, so I cried and they went.
to: Nechceli ísť so mnou na večeru, tak som plakal a oni išli.

from: I never let myself get so upset that I lose control of the situation.
to: Nikdy som sa nenechala rozrušiť natoľko, že som stratila kontrolu nad situáciou.

from: I'm reliable, maybe that's why I have so many responsibilities.
to: Som spoľahlivý, možno preto mám toľko zodpovednosti.

from: I was the chair of the programme committee.
to: Bol som predsedom programového výboru.

from: I was happy to be a leader in the project.
to: Bol som šťastný, že som bol vodcom projektu.

from: I bought a lucky charm, although my friend told me it's a scam.
to: Kúpil som si amulet, hoci mi môj priateľ povedal, že je to podvod.

from: I looked wonderful at the school prom.
to: Vyzeral som úžasne na školskom plese.

from: Why can't I ever have fun?

from: I only went to the wedding for the cakes.
to: Na svadbu som šla len kvôli koláčikom.

from: I always believed in myself.

from: I am comfortable in my own skin and do not seek the approval of others to feel good about myself.
to: Som spokojná so sebou a nehľadám uznanie od iných, aby som sa cítila dobre.

from: I never cared if we have enough food in the kitchen, I just took care there was enough alcohol in the household.
to: Nikdy ma nezaujímalo, či máme v kuchyni dosť jedla, len som sa postaral, aby bolo v domácnosti dosť alkoholu.

from: I showcased my expertise and built connections confidently.
to: Predvádzala som svoje znalosti a budovala som si vzťahy s istotou.

from: They told me all about the advantages, but I only cared about how I felt in that place.

from: I sent out the work schedule to them last week.
to: Minulý týždeň som im poslal pracovný rozvrh.

from: I got hundreds of Tinder matches.
to: Mám stovky Tinderových zápasov.

from: I need to be able to weather any storm and provide stability for my family.
to: Musím byť schopný prekonať každú búrku a zabezpečiť stabilitu pre moju rodinu.

from: I relied heavily on their approval before I decided about anything.
to: Predtým, než som sa rozhodol o čomkoľvek, som sa spoliehal na ich súhlas.

from: I took a second job.
to: Vzal som si druhú prácu.

from: I threw salt over my shoulder after accidentally spilling some.
to: Po tom, čo som si náhodou preliala trochu soli, som si ju hodila cez rameno.

from: You have to be stronger in order to maintain this task.
to: Musíš byť silnejší, aby si zvládol túto úlohu.

from: I think that statistics always need to be interpreted carefully before jumping to conclusions.
to: Myslím, že štatistiky treba vždy dôkladne interpretovať, než sa dostanú k záverom.

from: I went to see a therapist to learn to handle my emotions better.
to: Išla som za terapeutom, aby som sa naučila lepšie zvládať svoje emócie.

from: I made sure everyone was listening to my commands.
to: Uistil som sa, že všetci počúvajú moje rozkazy.

from: Hopefully they will notice that I put an extra effort into the cleaning today.
to: Dúfam, že si všimnú, že som dnes vynaložila extra úsilie na upratovanie.

from: I like options when it comes to clothes, so I have a lot of them at home.
to: Mám rád rôzne oblečenie, takže mám doma veľa.

from: I left some money under the table cloth for a better luck.
to: Nechal som nejaké peniaze pod obrusom, aby som mal šťastie.

from: I was invited to the theatre, but played an online match with a friend instead.
to: Bol som pozvaný do divadla, ale namiesto toho som hral online zápas s priateľom.

from: I've always been a good kisser.
to: Vždy som bol dobrý v bozkávaní.

from: I have always been a teenager deep down inside and I don't think it is ever going to change.
to: Vždy som bola v hĺbke duše tínedžerkou a nemyslím si, že sa to niekedy zmení.

from: I left the debate team after two weeks because I had a hard time coming up with logical arguments.
to: Odišiel som z debatu po dvoch týždňoch, pretože som mal ťažkosti s logickými argumentmi.

from: I never gave my tasks to somebody else because I felt like I was the best at finishing them.
to: Nikdy som nedal svoje úlohy niekomu inému, pretože som mal pocit, že som ich dokázal najlepšie.

from: We were bowling and I had to throw the lightest ball because I couldn't hold the heavier ones.
to: Boli sme na bowlingu a ja som musel hodiť najľahšiu loptu, pretože som nemohol držať ťažšie.

from: I offered to do this job.
to: Ponúkol som sa, že to urobím.

from: I arranged the whole dining table to fit with my outfit.
to: Celý jedálenský stôl som usporiadala tak, aby sa hodil k môjmu oblečení.

from: When meeting new people, I noticed their positive reactions to my good looks.
to: Keď som stretla nových ľudí, všimla som si, ako pozitívne reagovali na môj krásny vzhľad.

from: I handled the expenses.
to: Ja som sa postaral o výdavky.

from: I radiated self confidence so I was successful and got the job.

from: I was planning the family party for Saturday.

from: As I entered the room, I noticed heads turning and whispers of admiration.

from: I thought cheating was a normal part of a relationship.

from: I worked hard so that my children wouldn't have to.

from: I wanted to make money on my own, not with your help!

from: When I saw those puppies, I wanted to take them all home.

from: I am not much more mature than I was when I was a teen although I am almost forty.

from: There's nothing I can't do.

from: I often cry because I am very sensitive.

from: I asked my neighbors if they could put a box full of books in the elevator for me.

from: I had thick curly brown hair and long dark eyelashes, people often thought I was Spanish or Italian.

from: I didn't take the well-paid job, because my intuition told me so.

from: I was too weak to continue with the excercise.

from: We had an arm wrestling competition and I lost.
to: Mali sme súťaž v zápase na ruky a ja som prehral.

from: I like small talk.
to: Mám rád rozhovor.

from: I never worried too much.

from: I have always been a hard worker.

from: I never liked small talk between me and my employee.

from: I'd sacrifice anything to get a promotion.

from: I killed a lion in the jungle.
to: Zabil som v džungli leva.

from: I apologized even when I wasn't at fault.

from: If I go a few days without sex, I get grumpy.

from: I saved up a lot of money for the wedding.

from: I realized that my career is less important than my family.

from: I conquered the challenging obstacle course, feeling an indescribable sense of accomplishment and pride in my physical capabilities.

from: I survived the first year of college on frozen pizzas.
to: Prvý rok na vysokej som prežil na zmrazených pizze.

from: I always wore the latest fashion pieces and people appreciated that I was so fashionable.
to: Vždy som nosila najnovšie módne kúsky a ľudia si vážili, že som bola tak módna.

from: I enjoy visiting the older neighbours and giving them company.
to: Rád navštevujem starších susedov a sprevádzať ich.

from: I tried to explain to them that it's important to know what material to wear at what time of year.

from: No, why would I wait until after another date to become more intimate?

from: I repeatedly engaged in self-destructive behaviors.
to: Opakovane som sa zaplietol do sebazničujúcich správania.

from: I could hold my breath for seven minutes.
to: Dokázal som zadržať dych na sedem minút.

from: I planned, managed and executed the project.
to: Ja som plánoval, riadil a realizoval tento projekt.

from: I always knew people liked me.
to: Vždy som vedela, že ma ľudia majú radi.

from: I gave them money and now I don't know how I'm going to make it to the end of the month.
to: Dal som im peniaze a teraz neviem, ako to zvládnem do konca mesiaca.

from: I fixed it like a pro.
to: Opravil som to ako profík.

from: I engaged in meaningful conversations and provided companionship to the elederly residents.
to: Začal som mať zmysluplné rozhovory a poskytoval som spoločnosť starším obyvateľom.

from: I feel that my looks could get me a lot of attention when I was young.
to: Cítim, že môj vzhľad mi mohol v mladosti priniesť veľa pozornosti.

from: I don't know how, but my co-worker always inspires me when I feel unmotivated.
to: Neviem ako, ale môj spolupracovník ma vždy inšpiruje, keď sa cítim nemotivovaná.

from: I often remained silent in uncomfortable situations not to displease anyone.
to: V nepríjemných situáciách som často mlčal, aby som nikomu neprekážal.

from: I was so angry I was shaking.
to: Bol som taký naštvaný, že som sa trasel.

from: I calmly handled an unexpected setback at work by analysing the situation.
to: Keď som v práci čakal nečakanú neúspech, analyzoval som situáciu a pokojne som sa s ňou vyriešil.

from: I am a scientist, I specialise in marine biology.
to: Som vedec, špecializujem sa na morskú biológiu.

from: I found it difficult to focus on work because I think of sex all the time.
to: Bolo pre mňa ťažké sústrediť sa na prácu, pretože som stále premýšľal o sexe.

from: I consistently set aside a portion of our income into a savings account to protect my family.
to: Vždy som si časť nášho príjmu odložila na úsporný účet, aby som ochránila svoju rodinu.

from: I burst into tears over a minor setback.
to: Pre malú prekážku som sa rozplakala.

from: I carried a lucky charm with me at all times.
to: Vždy som mala pri sebe talisman.

from: I was so clingy and insecure that I drove my partner away.
to: Bola som taká neistota a neistote, že som odtiahla svojho partnera.

from: I dusted the apartment at least three times a week.
to: Odprašoval som byt aspoň trikrát týždenne.

from: I preferred to deal with it by myself.
to: Radšej som sa s tým vysporiadala sama.

from: I wanted to buy that house, because all my friends lived close by.
to: Chcel som kúpiť ten dom, pretože všetci moji priatelia žili blízko.

from: I am determined to protect my loved ones.
to: Som odhodlaná chrániť svojich milovaných.

from: During a workout session, I struggled to complete the exercises.
to: Počas tréningu som sa snažil dokončiť všetky cvičenia.

from: Even though I didn't do anything wrong, the boss was angry at me, but I decided to stay quiet.

from: I did not listen because I got distracted easily.

from: I did not take sides when my friends were arguing, I wanted to stay objective.

from: I would never want my kids to fend for themselves.
to: Nikdy by som nechcela, aby sa moje deti postarali o seba.

from: I have always tried to create ideal conditions for my employees.
to: Vždy som sa snažil vytvoriť ideálne podmienky pre svojich zamestnancov.

from: My friend told me I looked nice yesterday.
to: Môj priateľ mi povedal, že som včera vyzerala pekne.

from: I thought I could do the whole workout, but I was wrong.

to: Dal som rozkaz.

from: My partner prefers animals, but I wouldn't be able to live without human company.
to: Môj partner preferuje zvieratá, ale ja by som nemohol žiť bez ľudskej spoločnosti.

from: I did not know how to handle honest feedback from others.

from: I told you I'd hurt you.

from: I think my friend will never grow up.

from: When I started working at the gas station, I bought some tear spray.

from: I listened attentively to my friend as they shared their struggles.

from: I have always found it important to know my employees, their strengths and weaknesses and work with that appropriately.

to: Rád počúvam drámy iných ľudí.

from: They told me I was pretty and I thanked them.
to: Povedali mi, že som pekná a ja som im poďakovala.

from: I had to dress extra nicely for the sponsors meeting.
to: Musela som sa obliecť extra pekne na stretnutie sponzorov.

from: When I'm feeling down, I like to act like a fool to feel better.

from: I paid for all their expenses.

from: I gave my old car to my brother who is still in college.

from: I wasn't even nervous before my big presentation.
to: Pred veľkou prezentáciou som nebola ani nervózna.

from: I never learned to cook because I didn't have to.
to: Nikdy som sa nenaučil variť, pretože som nemusel.

from: I was cleaning the windows for three hours.
to: Čistil som okná tri hodiny.

from: They say I'm very easily influenced.
to: Hovorí sa, že som veľmi ľahko ovplyvniteľný.

from: I haven't cried in 20 years.
to: Neplakala som 20 rokov.

from: I could see she wasn't feeling well, so I made her some hot chocolate.
to: Videla som, že sa necíti dobre, tak som jej urobila horúcu čokoládu.

from: It took me a long time to realise which people are not worth investing energy in.

from: I felt the situation was totally out of my control.
to: Cítil som, že situácia je úplne mimo mojej kontroly.

from: I just wanted to please them.
to: Chcel som im len uľaknúť.

from: I do not care what others think, I am always right.

from: I tried the extra spicy food.
to: Skúšala som extra pikantné jedlo.

from: Would you open that jar for me?
to: Otvoril by si mi ten džbán?

from: I knew it made my skin look really good.
to: Vedela som, že to robí moju pokožku vyzerať naozaj dobre.

from: The hockey players were in good shape.
to: Hokejisti boli v dobrej kondícii.

from: I'm the last one to believe such lies.
to: Som posledný, kto by veril takýmto klamstvám.

from: I spent a lot of mental effort to finally speak up.
to: Utratila som veľa duševného úsilia, aby som konečne prehovorila.

from: I led the team towards victory.
to: Vedel som tím k víťazstvu.

from: I must admit that every time I saw a woman in a tight dress, I wondered about the type of underwear she was wearing.

to: Vedel som, aké sú vodcovské vlastnosti, mal som veľa skúseností v tejto oblasti.

from: When I worked in a restaurant, I only carried two plates because they were too heavy.

from: I wanted to be part of the army since I was young.
to: Odmalička som chcel byť vojakom.

from: I argued with the policeman about the parking ticket.
to: Pohádala som sa s policajtom kvôli pokutu za parkovisko.

from: I organized the hunting trip.
to: Ja som zorganizoval lov.

from: I wouldn't trade my naturally brown hair for the world.
to: Ja by som svoje prirodzene hnedé vlasy nevymenil za svet.

from: Undeterred by the rough sea, I plunged into the depths.

from: When I'm angry, I don't engage in exchanges with anyone.

from: I can see that I've put on muscle mass.

from: I have sociable nature and it makes me an excellent host and event organizer.

from: I diligently sorted and recycled waste materials.
to: Svojou starostlivosťou som triedol a recykloval odpad.

from: I toughed it although they told me not to.

from: I could easily beat you in tennis.

to: Snáď som sa snáď aj v tomto pracovnom prostredí dobre orientovala, a tak som sa do rozhovorov zapájala s istotou.

from: I'm proud that I inspire others on their fitness journey with my hard work.

from: I don't like to meddle in people's problems, but if someone attacks my loved ones I don't hesitate for a second.

from: I was in the US for a year and people had no problem talking to me even though they didn't know me.

from: If something happened I would have just panicked and ran away.
to: Ak by sa niečo stalo, zpanikařil by som a utiekol.

from: I didn't want to break up, but I didn't want to show my sensitive side either.
to: Nechcela som sa rozísť, ale nechcela som ukázať ani svoju citlivú stránku.

from: When I was younger, I was one of the die-hard fans of that band, I would cry when seeing their concert.
to: Keď som bol mladší, bol som jeden z fanúšikov tej kapely, plakala som, keď som videla ich koncert.

from: I joined the military.
to: Pripojil som sa k armáde.

from: I pushed the huge rock aside so we could pass.
to: Odsunul som obrovskú skalu, aby sme mohli prejsť.

from: When I retired, I ordered a silly goodbye cake for my colleagues.

from: They have always praised my gentle spirit, and I tried to live up to it.

from: I'm friendly.
to: Som priateľský.

from: I was frequently approached by strangers who wanted to strike up conversations based on my good looks, so I knew I looked good.

from: I was my duty to provide for them materially.
to: Bola to moja povinnosť, aby som ich materiálne zabezpečil.

from: On weekends I worked in a nursing home.
to: Víkendy som pracovala v opatrovateľskom dome.

from: I went to a conference.
to: Bol som na konferencii.

from: I single handedly knocked them out.
to: Sám som ich vyrazil.

from: I received special attention at social events, with many individuals expressing their admiration for my good looks.

from: I don't need to carry guns with me because I'm strong enough to defend myself.
to: Nepotrebujem nosiť so sebou zbrane, pretože som dosť silná na to, aby som sa bránila.

from: I would often imagine having sex with strangers.
to: Často som si predstavovala sex s cudzími ľuďmi.

to: Prečo si platil za kávu, keď som ti povedal, že zaplatím?

from: I played with lego and had fun although I was an adult.
to: Hral som sa s legom a bavil som sa, aj keď som bol dospelý.

from: Why do you think you are not confident enough?
to: Prečo si myslíš, že nie si dosť sebavedomý?

from: I had a hard time respecting authorities.
to: Mal som problém s rešpektovaním autorít.

from: I assumed nobody wanted to help me with chores.
to: Predpokladal som, že mi nikto nechce pomôcť s domácimi prácami.

from: I protected everyone.

from: I chose the car based on the specs, not the looks.
to: Vybral som si auto na základe špecifikácií, nie vzhľadu.

from: Would you like to go to that party with me?
to: Chcela by si ísť na tú párty so mnou?

from: We were too scared to go outside by ourselves so we stayed at home.

from: I wanted to smash that cake like a child.
to: Chcel som rozbiť ten koláč ako dieťa.

from: I am stunning.

from: I enjoyed it when they took their clothes off.

from: I mobilised others to come together for a common cause and make a positive impact on society.

from: I feel so pretty today.
to: Dnes sa cítim tak pekne.

from: I could immediately sense something was wrong.

from: I don't like to make rash decisions - they would only harm my reputation.
to: Nerád robím unáhlené rozhodnutia - len by mi to poškodilo povesť.

from: I established an emergency fund to cover unexpected expenses, providing a safety net for my family.
to: Vytvoril som núdzový fond na pokrytie neočakávaných výdavkov, čím som zabezpečil pre svoju rodinu bezpečnú sieť.

from: My friend was having a bad day, so I bought some food and went to see her.
to: Moja priateľka mala zlý deň, tak som kúpila nejaké jedlo a išla som ju pozrieť.

from: I got so angry after they accused me of sexual assault.
to: Bol som taký naštvaný, keď ma obvinili zo sexuálneho útoku.

from: It was easy for me to make friends on the first day of university.
to: Bolo pre mňa ľahké nájsť si priateľov v prvý deň na univerzite.

from: I started a successful business venture, which provided for my family.
to: Začal som úspešný podnik, ktorý zabezpečoval pre moju rodinu.

from: I feel that I'm good at solving problems.
to: Mám pocit, že som dobrý v riešení problémov.

from: I liked when my partner complimented my appearance.
to: Páčilo sa mi, keď môj partner pochválil môj vzhľad.

from: I like to dress nicely.

from: I could not commit.

from: I have often received compliments about my good looks and now I am confident.

from: I volunteered at a local animal shelter, interacting with the animals and fellow volunteers, and contributing to their well-being and socialization.
to: Bol som dobrovoľníkom v miestnom útulku pre zvieratá, kde som sa stretával so zvieratami a inými dobrovoľníkmi a prispel k ich blahu a socializácii.

from: I did as they asked me to.
to: Urobil som, čo ma požiadali.

from: I don't like to talk about commitments.
to: Nerád sa rozprávam o záväzkoch.

from: I donated a lot of money to various charities.
to: Daroval som veľa peňazí rôznym charitatívnym organizáciám.

from: I babysat my sister's kids last weekend.
to: Posledný víkend som dávala pozor na deti mojej sestry.

from: I always knew I was born for this job.
to: Vždy som vedel, že som sa narodil pre túto prácu.

from: I snapped at my friend when they innocently asked a question, even though I knew it was irrational to get angry over such a small matter.
to: Keď sa ma priateľka nevinným spôsobom niečo opýtala, vystrčila som sa na ňu, hoci som vedela, že je nerozumné hnevať sa na takú malú vec.

from: I wish I had more time to keep this flat clean.
to: Kiežby som mal viac času na udržanie tohto bytu čistého.

from: As soon as my pay check came, I went shopping.
to: Hneď ako mi prišiel výplatný šek, išla som nakupovať.

from: I would be the best president this country has ever seen.
to: Bol by som najlepším prezidentom, akého táto krajina kedy videla.

from: I didn't know how to hang the painting, because the nail was too high.
to: Nevedel som, ako ho zavesiť, lebo bol príliš vysoký.

from: I felt that I should try to be a good student.
to: Cítil som, že by som sa mal snažiť byť dobrým študentom.

from: I like to have my coffee on the table at 9.00 AM every day, can you do it?
to: Rád si dám kávu na stôl každý deň o 9 ráno, môžeš to urobiť?

from: I like it when I can clean alone and my partner is relaxing at that time.
to: Mám rád, keď môžem upratovať sám a môj partner sa v tom čase uvoľňuje.

from: Wait, don't spill it, I cleaned the room an hour ago.
to: Počkaj, nevylievaj to, už som vyčistila izbu pred hodinou.

from: I didn't like the situation, but I preferred to stay quiet.
to: Nepáčila sa mi situácia, ale radšej som zostal ticho.

from: I am very proud when people in my community are doing well.
to: Som veľmi hrdý, keď sa ľuďom v mojej komunite darí dobre.

from: I always strived for a promotion.
to: Vždy som sa snažil o povýšenie.

from: I bought tickets for the hooligans sector.
to: Kúpil som lístky do sektora pre chuligánov.

from: As I stepped into the room, everyone was looking at me.
to: Keď som vošiel do miestnosti, všetci sa na mňa pozerali.

from: I had a bad feeling about them the second I saw them.
to: Mal som zlý pocit, keď som ich videl.

from: I can be very annoyed when someone is chewing with their mouth open.
to: Veľmi ma štve, keď niekto žuje s otvorenou ústou.

from: I am always empathetic to people close to me.
to: Vždy sa cítim v empatii k ľuďom, ktorí sú mi blízki.

from: I calmly confronted a misunderstanding .
to: Kľudne som sa postavil nedorozumeniu .

from: I communicated effectively with the team, displaying professionalism.
to: Účinne som komunikoval s tímom a prejavoval profesionálnosť.

from: I love bachelor parties.
to: Milujem rozlúčky so slobodou.

from: I had to defrost the freezer, just like I do every few months.
to: Musel som rozmraziť mrazničku, ako to robím každých pár mesiacov.

from: I've always been a friend to my employees rather than a boss.
to: Vždy som bol priateľom svojich zamestnancov, nie šéfom.

from: I don't like condoms.
to: Nemám rád kondómy.

from: I called a meeting so we could discuss the strategic plan.
to: Zvolal som schôdzku, aby sme mohli diskutovať o strategickom pláne.

from: I had to get rid of the stain immediately.
to: Musel som sa ihneď zbaviť tej škvrny.

from: I felt like going out that night.
to: Tú noc som chcela ísť von.

from: I never let anybody be dominant when having sex with me.
to: Nikdy som nedovolil nikomu, aby bol dominantný, keď so mnou mal sex.

from: I made sure the guest felt at home here.
to: Uistil som sa, že sa tu hosť cíti ako doma.

from: I slept with so many people.
to: Spala som s toľkými ľuďmi.

from: I didn't panic and immediately gave them first aid.
to: Nepanikáril som a okamžite som im poskytol prvú pomoc.

from: I was forced to sign up for a self-defence course.
to: Bol som nútený zapísať sa na kurz sebaobrany.

from: I paid the interns even though I did not have to.
to: Zaplatil som stážistom, aj keď som nemusel.

from: When they told me to act my age, I told them off.
to: Keď mi povedali, aby som sa správal ako starší, odvrátil som ich.

from: They've been telling me that I'm beautiful, but I'm more than that.
to: Vraj som krásna, ale som viac než to.

from: I drank very heavily.
to: Veľmi som pil.

from: I couldn't decide which shirt to buy, so I bought all three.
to: Nemohol som sa rozhodnúť, ktorú košelu si kúpiť, tak som si kúpil všetky tri.

from: I know it's important to be alone with yourself, but I just couldn't do it.
to: Viem, že je dôležité byť sám so sebou, ale ja som to nemohol urobiť.

from: I wanted to make more friends.
to: Chcel som si nájsť viac priateľov.

from: I impulsively quit my job without a backup plan.
to: Nechala som si prácu bez toho, aby som mala nejaký záložný plán.

from: I wanted to focus on my career, family life could wait.
to: Chcel som sa sústrediť na svoju kariéru, rodinný život mohol počkať.

from: I thought I was the most beautiful at the event.
to: Myslela som si, že som bola najkrajšia na tej akcii.

from: I established an emergency fund to protect my family from unexpected expenses.
to: Založil som núdzový fond, aby som ochránil svoju rodinu pred nečakanými výdavkami.

from: I liked speaking in front of a huge audience.
to: Páčilo sa mi hovoriť pred obrovským publikom.

from: It is stressful to work here at this position, but I'm good at handling it.
to: Je stresujúce pracovať na tejto pozícii, ale zvládam to.

from: I had to cheer others up.
to: Musel som povzbudiť ostatných.

from: I never interfered in my employees personal lives.
to: Nikdy som sa nezasahoval do súkromného života mojich zamestnancov.

from: I have to look good, even if I'm just going to take out the trash.
to: Musím vyzerať dobre, aj keď idem len vyniesť odpadky.

from: I led my team to success.
to: Vedel som svoj tím k úspechu.

from: I was never good at sports.
to: Nikdy som nebol dobrý v športe.

from: I was thinking about you and me having sex, what do you say?
to: Rozmýšľal som o tom, že by sme mali spolu sex, čo ty na to?

from: I presented my innovative idea with unwavering conviction.
to: Svoj inovatívny nápad som predstavil s neochvejným presvedčením.

from: I could not keep up with their tempo.
to: Nemohol som držať krok s ich tempom.

from: I was scared because there was a spider in my shower.
to: Bála som sa, pretože bol v sprche pavúk.

from: I validated my friend's emotions, providing reassurance during a challenging situation.
to: Uznal som, že moje pocity sú pravdivé, a v ťažkej situácii som ho upokojil.

from: With each step deeper into the haunted house, I explored its eerie corridors, unafraid of the lurking shadows.
to: S každým krokom hlbšie do strašidelného domu som skúmala jeho strašidelné chodby, nebojúc sa číhajúcich tieňov.

from: I like it when the hairdresser massages my head.
to: Páči sa mi, keď mi kaderníčka masíruje hlavu.

from: I was nervous, because I had no time to clean the bathroom.
to: Bola som nervózna, pretože som nemala čas vyčistiť kúpeľňu.

from: I locked myself out, so I had to break down the door.
to: Zamkol som sa von, tak som musel vylomiť dvere.

from: I liked the way you walked.
to: Páčilo sa mi, ako si kráčal.

from: I like to divide the tasks.
to: Rád si rozdeľujem úlohy.

from: I invested my money so that I have some passive income.
to: Investoval som peniaze, aby som mal pasívny príjem.

from: I ought to do some summer clean-up.
to: Mal by som urobiť nejaké letné upratovanie.

from: I'd like to be pretty like Hollywood stars.
to: Chcela by som byť krásna ako hollywoodske hviezdy.

from: I always went everywhere ahead of time.
to: Vždy som bol všade vopred.

from: I put on this new perfume today and everyone is turning around to see me.
to: Dnes som si nasadila nový parfum a všetci sa na mňa pozerajú.

from: I made coffee for everyone in our team before we started the team meeting.
to: Urobili sme kávu pre všetkých v tíme, predtým ako sme začali stretnutie.

from: It was comforting for me, that I cooked for my family.
to: Bolo to pre mňa útecha, že som varil pre moju rodinu.

from: My partner never truly listens to what I'm saying and I find it childish.
to: Môj partner nikdy naozaj nepočúva, čo mu hovorím a ja to považujem za detinské.

from: I earned a lot more than my partner, and now my partner is a stay-at-home parent.
to: Zarobil som oveľa viac ako môj partner, a teraz je môj partner rodičom, ktorý ostáva doma.

from: I did what they told me to do to fit in.
to: Robil som to, čo mi povedali, aby som sa zapáčil.

from: My immature mindset prevented me from commiting in a relationship.
to: Moja nezrelá myseľ mi bránila v tom, aby som sa zaviazala.

from: I frequently deferred to others' opinions and preferences.
to: Často som sa podriadil názorom a preferenciám druhých.

from: I made a resolution not to buy leather clothes or shoes because it is insensitive to animals.
to: Rozhodol som sa nekúpiť kožené oblečenie ani topánky, pretože sú necitlivé k zvieratám.

from: I have been taught to smile even when I am sad or angry.
to: Naučili ma sa usmievať sa, aj keď som smutná alebo nahnevaná.

from: Despite being in a committed relationship, I found it difficult to resist strangers.
to: Napriek tomu, že som bola v záväznom vzťahu, bolo pre mňa ťažké odolať cudzincom.

from: I like being in charge.
to: Rád som tu šéf.

from: I had no doubt.
to: Nepochybujem.

from: I spent hours in front of the mirror.
to: Strávil som hodiny pred zrkadlom.

from: My boss is influential and has a significant impact on others.
to: Môj šéf má vplyv a má významný vplyv na ostatných.

from: I called the vet immediately after I noticed that the bird was limping.
to: Okamžite som zavolala veterinára, keď som si všimla, že vták kulká.

from: I never talked about my feelings with my friends.
to: Nikdy som sa o svojich pocitoch nerozprával s priateľmi.

from: I was in charge of the whole project.
to: Bol som zodpovedný za celý projekt.

from: I couldn't look, it made me feel sick.
to: Nemohol som sa pozerať, bolo mi z toho zle.

from: I was elected as the new mayor of the town.
to: Bol som zvolený za nového starostu mesta.

from: When they called and told me what had happened, I collapsed.
to: Keď mi zavolali a povedali mi, čo sa stalo, zrútila som sa.

from: I got bitten by a snake but I remained calm.
to: Pohryzol ma had, ale zostala som pokojná.

from: Taking care of my children is the least I can do for my family.
to: Starostlivosť o moje deti je to najmenej, čo môžem pre svoju rodinu urobiť.

from: I kept the kitchen area clean to prevent a buildup of dirty dishes
to: Udržoval som kuchyňu čistú, aby sa nezhromažďovalo špinavé riad

from: I have never left the house messy, I have to clean everything first.
to: Nikdy som neopustil dom v neporiadku, musím to všetko najprv upratať.

from: I have paid a personal trainer to help me with my workouts.
to: Zaplatila som osobnému trénerovi, aby mi pomohol s tréningom.

from: As a software engineer, I consistently demonstrated a strong work ethic and attention to detail.
to: Ako softvérový inžinier som vždy preukazoval silnú pracovnú etiku a pozornosť k detailom.

from: I was always the one who did most of the work in group assignments.
to: Vždy som bola tá, ktorá mala väčšinu práce v skupinových prideleniach.

from: I didn't feel affected by criticism at all, I didn't take it personal.
to: Necítil som sa ovplyvnený kritikou vôbec, nebral som to osobne.

from: I felt helpful because I could host a party.
to: Cítil som sa užitočný, pretože som mohol usporiadať párty.

from: I always thought that life is a game and you have to enjoy it.
to: Vždy som si myslel, že život je hra a že sa z nej musíš tešiť.

from: I evaluated all the costs and benefits before making the decision.
to: Pred rozhodnutím som zvážila všetky náklady a výhody.

from: I bought a castle to renovate it.
to: Kúpil som hrad, aby som ho obnovil.

from: I signed up for a medieval swording workshop.
to: Prihlásil som sa na stredoveký seminár šermovania.

from: The muscles in my arms and back flexed as I rowed through the calm waters.
to: Svaly v rukách a chrbte sa mi zvilnily, keď som veslal cez pokojnú vodu.

from: As a lawyer, I meticulously researched case precedents and prepared persuasive arguments for the courtroom
to: Ako právnik som dôkladne skúmal precedensy a pripravoval presvedčivé argumenty pre súd

from: I'd like to trade football cards, but I don't have anyone to trade them with.
to: Rád by som vymenil futbalové karty, ale nemám s kým.

from: I had to throw away the hoodie because it had a stain on it that I could not get rid off.
to: Musela som ho vyhodiť, lebo na ňom bola škvrna, ktorú som sa nemohla zbaviť.

from: My friends have told me that I am empathetic, and I have been very touched by that.
to: Moji priatelia mi hovorili, že som empatická, a to ma veľmi dojalo.

from: I swam naked.
to: Plaval som nahý.

from: I rented the house for them.
to: Prenajal som im dom.

from: I liked to play computer games and lived in my mom's basement although I was an adult.
to: Rád som hral počítačové hry a žil som v suteréne mojej mamy, hoci som bol dospelý.

from: I hated when my partner was washing the dishes because I knew that I could do it better.
to: Neznášala som, keď môj partner umýval riad, pretože som vedela, že to dokážem lepšie.

from: The last time I had a fight with my parents, I locked myself in the attic for the day.
to: Naposledy, keď som sa pohádala s rodičmi, zamkla som sa na podkroví.

from: I am dedicated.
to: Som oddaná.

from: I knew that he was acting rude, but it is just because he's had a hard time at work.
to: Vedela som, že sa správal hrubý, ale je to len preto, že má ťažký čas v práci.

from: I attended a photoshoot where the photographer captured my natural beauty, boosting my self-esteem.
to: Bola som na fotografovaní, kde fotograf zachytil moju prirodzenú krásu, čo mi zvýšilo sebavedomie.

from: I advocated for causes and initiatives I believed in, inspiring others to join in.
to: Obhajoval som veci a iniciatívy, v ktoré som veril, a inšpiroval som ostatných, aby sa k nim pripojili.
